subclassfeature3.name: Frenzy
subclassfeature3.description: While Raging and using Reckless Attack, deal a number of d6 extra damage to the first target hit on my turn.

subclassfeature6.name: Mindless Rage
subclassfeature6.description: While Raging, I am immune to Charmed and Frightened conditions. These conditions end when I enter Rage.

subclassfeature10.name: Retaliation
subclassfeature10.description: As a Reaction, make a melee attack against a creature within 5 feet when it damages me.

subclassfeature14.name: Intimidating Presence
subclassfeature14.description: As a Bonus Action, cause creatures in a 30-foot radius to make a Wisdom save (DC 8 + Strength mod + Proficiency). On failure, they are Frightened for 1 minute, repeating the save at each turn's end. Regain use after a Long Rest or by expending a Rage use.

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature3.description: I gain proficiency with three skills of my choice

subclassfeature3.1.name: Cutting Words
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a reaction, when a foe within earshot & 60 ft rolls ability check, attack or damage,
   I can subtract a Bardic Inspiration die from the result unless the foe can't be charmed

subclassfeature6.name: Additional Magical Secrets
subclassfeature6.description: I can add two spells/cantrips from any class to my Spells Known

subclassfeature14.name: Peerless Skill
subclassfeature14.description: When making an ability check, I can expend a use of Bardic Inspiration to add the die

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature1.description: I gain proficiency with heavy armor

subclassfeature1.1.name: Disciple of Life
subclassfeature1.1.description:
Whenever a 1st-level or higher spell I cast restores HP to a creature, it heals more
   The creature regains an additional 2 + spell level (SL) worth of hit points
   Note that "X/SL" on the spell page means per spell slot level above the spell's normal level

spellAdd: When I use a spell that restores hit points, it restores an additional 2 + the level of the spell slot (or spell slot equivalent) used to cast the spell.

subclassfeature2.name: Channel Divinity: Preserve Life
subclassfeature2.description:
As an action, I can heal any creature within 30 ft of me up to half their maximum HP
   I divide the number of hit points among the creatures as I see fit

subclassfeature6.name: Blessed Healer
subclassfeature6.description: When I restore HP to another with a spell, I regain 2 + the spell (slot) level in HP

spellAdd: When I cast a spell that restores hit points to another creature than myself at the moment of casting, I also heal 2 + the level of the spell slot (or spell slot equivalent) hit points.

subclassfeature8.name: Divine Strike
subclassfeature8.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature with a weapon attack, I can do extra damage

atkAdd: Once per turn, I can have one of my weapon attacks that hit do extra radiant damage.

subclassfeature17.name: Supreme Healing
subclassfeature17.description: When I restore HP with a spell, I heal the maximum amount instead of rolling the dice

spellAdd: When I use a spell that restores hit points by rolling one or more dice to restore hit points with a spell, I instead use the highest number possible for each die.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature2.name: Bonus Cantrip
subclassfeature2.description: I know one additional druid cantrip of my choice

subclassfeature2.1.name: Natural Recovery
subclassfeature2.1.description: After a short rest, I can recover a number of 5th-level or lower spell slots

subclassfeature3.name: Circle Spells
subclassfeature3.description: Choose a terrain that grants you spells using the "Choose Feature" button above

arctic.name: Arctic Circle Spells
arctic.description:
My mystical connection to the arctic infuses me with the ability to cast certain spells
   These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare

coast.name: Coast Circle Spells
coast.description:
My mystical connection to the coast infuses me with the ability to cast certain spells
   These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare

desert.name: Desert Circle Spells
desert.description:
My mystical connection to the desert infuses me with the ability to cast certain spells
   These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare

forest.name: Forest Circle Spells
forest.description:
My mystical connection to the forest infuses me with the ability to cast certain spells
   These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare

grassland.name: Grassland Circle Spells
grassland.description:
My connection to the grassland infuses me with the ability to cast certain spells
   These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare

mountain.name: Mountain Circle Spells
mountain.description:
My connection to the mountains infuses me with the ability to cast certain spells
   These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare

swamp.name: Swamp Circle Spells
swamp.description:
My mystical connection to the swamp infuses me with the ability to cast certain spells
   These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare

underdark.name: Underdark Circle Spells
underdark.description:
My connection to the underdark infuses me with the ability to cast certain spells
   These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare

subclassfeature6.name: Land's Stride
subclassfeature6.description:
I can travel through nonmagical, difficult terrain without penalty
   I have advantage on saves vs. plants that impede movement by magical influence

subclassfeature10.name: Nature's Ward
subclassfeature10.description: I am immune to poison/disease and I can't be charmed/frightened by elementals or fey

text: Immune to being charmed or frightened by elementals or fey

subclassfeature14.name: Nature's Sanctuary
subclassfeature14.description:
When a beast or plant attacks me, it must make a Wis save or pick a different target
   If it can't, it automatically misses; On a successful save, it is immune for 24 hours

subclassfeature3.name: Improved Critical

atkAdd: My weapon attacks score a critical on a to hit roll of both 19 and 20.

subclassfeature3.description: I score a critical hit with my weapon attacks/Unarmed Strikes on a roll of 19 and 20

subclassfeature3.1.name: Remarkable Athlete
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I have Advantage on Initiative and Strength(Athletics) checks
   On a critical hit, I can move half my Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks

subclassfeature7.name: Additional Fighting Style

fighting style [archery].name: Fighting Style [Archery]
fighting style [archery].description: I gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls I make with Ranged weapons.

atkCalc: My ranged weapons get a +2 bonus on the To Hit.

fighting style [blind fighting].name: Fighting Style [Blind Fighting]
fighting style [blind fighting].description: I have Blindsight with a range of 10 feet.

fighting style [defense].name: Fighting Style [Defense]
fighting style [defense].description: While I'm wearing Light, Medium, or Heavy armor, I gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class.

extraAC.name: Defense Fighting Style
extraAC.text: I gain a +1 bonus to AC while wearing armor.

fighting style [dueling].name: Fighting Style [Dueling]
fighting style [dueling].description: When I'm holding a Melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons, I gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with that weapon.

atkCalc: When I'm wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no weapon in my other hand, I do +2 damage with that melee weapon. This condition will always be false if the bonus action 'Off-hand Attack' exists.

fighting style [great weapon fighting].name: Fighting Style [Great Weapon Fighting]
fighting style [great weapon fighting].description: When I roll damage for an attack I make with a Melee weapon that I am holding with two hands, I can treat any 1 or 2 on a damage die as a 3. The weapon must have the Two-Handed or Versatile properties to gain this benefit.

atkAdd: While wielding a two-handed or versatile melee weapon in two hands, I can treat a roll of 1 or 2 on any damage die as a 3.

fighting style [interception].name: Fighting Style [Interception]
fighting style [interception].description: When a creature I can see hits another creature within 5 feet of me with an attack roll, I can take a Reaction to reduce the damage dealt to the target by 1d10 plus my Proficiency Bonus. I must be holding a Shield or a Simple or Martial weapon to use this Reaction.

fighting style [protection].name: Fighting Style [Protection]
fighting style [protection].description: When a creature I can see attacks a target other than me that is within 5 feet of me, I can take a Reaction to interpose my Shield if I'm holding one. I impose Disadvantage on the triggering attack roll and all other attack rolls against the target until the start of my next turn if I remain within 5 feet of the target.

fighting style [thrown weapon fighting].name: Fighting Style [Thrown Weapon Fighting]
fighting style [thrown weapon fighting].description: When I hit with a ranged attack roll using a weapon that has the Thrown property, I gain a +2 bonus to the damage roll.

atkAdd: I deal +2 damage when I hit a ranged attack made with a thrown weapon.

fighting style [two-weapon fighting].name: Fighting Style [Two-Weapon Fighting]
fighting style [two-weapon fighting].description: When I make an extra attack as a result of using a weapon that has the Light property, I can add my ability modifier to the damage to that attack if I am not already adding it to the damage.

atkCalc: When engaging in two-weapon fighting, I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks. If a melee weapon includes 'off-hand' or 'secondary' in its name or description, it is considered an off-hand attack.

fighting style [unarmed fighting].name: Fighting Style [Unarmed Fighting]
fighting style [unarmed fighting].description:
When I hit with my Unarmed Strike and deal damage, I can deal Bludgeoning damage equal to 1d6 plus my Strength modifier instead of the normal damage of an Unarmed Strike. If I am not holding any weapons or a Shield when I make the attack roll, the d6 becomes a d8.
 At the start of each of my turns, I can deal 1d4 Bludgeoning damage to one creature Grappled by me.

atkAdd: My unarmed strikes deal 1d6 damage instead of 1, which increases to 1d8 if I have both hands free to make an unarmed strike with.

subclassfeature7.description: I gain another different Fighting Style feat of my choice.

subclassfeature10.name: Heroic Warrior
subclassfeature10.description: I gain Heroic Inspiration in combat when I start a turn without it

subclassfeature15.name: Superior Critical

atkAdd: My weapon attacks also score a critical on a to hit roll of 18.

subclassfeature15.description: I score a critical hit with my weapon attacks/Unarmed Strikes on a roll of 18, 19, and 20

subclassfeature18.name: Survivor
subclassfeature18.description:
I roll with Advantage on Death Saves and 18-19 counts as a critical success
   At the start of my turn, if I'm not above half or at 0 HP, I regain 5 + Con mod HP

subclassfeature3.name: Hand Technique
subclassfeature3.description:
Whenever I hit a creature with a Flurry of Blows attack I can do one of the following:
   • Have it make a Dexterity save or be knocked prone
   • Have it make a Strength save or be pushed up to 15 ft away from me
   • Stop it from taking reactions until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature6.name: Wholeness of Body
subclassfeature6.description: As an action, I regain hit points equal to three times my monk level

subclassfeature11.name: Tranquility
subclassfeature11.description: After a long rest, I gain the effect of a Sanctuary spell until a next long rest

quivering palm.name: Quivering Palm
quivering palm.description:
[3 ki points]When I hit a creature with an unarmed strike, I can start imperceptible vibrations
   Within my monk level in days, I can use an action to have the creature make a Con save
   If it fails, it is reduced to 0 hit points; If it succeeds, it takes 10d10 necrotic damage

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Sacred Weapon
subclassfeature3.description:
As an action, for 1 minute, I add my Cha modifier to hit for one weapon I'm holding
   It also counts as magical and emits bright light in a 20-ft radius and equal dim light

atkCalc: If I include the words 'Sacred Weapon' in the name of a weapon, it gets my Charisma modifier added to its To Hit.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Turn the Unholy
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As an action, all fiends/undead within 30 ft that can hear me must make a Wis save
   If one of them fails this save, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes damage
   Turned: move away, never within 30 ft of me, no reactions or actions other than Dash
   Turned: may Dodge instead of Dash when nowhere to move and unable to escape bonds

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of Devotion
subclassfeature7.description: While I'm conscious, allies within range and I can't be charmed

subclassfeature15.name: Purity of Spirit
subclassfeature15.description: I am always under the effect of a Protection from Evil and Good spell

subclassfeature20.name: Holy Nimbus
subclassfeature20.description:
As an action, I shine with a 30-ft radius bright light and equal dim light for 1 minute
   If an enemy starts its turn in the bright light, it takes 10 radiant damage
   For the duration, I have advantage on saves vs. spells cast by fiends and undead

subclassfeature3.name: Hunter's Lore
subclassfeature3.description:
While a creature is marked by my Hunter's Mark, I know the following about it:
   Damage/condition immunities, damage resistances, and/or damage vulnerabilities.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Hunter's Prey

colossus slayer.name: Colossus Slayer
colossus slayer.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature with a weapon, I deal an extra 1d8 damage to the target if it's missing any Hit Points. After a Short or Long Rest, I can replace this feature with the 'Horde Breaker' feature.

horde breaker.name: Horde Breaker
horde breaker.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature, I can make an attack vs. another within 5 ft of it if I haven't hit it during this turn. After a Short or Long Rest, I can replace this feature with the 'Colossus Slayer' feature.

subclassfeature3.1.description: Use the 'choose feature' button to select a Hunter's Prey option, after a Short or Long Rest, I can replace the chosen option with the other one.

subclassfeature7.name: Defensive Tactics

escape the horde.name: Escape the Horde
escape the horde.description: Opportunity Attacks have Disadvantage against me. After a Short or Long Rest, I can replace this feature with the 'Multiattack Defense' feature.

multiattack defense.name: Multiattack Defense
multiattack defense.description: When a creature hits me with an attack roll, that creature has Disadvantage on all other attack rolls against me this turn. After a Short or Long Rest, I can replace this feature with the 'Escape the Horde' feature.

subclassfeature7.description: Use the 'choose feature' button to select a Defensive Tactics option, After a Short or Long Rest, I can replace the chosen option with the other one.

subclassfeature11.name: Superior Hunter's Prey
subclassfeature11.description: Once per turn when I deal damage to a creature marked by my Hunter's mark, I can also deal the extra damage to another creature I can see within 30 feet.

subclassfeature15.name: Superior Hunter's Defense
subclassfeature15.description: When I take damage, I can take a Reaction to give myself Resistance to that damage and any other damage of the same type until the end of the current turn.

subclassfeature3.name: Fast Hands
action: Pick Lock/Disarm Trap/Utilize Item/Activate Magic Item
subclassfeature3.description:
I can do these as a bonus action:
   Sleight of Hand: Make a Dex (Sleight of Hand) check to pick a lock/disarm a trap or pick a pocket.
   Use an Object: Take the Utilize action, or take the Magic action to use a magic item that requires one.

subclassfeature6.name: Second-Story Work
subclassfeature6.description: I gain a Climb Speed equal to my Speed and can determine my jump distance using Dex.

subclassfeature9.name: Supreme Sneak
subclassfeature9.description:
I gain the following Cunning Strike option:
   Stealth Attack (Cost 1d6): This attack doesn't end Hiding if I end the turn behind Three-Quarters or Total Cover.

subclassfeature13.name: Use Magic Device
subclassfeature13.description:
Attunement: I can attune to up to four magic items at once.
   Charges: When I use a magic item property with charges, a 6 on a 1d6 roll means no charges are used.
   Scrolls: I can use any Spell Scroll, using Int as my spellcasting ability. Level 2+ spells require an Int (Arcana) check (DC 10 + Spell Level) to cast or the scroll disintegrates.

subclassfeature17.name: Thief's Reflexes
subclassfeature17.description: I can take two turns during the first round of any combat at my normal Initiative and my second turn at my Initiative - 10.

subclassfeature1.name: Dragon Ancestor
subclassfeature1.description:
Choose a Dragon Ancestor using the "Choose Feature" button above
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

black dragon ancestor.name: Black Dragon Ancestor
black dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with black dragons, which are affiliated with acid damage
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

blue dragon ancestor.name: Blue Dragon Ancestor
blue dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with blue dragons, which are affiliated with lightning damage
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

brass dragon ancestor.name: Brass Dragon Ancestor
brass dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with brass dragons, which are affiliated with fire damage
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

bronze dragon ancestor.name: Bronze Dragon Ancestor
bronze dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with bronze dragons, which are affiliated with lightning dmg
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

copper dragon ancestor.name: Copper Dragon Ancestor
copper dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with copper dragons, which are affiliated with acid damage
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

gold dragon ancestor.name: Gold Dragon Ancestor
gold dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with gold dragons, which are affiliated with fire damage
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

green dragon ancestor.name: Green Dragon Ancestor
green dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with green dragons, which are affiliated with poison damage
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

red dragon ancestor.name: Red Dragon Ancestor
red dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with red dragons, which are affiliated with fire damage
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

silver dragon ancestor.name: Silver Dragon Ancestor
silver dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with silver dragons, which are affiliated with cold damage
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

white dragon ancestor.name: White Dragon Ancestor
white dragon ancestor.description:
I have draconic ancestry with white dragons, which are affiliated with cold damage
   When interacting with dragons, if I can add my Proficiency Bonus, I can double it

subclassfeature1.1.name: Draconic Resilience
subclassfeature1.1.description:
When I am not wearing armor, my AC is 13 + Dexterity modifier
   My hit point maximum increases by an amount equal to my sorcerer level

subclassfeature6.name: Elemental Affinity
subclassfeature6.description:
Choose a Dragon Ancestor using the "Choose Feature" button above
   I add Cha mod for spell damage if matching my dragon ancestor's affiliated type
   I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain resistance to my dragon ancestor's affiliated type

acid.name: Acid Elemental Affinity
acid.description:
I add my Charisma modifier to one damage roll of a spell if it does acid damage
   When I do this, I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain acid resistance for 1 hour

atkCalc: Cantrips and spells that deal acid damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.
spellAdd: Cantrips and spells that deal acid damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.

cold.name: Cold Elemental Affinity
cold.description:
I add my Charisma modifier to one damage roll of a spell if it does cold damage
   When I do this, I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain cold resistance for 1 hour

atkCalc: Cantrips and spells that deal cold damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.
spellAdd: Cantrips and spells that deal cold damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.

fire.name: Fire Elemental Affinity
fire.description:
I add my Charisma modifier to one damage roll of a spell if it does fire damage
   When I do this, I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain fire resistance for 1 hour

atkCalc: Cantrips and spells that deal fire damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.
spellAdd: Cantrips and spells that deal fire damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.

lightning.name: Lightning Elemental Affinity
lightning.description:
I add my Charisma modifier to one damage roll of a spell if it does lightning damage
   When I do this, I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain lightning resistance for 1 hour

atkCalc: Cantrips and spells that deal lightning damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.
spellAdd: Cantrips and spells that deal lightning damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.

poison.name: Poison Elemental Affinity
poison.description:
I add my Charisma modifier to one damage roll of a spell if it does poison damage
   When I do this, I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain poison resistance for 1 hour

atkCalc: Cantrips and spells that deal poison damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.
spellAdd: Cantrips and spells that deal poison damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.

subclassfeature14.name: Dragon Wings
subclassfeature14.description:
As a bonus action, unless armor is in the way, I can sprout dragon wings from my back
   I gain a fly speed equal to my current speed until I dismiss the wings as a bonus action

subclassfeature18.name: Draconic Presence
subclassfeature18.description:
As an action, I create 60-ft radius aura of awe/fear for concentration up to 1 minute
   All hostiles in this aura must make a Wis save or be charmed (awe) or frightened (fear)
   They make their saves at the beginning of their turns
   A creature that succeeds on the save is immune to my aura for 24 hours

subclassfeature3.name: Dark One's Blessing
subclassfeature3.description: When I reduce a hostile to 0 HP, I gain Cha mod + Warlock level temp HP (min 1). I also gain this temp HP if an enemy within 10 ft of me is reduced to 0 Hit Points.

subclassfeature6.name: Dark One's Own Luck
subclassfeature6.description: Once per roll, when I make an ability check or saving throw, I can add 1d10 after rolling the d20 but before any of the roll's effects occur.

subclassfeature10.name: Fiendish Resilience
subclassfeature10.description: At the end of a Rest, I can choose a damage type (not Force) to be Resistant to until I choose another.

subclassfeature14.name: Hurl Through Hell
subclassfeature14.description: Once per turn when I hit a creature with an attack roll I can force it to make a Cha save, or it is Incapacitated and disappears into the Lower Planes until the end of my next turn. When it returns it takes 8d10 Psychic damage if it isn't a Fiend. This Feature can be used 1/LR unless I expend a Warlock SS to regain use of it.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature2.name: Evocation Savant
subclassfeature2.description: I halve the gp and time needed to copy evocation spells into my spellbook

subclassfeature2.1.name: Sculpt Spells
subclassfeature2.1.description:
If I cast an evocation spell affecting others I can see, I can protect 1 + the spell's level
   The chosen automatically succeed on their saving throws vs. the spell
   They also take no damage if the spell would normally deal half damage on a save

subclassfeature6.name: Potent Cantrip
subclassfeature6.description: Any cantrips I cast still deal half damage on a successful save

atkAdd: My cantrips still do half damage on a successful saving throw, but none of their other effects.
spellAdd: My cantrips still do half damage on a successful saving throw, but none of their other effects.

subclassfeature10.name: Empowered Evocation
subclassfeature10.description: I can add my Int modifier to a single damage roll of any wizard evocation spell I cast

atkCalc: I add my Intelligence modifier to a single damage roll of any wizard evocation spell I cast.
spellAdd: I add my Intelligence modifier to a single damage roll of any wizard evocation spell I cast.

subclassfeature14.name: Overchannel
subclassfeature14.description:
When I cast a 5th-level or lower wizard spell that damages, it can deal max damage
   Except the first time I do this after a long rest, I suffer 2d12 necrotic dmg per spell lvl
   Every time I do it after that, before a long rest, I take another 1d12 necrotic damage
   This necrotic damage surpasses my resistances/immunities; I can't overchannel cantrips

subclassfeature3.name: Spirit Seeker
subclassfeature3.description: I can cast Beast Sense and Speak with Animals as rituals (PHB 217 & 277)

beast sense.changes: I can cast this spell only as a ritual, thus its casting time is 10 minutes longer.

speak with animals.changes: I can cast this spell only as a ritual, thus its casting time is 10 minutes longer.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Totem Spirit
subclassfeature3.1.description: Choose Bear, Eagle, Elk, Wolf, or Tiger Spirit using the "Choose Feature" button above

bear.name: Bear Spirit
bear.description: While raging, I have resistance to all damage types except psychic

eagle.name: Eagle Spirit
eagle.description:
While raging without heavy armor, others have disadv. on opportunity attacks vs. me
   I can use the Dash action as a bonus action

wolf.name: Wolf Spirit
wolf.description: While raging, friends have advantage on melee attacks vs. hostiles within 5 ft of me

_optionalChoices.name: Elk Spirit
_optionalChoices.description: While raging without heavy armor, my base walking speed increases by 15 ft

_optionalChoices.name: Tiger Spirit
_optionalChoices.description: While raging, I can add 10 ft to my long jump and 3 ft to my high jump distance

subclassfeature6.name: Aspect of the Beast
subclassfeature6.description: Choose Bear, Eagle, Elk, Wolf, or Tiger Aspect using the "Choose Feature" button above

bear.name: Aspect of the Bear
bear.description: Advantage on Strength checks to push/pull/lift/break; Carrying capacity is doubled

eagle.name: Aspect of the Eagle
eagle.description: I can see up to 1 mile away perfectly; No disadvantage on Perception from dim light

wolf.name: Aspect of the Wolf
wolf.description: I can track while traveling at a fast pace; I can move stealthily at a normal pace

_optionalChoices.name: Aspect of the Elk
_optionalChoices.description:
While mounted or on foot and not incapacitated, my travel pace is doubled
   I can extend this benefit to up to ten companions, while they are within 60 ft of me

_optionalChoices.name: Aspect of the Tiger
_optionalChoices.description: I gain proficiency with two skills chosen from: Athletics, Acrobatics, Stealth, or Survival
_optionalChoices.skillstxt: Choose two from Athletics, Acrobatics, Stealth, and Survival

subclassfeature10.name: Spirit Walker
subclassfeature10.description: I can cast Commune with Nature as a ritual

commune with nature.changes: I can cast this spell only as a ritual, thus its casting time is 10 minutes longer.

subclassfeature14.name: Totemic Attunement
subclassfeature14.description: Choose Bear, Eagle, Elk, Wolf, or Tiger Attunement using the "Choose Feature" button

bear.name: Bear Attunement
bear.description:
While raging, any creature that sees me within 5 ft has disadv. on attacks vs. others
   Enemies that can't perceive me or be frightened are immune

eagle.name: Eagle Attunement
eagle.description: While raging, I can fly at my current speed, but I can only stay aloft during my turn

wolf.name: Wolf Attunement
wolf.description: If my melee attack hits while raging, I can knock prone as a bonus action (up to Large)

_optionalChoices.name: Elk Attunement
_optionalChoices.description:
As a bonus action while raging, I can move through a Large or smaller creature's space
   It must make a Strength save of DC 8 + Strength modifier + Proficiency bonus
   If failed, it is knocked prone and takes 1d12 + Strength modifier bludgeoning damage

_optionalChoices.name: Tiger Attunement
_optionalChoices.description:
As a bonus action while raging, I can make a melee weapon attack on these conditions:
    • I move at least 20 ft in a straight line towards the target that is Large or smaller
    • I make a melee weapon attack against it after the bonus action

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature3.description: I gain proficiency with medium armor, shields, and martial weapons

subclassfeature3.1.name: Combat Inspiration
subclassfeature3.1.description:
My Bardic Inspiration can also be used to add the die to a weapon damage roll
   Alternatively, it can be used as a reaction to add the die to AC against one attack

subclassfeature14.name: Battle Magic
subclassfeature14.description: As a bonus action when I use my action to cast a bard spell, I can make a weapon attack

subclassfeature1.name: Blessings of Knowledge
subclassfeature1.description:
I learn two languages and gain proficiency and expertise with two skills
   I can choose from the following: Arcana, History, Nature, or Religion
subclassfeature1.skillstxt: Choose two from Arcana, History, Nature, and Religion. You also gain expertise with these skills

subclassfeature2.name: Channel Divinity: Knowledge of Ages
subclassfeature2.description: As an action, I gain proficiency with a chosen skill or tool for 10 minutes

subclassfeature6.name: Channel Divinity: Read Thoughts
subclassfeature6.description:
As an action, one creature within 60 ft I can see must make a Wisdom save
   If it fails, I can read its surface thoughts for 1 min, as long as it's within 60 ft of me
   As an action, I can end this and cast Suggestion on it (it fails its save automatically)
   If it succeeded on its save, I can't use this feature again on it until I finish a long rest

subclassfeature8.name: Potent Spellcasting
subclassfeature8.description: I add my Wisdom modifier to the damage I deal with my cleric cantrips

atkCalc: My cleric cantrips get my Wisdom modifier added to their damage.
spellAdd: My cleric cantrips get my Wisdom modifier added to their damage.

subclassfeature17.name: Visions of the Past
subclassfeature17.description:
I can see recent events of an object or area by concentrating and praying for 1 min
   I can meditate this way for up to a number of minutes equal to my Wisdom score
   • Object Reading (after meditating for 1 minute per owner):
      If an owner owned it in the last Wis score in days, I learn how that owner got/lost it
      I also learn the most recent significant event involving the object and the owner
   • Area Reading (my immediate surroundings, up to a 50-foot cube):
      Going back my Wisdom score in days, per minute I meditate, I learn about one event
      This starts with the most recent event; It can be significant or just important to me

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Cantrip
subclassfeature1.description: I learn the Light cantrip if I didn't already know it

subclassfeature1.1.name: Warding Flare
subclassfeature1.1.description:
When a creature within 30 ft attacks me and I can see it, I can interpose divine light
   As a reaction, I impose disadv. on the attacker's attack roll (unless it can't be blinded)

subclassfeature2.name: Channel Divinity: Radiance of the Dawn
subclassfeature2.description:
As an action, in 30 ft, magical darkness is dispelled and hostiles must make a Con save
   Each takes radiant damage, saves for half, and negates with total cover

subclassfeature6.name: Improved Flare
subclassfeature6.description: I can also use my Warding Flare if another is attacked by a creature within 30 ft of me

subclassfeature8.name: Potent Spellcasting
subclassfeature8.description: I add my Wisdom modifier to the damage I deal with my cleric cantrips

atkCalc: My cleric cantrips get my Wisdom modifier added to their damage.
spellAdd: My cleric cantrips get my Wisdom modifier added to their damage.

subclassfeature17.name: Corona of Light
subclassfeature17.description:
As an action, I have an aura of 60 ft sunlight and 30 ft dim light for 1 min
   Enemies in the sunlight have disadv. on saves vs. spells that deal fire or radiant damage

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature1.description: I gain proficiency with heavy armor

subclassfeature1.1.name: Acolyte of Nature
subclassfeature1.1.description: I learn a druid cantrip and proficiency with a skill: Animal Handling, Nature, Survival
subclassfeature1.1.skillstxt: Choose one from Animal Handling, Nature, or Survival

subclassfeature2.name: Channel Divinity: Charm Animals and Plants
subclassfeature2.description:
As an action, all beasts and plants within 30 ft that I can see must make a Wis save
   If failed, each is charmed and friendly to allies and me for 1 min or until damaged

subclassfeature6.name: Dampen Elements
subclassfeature6.description:
As a reaction, if an ally in 30 ft or I takes acid/cold/fire/lightning/thunder damage,
   I can grant resistance against that instance of damage

subclassfeature8.name: Divine Strike
subclassfeature8.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature with a weapon attack, I can do extra damage

atkAdd: Once per turn, I can have one of my weapon attacks that hit do extra cold, fire, or lightning damage (my choice).

subclassfeature17.name: Master of Nature
subclassfeature17.description: As a bonus action, I can command creatures that are charmed by my Channel Divinity

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature1.description: I gain proficiency with martial weapons and heavy armor

subclassfeature1.1.name: Wrath of the Storm
subclassfeature1.1.description:
As a reaction, when a creature I can see within 5 ft hits me, I can thunderously rebuke
   It takes 2d8 lightning or thunder damage (my choice) that a Dex save can halve

subclassfeature2.name: Channel Divinity: Destructive Wrath
subclassfeature2.description: Instead of rolling, I can do maximum damage when I do lightning or thunder damage

subclassfeature6.name: Thunderbolt Strike
subclassfeature6.description: When I deal lightning damage to a Large or smaller foe, I can push it up to 10 ft away

subclassfeature8.name: Divine Strike
subclassfeature8.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature with a weapon attack, I can do extra damage

atkAdd: Once per turn, I can have one of my weapon attacks that hit do extra thunder damage.

subclassfeature17.name: Stormborn
subclassfeature17.description: Whenever I'm not underground or indoors, I have a fly speed equal to my current speed

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature1.name: Blessing of the Trickster
subclassfeature1.description:
As an action, a willing creature I touch (not me) has adv. on Dex (Stealth) checks
   This lasts for 1 hour or until I use it again

subclassfeature2.name: Channel Divinity: Invoke Duplicity
subclassfeature2.description:
As an action, I create illusory duplicates of myself within 30 ft of me for 1 min (conc)
   As a bonus action, I can move them 30 ft to space(s) I can see within 120 ft of me
   I can cast spells as though I were in a duplicate's space, using my own senses
   I have advantage on attacks if the target is within 5 ft of a duplicate and me

subclassfeature6.name: Channel Divinity: Cloak of Shadows
subclassfeature6.description: As an action, I become invisible until the end of my next turn or I attack/cast a spell

subclassfeature8.name: Divine Strike
subclassfeature8.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature with a weapon attack, I can do extra damage

atkAdd: Once per turn, I can have one of my weapon attacks that hit do extra poison damage.

subclassfeature17.name: Improved Duplicity
subclassfeature17.description:
When I use Invoke Duplicity, I make four illusory duplicates instead of one
   I can move any number of the illusory duplicates as part of the same bonus action

subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature1.description: I gain proficiency with martial weapons and heavy armor

subclassfeature1.1.name: War Priest
subclassfeature1.1.description: When I use the Attack action, I can make a weapon attack as a bonus action

subclassfeature2.name: Channel Divinity: Guided Strike
subclassfeature2.description: When I make an attack roll, I can add a +10 bonus to the roll after seeing the d20 roll

subclassfeature6.name: Channel Divinity: War God's Blessing
subclassfeature6.description:
As a reaction, when a creature within 30 ft makes an attack roll, I can bless its attack
   The creature then adds a +10 bonus to the roll; I can do this after seeing the d20 roll

subclassfeature8.name: Divine Strike
subclassfeature8.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature with a weapon attack, I can do extra damage

atkAdd: Once per turn, I can have one of my weapon attacks that hit do extra damage.

subclassfeature17.name: Avatar of Battle
subclassfeature17.description: I have resistance to bludgeoning/piercing/slashing damage from nonmagical weapons

subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature2.name: Circle Forms
subclassfeature2.description: I am able to transform into more dangerous animal forms when using Wild Shape

subclassfeature2.wild shape.name: Wild Shape
subclassfeature2.wild shape.description:
As a bonus action, I assume the shape of a beast I have seen before with these rules:
    • I gain all its game statistics except Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma
    • I get its skill/saving throw prof. while keeping my own, using whichever is higher
    • I assume the beast's HP and HD; I get mine back when I revert back
    • I can't cast spells in beast form, but transforming doesn't break concentration
    • I retain features from class, race, etc., but I don't retain special senses
    • I can choose whether equipment falls to the ground, merges, or stays worn
    • I revert if out of time or unconscious; if KOd by damage, excess damage carries over

_optionalChoices.name: Wild Companion
_optionalChoices.description:
I can expend a use of wild shape to cast Find Familiar without material components
   The familiar always has the Fey type and disappears after half my druid level in hours

find familiar.description: Gain the services of a fey familiar; can see through its eyes; it can deliver touch spells; see B
find familiar.changes: By using my Wild Companion class feature, I can expend a use of wild shape to cast Find Familiar without material components. The familiar created this way always has the Fey type and disappears after a number of hours equal to half my druid level.

subclassfeature2.1.name: Combat Wild Shape
subclassfeature2.1.description:
As a bonus action while in Wild Shape, I can expend spell slots to heal myself
   I regain 1d8 HP per expended spell slot level; I can use Wild Shape as a bonus action

subclassfeature6.name: Primal Strike
subclassfeature6.description: My attacks count as magical while in Wild Shape

subclassfeature10.name: Elemental Wild Shape
subclassfeature10.description: I can transform into an air/earth/fire/water elemental by expending 2 Wild Shape uses

subclassfeature14.name: Thousand Forms
subclassfeature14.description: I can cast Alter Self at will without using a spell slot

subclassfeature3.name: Combat Superiority
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain superiority dice (SD) that I can use to fuel special Maneuvers
   One maneuver per attack. I regain all SD after a short rest

ambush.name: Ambush
ambush.description: When I make a Dexterity (Stealth) check or an Initiative roll, I can expend one Superiority Die and add the die to the roll, unless I have the Incapacitated condition.

bait and switch.name: Bait and Switch
bait and switch.description:
When I'm within 5 feet of a creature on my turn, I can expend one Superiority Die and switch places with that creature, provided I spend at least 5 feet of movement and the creature is willing and doesn't have the Incapacitated condition. This movement doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks.
   Roll the Superiority Die. Until the Start of my next turn, I or the other creature (my choice) gains a bonus to AC equal to the number rolled.

commander's strike.name: Commander's Strike
commander's strike.description: When I take the Attack action on my turn, I can replace one of my attacks to direct one of my companions to strike. When I do so, choose a willing creature who can see or hear I and expend one Superiority Die. That creature can immediately use its Reaction to make one attack with a weapon or an Unarmed Strike, adding the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll on a hit.

commanding presence.name: Commanding presence
commanding presence.description: When I make a Charisma (Intimidation, Performance, or Persuasion) check, I can expend one Superiority Die and add that die to the roll.

disarming attack.name: Disarming Attack
disarming attack.description: When I hit a creature with an attack roll, I can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to disarm the target. Add the Superiority Die roll to the attack's damage roll. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or drop one object of my choice that it's holding with the object landing in its space.

distracting strike.name: Distracting Strike
distracting strike.description: When I hit a creature with an attack roll, I can expend one Superiority Die to distract the target. Add the Superiority Die roll to the attack's damage roll. The next attack roll against the target by an attacker other than myself has Advantage if the attack is made before the start of my next turn.

evasive footwork.name: evasive footwork
evasive footwork.description: As a Bonus Action, I can expend one Superiority Die and take the Disengage action. I also roll the die and add the number rolled to my AC until the start of my next turn.

feinting attack.name: Feinting Attack
feinting attack.description: As a Bonus Action, I can expend one Superiority Die to feint, choosing one creature within 5 feet of me as my target. I have Advantage on my next attack roll against that target this turn. If that attack hits, add the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll.

goading attack.name: Goading Attack
goading attack.description: When I hit a creature with an attack roll, I can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to goad the target into attacking I. Add the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have Disadvantage on attack rolls against the targets other than I until the end of my next turn.

lunging attack.name: Lunging Attack
lunging attack.description: As a Bonus Action, I can expend one Superiority Die and take the Dash action. If I move at least 5 feet in a straight line immediately before hitting with a melee attack as part of the Attack action on this turn, I can add the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll.

maneuvering attack.name: Maneuvering Attack
maneuvering attack.description: When I hit a creature with an attack roll, I can expend one Superiority Die to maneuver one of my comrades into another position. Add the Superiority Die roll to the attack's damage roll, and choose a willing creature who can see or hear I. That creature can use its Reaction to move up to half its Speed without provoking an Opportunity Attack from the target of my attack.

menacing attack.name: Menacing Attack
menacing attack.description: When I hit a creature with an attack roll, I can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to frighten the target. Add the Superiority Due to the attack's damage roll. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Frightened condition until the end of my next turn.

parry.name: Parry
parry.description: When another creature damages I with a melee attack roll, I can take a Reaction and expend one Superiority Die to reduce the damage by the number I roll on my Superiority Die plus I Strength or Dexterity modifier (my choice).

precision attack.name: Precision Attack
precision attack.description: When I miss with an attack roll, I can expend one Superiority Die, roll that die, and add it to the attack roll, potentially causing the attack to hit.

pushing attack.name: Pushing Attack
pushing attack.description: When I hit a creature with an attack roll using a weapon or an Unarmed Strike, I can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to drive the target back. Add the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll. If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 15 feet directly away from I.

rally.name: Rally
rally.description: As a Bonus Action, I can expend one Superiority Die to bolster the resolve of a companion. Choose an ally within 30 feet of who can see or hear me. That creature gains Temporary Hit Points equal to the Superiority Die roll plus half my Fighter level (round down).

riposte.name: Riposte
riposte.description: When a creature misses me with a melee attack roll, I can take a Reaction and expend one Superiority Die to make a melee attack roll with a weapon or an Unarmed Strike against the creature. If I hit, add the Superiority Die to the attack's damage.

sweeping attack.name: Sweeping Attack
sweeping attack.description: When I hit a creature with a melee attack roll using a weapon or an Unarmed Strike, I can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to damage another creature. Choose another creature within 5 feet of the original target, within my reach. If the original attack roll would hit the second creature, it takes damage equal to the number I rolled on my Superiority Die. The damage is of the same type dealt by the original attack.

tactical assessment.name: Tactical Assessment
tactical assessment.description: When I make an Intelligence (History or Investigation) check or a Wisdom (Insight) check, I can expend one Superiority Die and add that die to the ability check.

trip attack.name: Trip Attack
trip attack.description: When I hit a creature with an attack roll using a weapon or an Unarmed Strike, I can expend one Superiority Die and add the die to the attack's damage roll. If the target is Large or smaller it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or have the Prone condition.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Student of War
skillstxt: I gain 1 additional Fighter skill of choice.
subclassfeature3.1.description: Gain proficiency with one level 1 Fighter skill and one artisan's tool set

subclassfeature7.name: Know Your Enemy
subclassfeature7.description:
As a Bonus Action, observe any Immunities/Resistances/Vulnerabilities of a creature within 30 ft
   I have 1 use per long rest unless I spend a SD (no action) to restore this feature

subclassfeature15.name: Relentless
subclassfeature15.description: When I use a maneuver, I can roll 1d8 once per turn instead of spending a SD

subclassfeature3.name: Spellcasting
subclassfeature3.description:
I can cast known wizard cantrips/spells, using Intelligence as my spellcasting ability
   When I gain a Fighter level, I can replace one spell. I can use an Arcane Focus

subclassfeature3.1.name: War Bond
subclassfeature3.1.description:
During a 1 hour ritual or short rest, I can bind one weapon I touch
   I can’t be disarmed of it unless I'm Incapacitated. I can summon it as a Bonus Action

subclassfeature7.name: War Magic
subclassfeature7.description: When I use my Attack action, I can replace an attack with a Wizard cantrip of 1 action

subclassfeature10.name: Eldritch Strike
subclassfeature10.description: On a weapon hit, the creature has disadv. on my spell save until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature15.name: Arcane Charge
subclassfeature15.description:
When I use Action Surge, I can also teleport up to 30ft to an unoccupied space I see
   I can do so before or after the extra action

subclassfeature18.name: Improved War Magic
subclassfeature18.description:
When I use my Attack action on my turn, I can replace two of my attacks with a
   level 1 or 2 Wizard spell with the casting time of an action.

subclassfeature3.name: Disciple of the Elements
subclassfeature3.description:
I know Elemental Attunement and additional Elemental Disciplines, depending on level
   Use the "Choose Feature" button above to add Elemental Disciplines to the third page
   From 5th level onward, I can use additional ki points to increase their spell slot level
   I can trade known Elemental Disciplines for others when I gain new ones
extrachoices: Clench of the North Wind (prereq: level 6 monk)
Flames of the Phoenix (prereq: level 11 monk)
Gong of the Summit (prereq: level 6 monk)
River of Hungry Flame (prereq: level 17 monk)
Wave of Rolling Earth (prereq: level 17 monk)

elemental attunement.name: Elemental Attunement
elemental attunement.description:
As an action, I can briefly control elemental forces within 30 ft of me
   I can make a harmless sensory effect, light/snuff light, chill/warm 1 lb for 1 hour,
   or I cause earth/fire/water/mist in a 1 ft cube to shape itself into a form for 1 minute

breath of winter (prereq: level 17 monk).name: Breath of Winter
breath of winter (prereq: level 17 monk).description:
[6 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Cone of Cold without material components

cone of cold.changes: With the Breath of Winter discipline, I can cast Cone of Cold without a material component.

clench of the north wind (prereq: level.name: Clench of the North Wind
clench of the north wind (prereq: level.description:
[3 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Hold Person without material components

hold person.changes: With the Clench of the North Wind discipline, I can cast Hold Person without a material component.

eternal mountain defense (prereq: level.name: Eternal Mountain Defense
eternal mountain defense (prereq: level.description:
[5 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Stoneskin on myself without material components

stoneskin.description: I gain resistance to nonmagical Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage
stoneskin.changes: With the Eternal Mountain Defense discipline, I can cast Stoneskin without a material component but only on myself.

fangs of the fire snake.name: Fangs of the Fire Snake
fangs of the fire snake.description:
[1 ki point]
   With Attack action, my unarmed strikes +10 ft reach and deal fire damage this turn
   Also, I can spent an additional 1 ki point to cause an attack to deal +1d10 fire damage

atkAdd.body: function(e,a){"unarmed strike"==a.baseWeaponName&&/^(?=.*fire)(?=.*snake).*$/i.test(a.WeaponTextName)&&(e.Description+=(e.Description?"; ":"")+"After hit, spend 1 ki point for +1d10 fire damage",e.Range="Melee (15 ft reach)",e.Damage_Type="fire")}

atkAdd: If I include the words 'Fire Snake' in the name of an unarmed strike, it gets +10 ft reach, does fire damage, and gains the option to deal +1d10 fire damage by spending 1 additional ki point.

fist of four thunders.name: Fist of Four Thunders
fist of four thunders.description:
[2 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Thunderwave

thunderwave.changes: With the Fist of Four Thunders discipline, I can cast Thunderwave.

fist of unbroken air.name: Fist of Unbroken Air
fist of unbroken air.description:
[2 ki points; +1d10/extra ki point]
   As an action, target within 30 ft takes 3d10 bludgeoning damage (spend ki for more)
   It is also pushed up to 20 ft away from me and knocked prone
   It can make a Strength save to halve damage and avoid being pushed and knocked prone

flames of the phoenix (prereq: level 11.name: Flames of the Phoenix
flames of the phoenix (prereq: level 11.description:
[4 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Fireball without material components

fireball.changes: With the Flames of the Phoenix discipline, I can cast Fireball without a material component.

gong of the summit (prereq: level 6 monk.name: Gong of the Summit
gong of the summit (prereq: level 6 monk.description:
[3 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Shatter without material components

shatter.changes: With the Gong of the Summit discipline, I can cast Shatter without a material component.

mist stance (prereq: level 11 monk).name: Mist Stance
mist stance (prereq: level 11 monk).description:
[4 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Gaseous Form on myself without material components

gaseous form.description: I turn into a misty cloud with fly 10 ft, resist. to nonmagical dmg, adv. on Str/Dex/saves
gaseous form.changes: With the Mist Stance discipline, I can cast Gaseous Form without a material component, but only on myself.

ride the wind (prereq: level 11 monk).name: Ride the Wind
ride the wind (prereq: level 11 monk).description:
[4 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Fly on myself without material components

fly.changes: With the Ride the Wind discipline, I can cast Fly without a material component but only on myself.

river of hungry flame (prereq: level 17.name: River of Hungry Flame
river of hungry flame (prereq: level 17.description:
[5 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Wall of Fire without material components

wall of fire.changes: With the River of Hungry Flame discipline, I can cast Wall of Fire without a material component.

rush of the gale spirits.name: Rush of the Gale Spirits
rush of the gale spirits.description:
[2 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Gust of Wind without material components

gust of wind.changes: With the Rush of the Gale Spirits discipline, I can cast Gust of Wind without a material component.

shape the flowing river.name: Shape the Flowing River
shape the flowing river.description:
[1 ki point]
   As an action, I can affect ice/water up to a 30-foot cube within 120 ft
   I can switch it between water/ice states and reshape ice up to half its largest dimension

sweeping cinder strike.name: Sweeping Cinder Strike
sweeping cinder strike.description:
[2 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Burning Hands

burning hands.changes: With the Sweeping Cinder Strike discipline, I can cast Burning Hands.

water whip.name: Water Whip
water whip.description:
[2 ki points; +1d10/extra ki point]
   As an action, a creature within 30 ft takes 3d10 bludgeoning damage (spend ki for more)
   It is also knocked prone or pulled up to 25 ft closer to me (my choice)
   It can make a Dexterity save to halve damage and avoid being pulled or knocked prone

wave of rolling earth (prereq: level 17.name: Wave of Rolling Earth
wave of rolling earth (prereq: level 17.description:
[6 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Wall of Stone without material components

wall of stone.changes: With the Wave of Rolling Earth discipline, I can cast Wall of Stone without a material component.

subclassfeature3.name: Shadow Arts
subclassfeature3.description: I know the Minor Illusion cantrip and can cast certain spells by using ki (see page 3)

shadow spells.name: Shadow Spells
shadow spells.description:
[2 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Darkness, Darkvision, Pass Without Trace, or Silence
   I don't require spell slots or material components to cast these spells like this, just ki points

darkness.changes: Spell cast with my Shadow Arts don't require material components.

darkvision.changes: Spell cast with my Shadow Arts don't require material components.

pass without trace.changes: Spell cast with my Shadow Arts don't require material components.

subclassfeature6.name: Shadow Step
subclassfeature6.description:
As a bonus action, I can teleport from and into dim light or darkness within 60 ft
   After I do this, I have adv. on the next melee attack I make before the end of my turn

subclassfeature11.name: Cloak of Shadows
subclassfeature11.description: As an action, I can become invisible in dim light or darkness until I attack/cast

subclassfeature17.name: Opportunist
subclassfeature17.description: As a reaction, if a creature in 5 ft is hit by another, I can make a melee attack vs. it

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Nature's Wrath
subclassfeature3.description:
As an action, a creature I can see within 10 ft must make a Str/Dex save (its choice)
   If it fails this save, it is restrained until it succeeds on a save at the end of its turn

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Turn the Faithless
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As an action, all fey/fiends within 30 ft that can hear me must make a Wisdom save
   If one fails, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes damage and must show true form
   Turned: move away, never within 30 ft of me, no reactions or actions other than Dash
   Turned: may Dodge instead of Dash when nowhere to move and unable to escape bonds

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of Warding
subclassfeature7.description: Allies within range and I have resistance to damage from spells

subclassfeature15.name: Undying Sentinel
subclassfeature15.description:
If dropped to 0 hit points and not killed outright, I can choose to stay at 1 hit point
   Additionally, I suffer no drawbacks of old age and can't be aged magically

subclassfeature20.name: Elder Champion
subclassfeature20.description:
As an action, I assume the form of a force of nature for 1 minute and gain benefits:
    • At the start of each of my turns, I regain 10 hit points
    • I can cast paladin spells with a casting time of 1 action as a bonus action instead
    • Enemies within 10 ft have disadv. on saves vs. my paladin spells and channel divinity

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Abjure Enemy
subclassfeature3.description:
As an action, one creature within 60 ft that I can see me must make a Wisdom save
   If failed, it is frightened and its speed is 0 despite bonuses; if success, its speed is halved
   This lasts for 1 minute or until it takes damage; Undead/fiends have disadv. on save

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Vow of Enmity
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, I utter a vow against a creature I can see within 10 ft
   I get adv. on attacks against it for 1 minute or until it drops to 0 HP or falls unconscious

subclassfeature7.name: Relentless Avenger
subclassfeature7.description:
After I hit with an opportunity attack, I can move 1/2 my speed in the same reaction
   This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks

subclassfeature15.name: Soul of Vengeance
subclassfeature15.description:
When an enemy I have an active Vow of Enmity against makes an attack, I can react
   As a reaction, I can make a melee weapon attack against it if it is within range

subclassfeature20.name: Avenging Angel
subclassfeature20.description:
As an action, I gain a flying speed of 60 ft and a 30 ft aura of menace for 1 hour
   When a creature first enters or starts its turn in the aura, it must make a Wis save
   If failed, for 1 min or until it takes damage, it is frightened and attacks vs. it have adv.

subclassfeature3.name: Primal Companion

subclassfeature7.name: Exceptional Training
subclassfeature7.description:
When I command my beast to take an action, I can also have it Dash/Disengage/Dodge/Help as a bonus action.
   My Primal Companion's attacks count can deal Force damage or its normal damage type.

subclassfeature11.name: Bestial Fury
subclassfeature11.description:
When I command my Primal Companion to use the Attack action, it can attack twice.
   My Primal Companion deals extra Force damage to my Hunter's Mark target.
   This occurs only the 1st time, each turn, the Primal Companion hits a creature.

subclassfeature15.name: Share Spells
subclassfeature15.description: When I cast a spell on myself, I can have it also affect my Primal Companion, if within 30 ft

subclassfeature3.name: Spellcasting
subclassfeature3.description:
I can cast prepared level 1+ Wizard spells using Int as my spellcasting ability.
   I can use an Arcane Focus as a spellcasting focus for my spells.
   I can change one prepared spell and one cantrip when I gain a Rogue level.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Mage Hand Legerdemain

mage hand.description: Invisible Spectral hand does simple task and can make Dex (Sleight of Hand) checks in 30ft; carries up to 10 lb; 1 bns to control again; only 1 instance
mage hand.changes: My Mage Hand Legerdemain class feature expands my use of the Mage Hand cantrip and makes the spectral hand invisible.

subclassfeature3.1.description:
I can cast Mage Hand as a Bonus Action, and make the spectral hand Invisible.
   I can control it as a Bonus Action, and through it can make Dex (Sleight of Hand) checks.

subclassfeature9.name: Magical Ambush
subclassfeature9.description: If I'm Invisible when I cast a spell on a creature it has Disadv on saving throws against the spell on the same turn.

subclassfeature13.name: Versatile Trickster
subclassfeature13.description: I can use Mage Hand to use the Trip option of my Cunning Strike on a creature within 5ft of the hand when I use it on another creature.

subclassfeature17.name: Spell Thief
subclassfeature17.description:
Once per long rest as a reaction I can force a creature to make an Int save (my spell save DC) after it casts a spell that targets me.
   On a failed save the spell is negated and stolen if it's level 1+ and of a level I can cast.
   I have it prepared and the creature can't cast it for the next 8 hours.

subclassfeature3.name: Assassinate
subclassfeature3.description:
Initiative: I have Advantage on Initiative rolls.
   Surprising Strikes: During the first round of combat:
   I have Advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn yet.
   If my Sneak Attack hits it does extra damage (my Rogue level) of the weapon's type.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Assassin's Tools
subclassfeature3.1.description: I gain a Disguise Kit and a Poisoner's Kit, and I have proficiency with them.

subclassfeature9.name: Infiltration Expertise
subclassfeature9.description:
Masterful Mimicry: After 1 hour of study I can mimic another person's speech, handwriting, or both.
   Roving Aim: My Speed isn't reduced to 0 by using Steady Aim.

subclassfeature13.name: Envenom Weapons
subclassfeature13.description: Targets of the Poison option of my Cunning Strike also take 2d6 Poison damage on a failed save.

subclassfeature17.name: Death Strike
subclassfeature17.description: When I hit with my Sneak Attack on the first round of combat, the target must succeed on a Con save or take double damage.

subclassfeature3.name: Wild Magic Surge
subclassfeature3.description: Once per turn, I can roll 1d20 when I cast a Sorcerer spell with a spell slot. On a 20, I roll on the Wild Magic Surge (WMS) table (See page 3). Spells from the table are unaffected by my Metamagic.

toNotesPage.name: Wild Magic Surge
note:
1d100	Effect
01-04	Roll on this table at the start of each of my turns for the next minute, 
	ignoring this result on subsequent rolls.
05-08	A creature that is Friendly toward me appears in a random unoccupied 
	space within 60 feet of me. The creature is under the DM's control and 
	disappears 1 minute later. Roll 1d4 to determine the creature, on a 1. 
	a Modrone Duodrone appears, on a 2. a Flumph appears, on a 3. a 
	Modrone Monodrone appears, on a 4. a Unicorn appears. See the 
	Monster Manual for the creature's stat block.
09-12	For the next minute, I regain 5 Hit Points at the start of each of my 
	turns.
13-16	Creatures have Disadvantage on saving throws against the next spell 
	I cast in the next minute that involves a saving throw.
17-20	I am subjected to an effect that lasts for 1 minute unless its 
	description says otherwise. Roll 1d8 to determine the effect, on a 1. 
	I'm surrounded by faint, ethereal music only myself and creatures within 5 
	feet of me can hear, on a 2. my size increases by one size category, on 
	a 3. I grow a long beard made of feathers that remains until I sneeze 
	at which point the feathers explode from my face and vanish, on a 4. I 
	must shout when I speak, on a 5. illusory butterflies flutter in the air 
	within 10 feet of me, on a 6. An eye appears on my forehead granting 
	me advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks, on a 7. Pink bubbles 
	float out of my mouth whenever I speak, on an 8. my skin turns a 
	vibrant shade of blue for 24 hours or until the effect is ended by a 
	Remove Curse spell.
21-24	For the next minute, all my spells with a casting time of an action have 
	a casting time of a Bonus Action.
25-28	I am transported to the Astral Plane until the end of my next turn. I 
	then return to the space I previously occupied or the nearest 
	unoccupied space if that space is occupied.
29-32	The next time I cast a spell that deals damage within the next minute, 
	don't roll the spell's damage dice for the damage, instead use the 
	highest number possible for each damage die.
33-36	I have Resistance to all damage for the next minute.
37-40	I turn into a potted plant until the start of my next turn. While I'm a 
	plant, I have the Incapacitated condition and have Vulnerability to all 
	damage. If I drop to 0 Hit Points, my pot breaks and my form reverts.
45-48	Myself and up to three creatures I choose within 30 feet of I have the 
	invisible condition for 1 minute. This invisibility ends on a creature 
	immediately after it makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a 
	spell.
49-52	A spectral shield hovers near me for the next minute, granting me a 
	+2 bonus to AC and immunity to Magic Missile.
53-56	I can take one extra action on this turn.
57-60	I cast a random spell, if the spell normally requires Concentration it 
	doesn't require Concentration in this case the spell lasts for its full 
	duration. Roll 1d10 to determine the spell; on a 1. Confusion, on a 2. 
	Fireball, on a 3. Fog Cloud, on a 4. Fly (cast on a random creature 
	within 60 feet of me), on a 5 Grease, on a 6. Levitate (cast on myself), 
	on a 7. Magic Missile (cast as a level 5 spell), on an 8. Mirror Image, on 
	a 9. Polymorph (cast on myself), and if I fail the saving throw I turn 
	into a Goat (see appendix B), on a 10. See Invisibility.
61-64	For the next minute, any flammable, non-magical object I touch that 
	isn't being worn or carried by another creature bursts into flame, takes 
	1d4 Fire damage, and is burning.
65-68	If I die within the next hour, I immediately revive as if by the 
	Reincarnate spell.
69-72	I have the Frightened condition until the end of my next turn. The DM 
	determines the source of my fear.
73-76	I teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space I can see.
77-80	A random creature within 60 feet of me has the poisoned condition for 
	1d4 hours.
81-84	I radiate Bright Light in a 30-foot radius for the next minute. Any 
	creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of me has the Blinded condition 
	until the end of its next turn.
85-88	Up to three creatures of my choice that I can see within 30 feet of me 
	take 1d10 Necrotic damage, I regain Hit Points equal to the sum of 
	the Necrotic damage dealt.
89-92	Up to three creatures of my choice I can see within 30 feet of me take 
	4d10 Lightning damage.
93-96	Me and all creatures within 30 feet of me have Vulnerability to Piercing 
	damage for the next minute.
97-00	Roll 1d6; On a 1. I regain 2d10 Hit Points, on a 2. One ally of my 
	choice within 300 feet of me regains 2d10 Hit Points, on a 3. I regain 
	my lowest-level expended spell slot, on a 4. One ally of my choice 
	within 300 feet of me regains their lowest-level expended 
	spell slot, on a 5. I regain all my expended Sorcery Points, on a 6. All 
	the effects of row 17-20 affect I simultaneously.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Tides of Chaos
subclassfeature3.1.description: I can gain Adv on one D20 Test before I roll. If I cast a Sorcerer spell with a spell slot before a Long Rest I must roll on the WMS table, but regain this feature.

subclassfeature6.name: Bend Luck
subclassfeature6.description: As a reaction, I can add/subtract 1d4 from another's attack roll, ability check, or save for 1 SP.

subclassfeature14.name: Controlled Chaos
subclassfeature14.description: When I roll on the Wild Magic Surge table I can roll twice and use either number.

subclassfeature18.name: Tamed Surge
subclassfeature18.description: Once per Long Rest, after I cast a Sorcerer spell with a spell slot, I can choose an effect from the WMS table (except the final row). If it involves a roll I must make it.

subclassfeature3.name: Steps of the Fey
subclassfeature3.description: I can cast Misty Step w/out a spell slot (min once) per Long Rest and can imbue it with one option from the Steps of the Fey feature, (see notes page).

refreshing step.name: Refreshing Step
refreshing step.description: After I teleport, one creature I can see w/in 10 ft or I gain 1d10 Temp HP.

taunting step.name: Taunting Step
taunting step.description: Creatures w/in 5 ft of the space I left must pass a Wis save or have Disadv on attack rolls against creatures other than me until the start of my next turn.

subclassfeature6.name: Misty Escape
subclassfeature6.description: As a reaction when I take damage, I can cast Misty Step, and gain new options for my steps of the fey feature (see notes page).

disappearing step.name: Disappearing Step
disappearing step.description: I'm Invisible until the start of my next turn or I attack, deal damage, or cast a spell.

dreadful step.name: Dreadful Step
dreadful step.description: Creatures within 5 ft of the space I left OR I appear in must pass a Wis save or take 2d10 Psych damage.

subclassfeature10.name: Beguiling Defenses
subclassfeature10.description: Once per Long Rest as a reaction, after a creature I can see hits me with an attack roll I can reduce the damage by half & force the attacker to pass a Wis save or take equal Psych damage. I'm also immune to being Charmed.

subclassfeature14.name: Bewitching Magic
subclassfeature14.description: Right after I cast an Ench or Illus spell with an action + spell slot, I can cast Misty Step as part of the same action and without spending a spell slot.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Awakened Mind
subclassfeature3.description: As a Bonus Action, one creature I can see within 30 ft & I can speak telepathically with each other while within my Cha mod miles (min 1) for my Warlock level minutes as long as we share a language. It lasts until I use it with another creature.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Psychic Spells
subclassfeature3.1.description: When I cast a Warlock spell that deals damage I can change to Psych damage. When I cast Ench or Illus Warlock spells I can forgo Verbal or Somatic components.

subclassfeature6.name: Clairvoyant Combatant
subclassfeature6.description: When I use Awakened Mind, I can force the creature to pass a Wis save or it has Disadv on attack rolls against me & I have Adv on attack rolls against it for the duration. This Feature can be used 1/LR unless I expend a Warlock SS to regain use of it.

subclassfeature10.name: Eldritch Hex
subclassfeature10.description: I always have Hex prepared. When I cast it and choose an Ability the target also has Disadv on those saves for the spell's duration.

subclassfeature10.1.name: Thought Shield
subclassfeature10.1.description: My thoughts can't be read unless I allow it. I'm Resistant to Psych damage, and any creature that deals Psychic damage to me takes equal damage.

subclassfeature14.name: Create Thrall
subclassfeature14.description:
Summon Aberration can not require Concentration; That casting lasts 1 min and the Aberration has Temp HP (my Warlock level + Cha mod).
   The first time each turn the Aberration hits a creature under my Hex it deals extra Psych damage equal to the bonus damage of that spell.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature2.name: Abjuration Savant
subclassfeature2.description: I halve the gp and time needed to copy abjuration spells into my spellbook

subclassfeature2.1.name: Arcane Ward
subclassfeature2.1.description:
Whenever I cast an 1st-level or higher abjuration spell, I make/heal a ward
   I make it at max HP; When I cast again, it heals two HP per spell level
   It stays active at 0 HP and doesn't go away until my next long rest
   If I take damage, the ward takes the damage instead, but excess damage carries over

subclassfeature6.name: Projected Ward
subclassfeature6.description: As a reaction, my Arcane Ward can absorb damage done to a creature within 30 ft

subclassfeature10.name: Improved Abjuration
subclassfeature10.description: When I cast an abjuration spell requiring an ability check, I add my proficiency bonus

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){var n,i,o,s;if("dispel magic"===e||"counterspell"===e)return e=Number(How("Proficiency Bonus")),n="("+AbilityScores.names.join("|")+"|spell(casting)?( ability )?) check",o=e,(i=RegExp(n+" \\(([+-]?\\d+)\\)","i")).test(a.description)?(s=a.description.match(i),o+=Number(s[2]),1===tDoc.getField("Remarkable Athlete").isBoxChecked(0)&&s[1].test(/Str|Dex|Con/i)?o-=Math.ceil(e/2):1===tDoc.getField("Jack of All Trades").isBoxChecked(0)&&(o-=Math.floor(e/2))):s=a.description.match(RegExp(n,"i")),a.description=a.description.replace(s[0],s[1]+" check ("+(0<=o?"+":"")+o+")"),!0}

spellAdd: I add my proficiency bonus to ability checks required by abjuration spells. This is shown on the spell sheet by a lowered DC or higher bonus on the check.

subclassfeature14.name: Spell Resistance
subclassfeature14.description: I have adv. on spell saves and resistance to damaging spells

subclassfeature2.name: Conjuration Savant
subclassfeature2.description: I halve the gp and time needed to copy conjuration spells into my spellbook

subclassfeature2.1.name: Minor Conjuration
subclassfeature2.1.description:
As an action, I can conjure an object up to 3 ft on each side and no more than 10 lbs
   It must be of a form of a nonmagical object I have seen and is created within 10 ft
   The object disappears after 1 hour, if it takes or deals damage, or when I use this again

subclassfeature6.name: Benign Transposition
subclassfeature6.description:
As an action, I can teleport to a place within 30 ft that I can see
   Instead, I can swap places with a willing Small/Medium creature in 30 ft that I can see
   I can do this again after a long rest or casting a 1st-level or higher conjuration spell

subclassfeature10.name: Focused Conjuration
subclassfeature10.description: While I am concentrating on a conjuration spell, it can't be broken by taking damage

subclassfeature14.name: Durable Summons
subclassfeature14.description: Any creature I summon or create with a conjuration spell has 30 temporary hit points

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){return-1===e.indexOf("conjure")||/barrage|volley|knowbot/i.test(e)?/find (greater )?(steed|familiar)/i.test(e)?(a.description=a.description.replace(/Gain the services of a ([^;]+)/i,"A $1 (+30 temp hp)"),!0):void 0:(a.description=a.description.replace(/verbal commands/i,"command").replace(/^summon /i,"")+"; +30 temp hp",!0)}

spellAdd: Any creature I summon or create with a conjuration spell gains 30 temporary hit points.

subclassfeature2.name: Divination Savant
subclassfeature2.description: I halve the gp and time needed to copy divination spells into my spellbook

subclassfeature2.1.name: Portent
subclassfeature2.1.description:
After a long rest, I roll dice and keep the results to be used before my next long rest
   A result can replace an attack/save/ability check made by me or a creature I can see
   I choose to switch them before the dice to be replaced are rolled; Max once per turn

subclassfeature6.name: Expert Divination
subclassfeature6.description: When I cast a divination spell, I recover a spell slot of a lower level than the one I cast

subclassfeature10.name: The Third Eye
subclassfeature10.description:
As an action, I gain one of the following until my next short or long rest:
   Darkvision 60ft, see the Ethereal Plane 60ft, read any language, or see invisibility 10ft
