subclassfeature14.name: Greater Portent
subclassfeature14.description: I can roll 3d20 instead of 2d20 when using my Portent feature

subclassfeature2.name: Enchantment Savant
subclassfeature2.description: I halve the gp and time needed to copy enchantment spells into my spellbook

subclassfeature2.1.name: Hypnotic Gaze
subclassfeature2.1.description:
As an action, a seen enemy within 5 ft must make a Wis save or be charmed
   This doesn't work if it can't see/hear me; It's also incapacitated and reduced to 0 speed
   This lasts until the end of my next turn, but I can use an action to extend the duration
   It also ends if it takes damage, can't see or hear me, or is more than 5 ft from me
   On success or once it ends, I can't use this on it again until after a long rest

subclassfeature6.name: Instinctive Charm
subclassfeature6.description:
As a reaction, when someone I can see in 30 ft attacks me, it must make a Wis save
   If failed, it must instead attack the closest creature within range (not me or self)
   On a success, the target is immune to this until after my long rest; This is a charm effect

subclassfeature10.name: Split Enchantment
subclassfeature10.description:
When I cast an enchantment spell with only one target, I can target a second in range
   This does not apply to cantrips

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){if(!a.psionic&&a.level&&"Ench"===a.school){var n=a.description;switch(e){case"animal messenger":a.description=a.description.replace("Tiny beast delivers","2 tiny beasts deliver single");break;case"antipathy/sympathy":a.description=a.description.replace("Creature,","2 crea, 1");break;case"heroism":case"command":a.description=a.description.replace(/, halt| as spell lasts/i,"");default:a.description=a.description.replace("1+1/SL","2 or 1+1/SL").replace(/1 (crea(ture)?|beast|humanoid)/i,"2 $1s").replace(/creas\b/gi,"crea")}return n!==a.description}}

spellAdd: My enchantment, single-target 1st-level or higher spells can affect two targets instead of only one.

subclassfeature14.name: Alter Memories
subclassfeature14.description:
When I cast an enchantment spell that charms, I can have one target be unaware of it
   Also, once before that spell ends, I can have that target forget time while affected
   It must make an Intelligence save or lose up to 1 + Charisma modifier hours of memory

subclassfeature2.name: Illusion Savant
subclassfeature2.description: I halve the gp and time needed to copy illusion spells into my spellbook

subclassfeature2.1.name: Improved Minor Illusion
subclassfeature2.1.description:
I gain the knowledge of the Minor Illusion cantrip (or another if I already knew it)
   When I cast it, I can create both a sound and an image with a single casting

minor illusion.description: 5-ft cube illusion includes visible and audible; Int(Investigation) check vs. Spell DC; see book
minor illusion.changes: My Improved Minor Illusion class feature allows me to make both a sound and an image with a single casting.

subclassfeature6.name: Malleable Illusion
subclassfeature6.description: After I cast an illusion spell that lasts 1 min or longer, I can use an action to change it

subclassfeature10.name: Illusory Self
subclassfeature10.description: As a reaction, when I'm attacked, I can impose an illusion that makes the attack miss

subclassfeature14.name: Illusory Reality
subclassfeature14.description:
As a bonus action, after I cast a 1st-level or higher illusion spell, I can make it real
   One inanimate, nonmagical object that is part of the illusion becomes real for 1 minute
   The object can't be something that directly harms someone

subclassfeature2.name: Necromancy Savant
subclassfeature2.description: I halve the gp and time needed to copy necromancy spells into my spellbook

subclassfeature2.1.name: Grim Harvest
subclassfeature2.1.description:
Once per turn, when I kill something with a 1st-level or higher spell, I regain hit points
   The number of hit points regained is 2× the spell's level (or 3× with necromancy spells)
   This doesn't occur for constructs/undead

subclassfeature6.name: Undead Thralls
subclassfeature6.description:
I add Animate Dead to my spellbook and can have an additional target when casting it
   Undead created by my necromancy spells have the following benefits:
   They add my proficiency bonus to damage and my wizard level to their HP maximums

animate dead.description: Turn corpses into 2+2/SL Skeletons or Zombies; control for 24h; bns a command within 60 ft
animate dead.changes: My Undead Thralls class feature allows me to animate one more corpse than normal with Animate Dead.

subclassfeature10.name: Inured to Undead
subclassfeature10.description: I have resistance to necrotic damage and my hit point maximum can't be reduced

subclassfeature14.name: Command Undead
subclassfeature14.description:
As an action, an undead within 60 ft that I can see must make a Charisma save
   If its Int is > 7, it has adv. on the save; If its Int is > 11, it repeats the save every hour
   If failed, it becomes friendly to me and obeys my commands until I use this on another
   On success, it becomes permanently immune to my further attempts

subclassfeature2.name: Transmutation Savant
subclassfeature2.description: I halve the gp and time needed to copy transmutation spells into my spellbook

subclassfeature2.1.name: Minor Alchemy
subclassfeature2.1.description:
I can transform an object of wood/stone/iron/copper/silver into another of those
   For each 10 min I spend, I can transform up to 1 cubic foot of the material
   It reverts back when I lose concentration or after 1 hour

subclassfeature6.name: Transmuter's Stone
subclassfeature6.description:
In 8 hours, I can create a transmuter's stone that gives its wielder one of the following:
    • Darkvision 60 ft
    • 10 ft increase to speed while unencumbered
    • Proficiency in Constitution saving throws
    • Resistance to either acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage
   The benefit is chosen at creation; I can have only one active stone at a time
   I can change the benefit when I cast a 1st-level or higher transmutation spell with it

subclassfeature10.name: Shapechanger
subclassfeature10.description:
I add Polymorph to my spellbook; I can cast it on myself without using a spell slot
   When I do that, I can only transform into a beast with a challenge rating of 1 or lower

polymorph.name: Polymorph (special)
polymorph.description: I transformed into a beast of my choice with a CR 1 or lower; see book
polymorph.changes: Using my Shapechanger class feature, I can cast Polymorph once per short rest without using a spell slot, but when I do so I can only cast it on myself and transform into a beast.

subclassfeature14.name: Master Transmuter
subclassfeature14.description:
As an action, I can destroy my transmuter's stone and do one of the four following:
    1) Major Transformation
      In 10 minutes, I transmute one nonmagical object up to 5 cubic foot into another
      This new, nonmagical object must be of similar size and mass and equal or less value
    2) Panacea
      One touched has all curses, diseases, and poisons removed and is healed to max HP
    3) Restore Life
      I cast Raise Dead without using spell slots or needing to have it in my spellbook
    4) Restore Youth
      A touched creature's apparent age is reduced by 3d10 years (to a minimum of 13)

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature1.description: I gain proficiency with martial weapons

subclassfeature1.1.name: Reaper
subclassfeature1.1.description:
I learn one necromancy cantrip of my choice from any spell list
   My necromancy, single-target cantrips can affect two targets within 5 ft of each other

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){if("Necro"==a.school&&0===a.level){var n=a.description;switch(e){case"chill touch":a.description=a.description.replace("Spell attack","2 crea in 5 ft spell atk").replace("Necrotic","Necro.").replace("at CL 5, 11, and 17","CL 5/11/17");break;case"spare the dying":a.description=a.description.replace("1 living creature","1 living creature (or 2 within 5 ft of each other)");break;default:a.description=a.description.replace(/1 crea(ture)?/i,"2 crea in 5 ft").replace("disadvantage","disadv.").replace("save halves","save half")}return n!==a.description}}

spellAdd: My necromancy, single-target cantrips can affect two targets within 5 ft of each other.

subclassfeature2.name: Channel Divinity: Touch of Death
subclassfeature2.description: When I hit a creature with a melee attack, I can deal extra necrotic damage

subclassfeature6.name: Inescapable Destruction
subclassfeature6.description: When I deal necrotic damage with spells or Channel Divinity, I ignore resistance to it

subclassfeature8.name: Divine Strike
subclassfeature8.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature with a weapon attack, I can do extra damage

atkAdd: Once per turn, I can have one of my weapon attacks that hit do extra necrotic damage.

subclassfeature17.name: Improved Reaper
subclassfeature17.description:
If I cast a 5th-level or lower necromancy spell that has one target, I can target two
   They need to be within 5 ft of each other; I have to provide material comp. for both

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){if("Necro"==a.school&&a.level&&a.level<6){var n=a.description;switch(e){case"blindness/deafness":a.description="2 crea in 5 ft or "+a.description;break;case"contagion":case"inflict wounds":case"ray of enfeeblement":a.description=a.description.replace(/(Melee )?spell attack/i,"2 "+"$1".toLowerCase()+"spell atk in 5 ft").replace("spell ends","ends");break;case"cause fear":a.description="2 crea in 5 ft or 1+1/SL crea max 30 ft apart (no constr/undead), save or frightened; save end of turn";break;case"feign death":a.description="2 willing crea in 5 ft appear dead; Are blinded, incapacitated, dmg resist. all but Psychic, speed 0";break;case"gentle repose":a.description=a.description.replace("1 corpse protected from","2 corpses in 5 ft suffer no");break;case"raise dead":case"revivify":a.description=a.description.replace("a creature's body that has","body of 2 crea in 5 ft that").replace("cons.)","cons. ×2)"),a.compMaterial+=" (once for each target)";break;case"speak with dead":a.description=a.description.replace("1 corpse with mouth answers 5 questions","2 corpses in 5 ft answer 5 questions each");break;case"enervation":a.description=a.description.replace("action","1 a").replace("see book","see B");default:a.description=a.description.replace(/1 crea(ture)?/i,"2 crea in 5 ft").replace("disadvantage","disadv.").replace("save halves","save half")}return n!==a.description}}

spellAdd: My necromancy, single-target 5th-level or lower spells can affect two targets within 5 ft of each other if both are within range of the spell. The spells still require material components for each target separately.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Control Undead
subclassfeature3.description:
As an action, one undead (CR < paladin level) I can see in 30 ft must make a Wis save
   If failed, it must obey my commands for 24 hours or until I use this on another

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Dreadful Aspect
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As an action, anyone I choose within 30 ft that can see me must make a Wisdom save
   If failed, it is frightened for 1 min or until it succeeds a save at the end of its turns
   It can't save at the end of its turn if it's still within 30 ft of me

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of Hate
subclassfeature7.description:
Fiends/undead within range and I add my Cha mod as bonus on melee weapon damage
   Multiple Auras of Hate don't stack; only the strongest applies

atkAdd: I add my Charisma modifier to my melee weapon damage.

atkCalc.body: function(e,a,t){a.isMeleeWeapon&&(t.extraDmg+=Number(What("Cha Mod")))}

subclassfeature15.name: Supernatural Resistance
subclassfeature15.description: I have resistance to bludgeoning/piercing/slashing damage from nonmagical weapons

subclassfeature20.name: Dread Lord
subclassfeature20.description:
As an action, I gain a 30-ft aura of gloom that reduces bright light to dim for 1 min
   If frightened of me, foes starting their turn in the aura take 4d10 psychic damage
   Attacks vs. my allies and me inside the aura have disadvantage if attackers need sight
   As a bonus action, I can make a melee spell attack vs. a target inside the aura
   If this attack hits, it does 3d10 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage

subclassfeature3.name: Battlerager Armor
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain proficiency with spiked armor both as an armor and as a weapon
   As a bonus action while raging, I can attack once with my armor spikes
   With my spiked armor I do 3 piercing damage when I use my Attack action to grapple

weaponOptions.name: Armor spikes
weaponOptions.description: Does 3 piercing damage when grappling during my Attack action

subclassfeature6.name: Reckless Abandon
subclassfeature6.description: If I use Reckless Attack during rage, I also gain temporary HP equal to my Con mod

subclassfeature10.name: Battlerager Charge
subclassfeature10.description: As a bonus action while raging, I can use the Dash action

subclassfeature14.name: Spiked Retribution
subclassfeature14.description:
When I'm hit in melee by an attacker within 5 ft, it takes 3 piercing damage
   This only works while I'm wearing spiked armor, in rage, and I'm not incapacitated

subclassfeature1.name: Arcane Initiate
subclassfeature1.description: I gain proficiency with Arcana and two wizard cantrips that count as cleric cantrips

subclassfeature2.name: Channel Divinity: Arcane Abjuration
subclassfeature2.description:
As an action, one celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend within 30 ft must make a Wis save
   If it fails and is able to see/hear me, it is turned for 1 min or until it takes damage
   Turned: move away, never within 30 ft of me, no reactions or actions other than Dash
   Turned: may Dodge instead of Dash when nowhere to move and unable to escape bonds
   If its CR is low enough and it is not on its home plane, it is banished for 1 min instead
   Banished: sent to home plane, reappearing where it was if the effect ends before 1 min

subclassfeature6.name: Spell Breaker
subclassfeature6.description:
When I restore HP to an ally with a 1st-level or higher spell, I can also end one spell
   The chosen spell on the ally ends if it is equal or lower level to the spell slot level used

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){var n=a.description;switch(e){case"mass heal":a.description="Heal 700 hp, split over crea in range; also cures blindness, deafness, and all diseases; spell breaker";break;case"power word heal":a.description=a.description.replace(/heals all.*/i,"full hp; no longer charmed, frightened, paralyzed, stunned; can stand up as rea; spell breaker");break;case"goodberry":a.description=a.description.replace("Create ","").replace("lose potency after ","remain");case"regenerate":a.description=a.description.replace(" for rest of duration","");case"heal":a.description=a.description.replace("all diseases","diseases");case"cure wounds":case"healing word":case"life transference":case"mass cure wounds":case"mass healing word":case"prayer of healing":a.description=a.description.replace(/creatures?/i,"crea").replace("within","in").replace("spellcasting ability modifier","spellcasting ability mod")+"; spell breaker"}return n!==a.description}

spellAdd: When I cast a spell that restores hit points to another creature than myself, I can also end a spell affecting the target. This spell can be of the same level of the spell slot used to cast the healing spell, or lower.

subclassfeature8.name: Potent Spellcasting
subclassfeature8.description: I add my Wisdom modifier to the damage I deal with my cleric cantrips

atkCalc: My cleric cantrips get my Wisdom modifier added to their damage.
spellAdd: My cleric cantrips get my Wisdom modifier added to their damage.

subclassfeature17.name: Arcane Mastery
subclassfeature17.description:
I add four wizards spells, a 6th, 7th, 8th, and 9th-level spell, to my domain spells
   As any domain spell, these spells are automatically prepared and count as cleric spells

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Rallying Cry
subclassfeature3.description: When I use Second Wind, I also heal three allies within 60 ft that can see or hear me

subclassfeature7.name: Royal Envoy
subclassfeature7.description:
I gain proficiency with the Persuasion skill and I gain expertise with the Persuasion skill
   If already proficient, I can choose Animal Handling, Insight, Intimidation, or Performance
subclassfeature7.skillstxt: Persuasion proficiency and expertise; If already proficient, choose one from Animal Handling, Insight, Intimidation, or Performance

subclassfeature10.name: Inspiring Surge
subclassfeature10.description:
When I use my Action Surge, I can inspire an ally within 60 ft that can see or hear me
   The ally can then use its reaction to make one melee or ranged weapon attack

subclassfeature15.name: Bulwark
subclassfeature15.description:
When I use Indomitable to reroll a Int, Wis, or Cha save, I can extend it to an ally
   The ally can reroll its failed saving throw against the same effect and take the result
   It only works if not incapacitated and the ally is within 60 ft and can see or hear me

subclassfeature3.name: Touch of Death
subclassfeature3.description: If I reduce someone within 5 ft to 0 HP, I gain Wis mod + monk level temporary HP

subclassfeature6.name: Hour of Reaping
subclassfeature6.description:
As an action, all creatures within 30 feet of me must make a Wisdom saving throw
   On a failed save the creature is frightened until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature11.name: Mastery of Death
subclassfeature11.description: When I'm reduced to 0 HP, I can expend 1 ki point to have 1 HP instead

touch of the long death.name: Touch of the Long Death
touch of the long death.description:
[1-10 ki points]
   As an action, a target within 5 ft takes 2d10 necrotic damage per ki point I spent
   It can make a Constitution saving throw to half the damage

subclassfeature3.name: Radiant Sun Bolt
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain a ranged spell attack that I can use as an attack in the Attack action
   If I do this and spend 1 ki point, I can make 2 of these attacks as a bonus action

weaponOptions.name: Radiant Sun Bolt
weaponOptions.description: If used in an Attack action, spend 1 ki point to use it twice as a bonus action

searing arc strike.name: Searing Arc Strike
searing arc strike.description:
After taking the Attack action, I can cast Burning Hands as a bonus action [PHB 220]
   For every additional ki point I spend, Burning hands is cast at 1 higher spell level
   The maximum total ki points I can spend for this (including the 2) is half my Monk level

burning hands.description: 3d6+1d6/extra Ki Fire dmg; save halves; unattended flammable objects ignite (ki max 1/2 monk lvl)
burning hands.changes: After I use the Attack action, I can cast Burning Hands as a bonus action by spending 2 ki points. I can even spend additional ki points to increase its spell level. The total amount of ki points I can spend on it is half my monk level.

subclassfeature11.name: Searing Sunburst
subclassfeature11.description:
As an action, anyone in a 20-ft radius light on a point within 150 ft makes a Con save
   If failed and not behind opaque total cover, take 2d6 (+ 2d6/ki point) radiant damage

weaponOptions.name: Searing Sunburst
weaponOptions.description: All in 20-ft radius; Con save - success no damage; +2d6 damage per ki point (max 3 ki)

subclassfeature17.name: Sun Shield
subclassfeature17.description:
As a reaction, when I'm hit by a melee attack, I can deal 5 + Wis mod radiant damage
   I can only do this while my light aura is on; I can turn it on/off as a bonus action

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Champion Challenge
subclassfeature3.description:
As a bonus action, I can have any chosen creatures within 30 ft of me make a Wis save
   If failed, a target is unable to willingly move more than 30 ft away from me
   The effect ends if I'm incapacitated, die, or it is moved more than 30 ft away from me

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Turn the Tide
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, any chosen creatures within 30 ft that can hear me regains HP
   Each regain 1d6 + my Charisma modifier HP, up to half of its total HP

subclassfeature7.name: Divine Allegiance
subclassfeature7.description:
When a creature within 5 feet of me takes damage, I can substitute my HP for it
   The creature takes no damage and I take all of it; this damage can't be prevented

subclassfeature15.name: Unyielding Spirit
subclassfeature15.description: I have advantage on saving throws against effects that paralyze or stun

subclassfeature20.name: Exalted Champion
subclassfeature20.description:
As an action, I gain the following benefits for 1 hour or until I'm incapacitated:
    • Resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons
    • My allies within 30 ft of me and I have advantage on Wisdom and Death saves

subclassfeature3.name: Master of Intrigue
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain proficiency with disguise kits, forgery kits, one gaming set, and two languages
   I can mimic speech patterns and accents if I've heard them for at least 1 minute

subclassfeature3.1.name: Master of Tactics
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I can use the Help action as a bonus action
   This even works if the ally attacks a target within 30 ft of me that can see or hear me

subclassfeature9.name: Insightful Manipulator
subclassfeature9.description:
By spending 1 minute observing/interacting outside of combat I can learn capabilities
   The DM tells me if the target is my equal, superior, or inferior in regard to two things:
    - Intelligence score    - Wisdom score    - Charisma score    - Class levels (if any)

subclassfeature13.name: Misdirection
subclassfeature13.description:
As a reaction, I can redirect an attack meant for me to a creature within 5 ft of me
   This only works if the creature is providing me with cover against the attack

subclassfeature17.name: Soul of Deceit
subclassfeature17.description:
My thoughts can't be read by telepathy or similar means; I can project false thoughts
   For that, I must pass a Cha (Deception) vs. Wis (Insight) check to fool the mind reader
   Magic always determines I'm truthful; I can't be magically compelled to tell the truth

subclassfeature3.name: Fancy Footwork
subclassfeature3.description:
Enemies I make a melee attack against in my turn can't use opportunity attacks on me
   This lasts until the end of my current turn

subclassfeature3.1.name: Rakish Audacity
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I don't need advantage to sneak attack if my target is the only one within 5 ft of me
   I still can't sneak attack if I have disadv.; I add my Charisma modifier to initiative rolls

addMod.text: I can add my Charisma modifier to initiative rolls.

subclassfeature9.name: Panache
subclassfeature9.description:
As an action, I can beguile a creature that hears and understands me, for 1 minute
   It must succeed a Wis (Insight) check opposed by my Cha (Persuasion) or be affected as:
   • A hostile target gains disadv. on attacks and can't do opportunity attacks vs. not-me
     This effect ends if an ally attacks or casts a spell vs. it, or if it and I are 60 ft apart
   • Targets that are not hostile are charmed and regard me as a friendly acquaintance
     This effect ends if me or an ally do anything harmful to it

subclassfeature13.name: Elegant Maneuver
subclassfeature13.description: As a bonus action, I can gain adv. on my next Dex (Acrobatics) or Str (Athletics) check

subclassfeature17.name: Master Duelist
subclassfeature17.description: Once per short rest, when I miss with an attack roll, I can roll again with advantage

subclassfeature1.name: Wind Speaker
subclassfeature1.description: I can speak, read, and write Primordial (and its dialects Aquan, Auran, Ignan, Terran)

subclassfeature1.1.name: Tempestuous Magic
subclassfeature1.1.description:
As a bonus action, before or after casting a 1st-level or higher spell, I can fly 10 ft
   This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks as whirling gust of air surround me

subclassfeature6.name: Heart of the Storm
subclassfeature6.description:
I have resistance to lightning and thunder damage
   When I start casting a 1st-level or higher spell that deals lightning or thunder damage,
   I deal lightning or thunder damage to creatures of my choice that I can see within 10 ft

subclassfeature6.1.name: Storm Guide
subclassfeature6.1.description:
As an action, I can stop rain around me in 20-ft radius; bonus action for it to resume
   As a bonus action, I can choose the direction of wind around me in a 100-ft radius
   This lasts until the end of my next turn and doesn't alter the wind's speed

subclassfeature14.name: Storm's Fury
subclassfeature14.description:
As a reaction when hit by a melee attack, I can deal lightning damage to the attacker
   The attacker must also make a Strength save or be pushed up to 20 ft away from me

subclassfeature18.name: Wind Soul
subclassfeature18.description:
I have immunity to lightning and thunder damage and gain magical 60 ft fly speed
   As an action, I reduce my fly speed to 30 ft and give allies 30 ft fly speed for 1 hour
   I can do this once per short rest for up to 3 + my Charisma modifier allies within 30 ft

subclassfeature1.name: Among the Dead
subclassfeature1.description:
I learn the Spare the Dying cantrip and gain advantage on saving throws vs. diseases
   If an undead targets me directly with an attack or spell, it must make a Wisdom save
   On a fail, it must choose a new target or forfeit its attack or harmful spell
   On a success or if I attack or cast a harmful spell on it, it is immune for 24 hours

subclassfeature6.name: Defy Death
subclassfeature6.description:
I regain 1d8 + my Constitution modifier in HP when I succeed on a Death saving throw
   I also regain this amount whenever I use Spare the Dying to stabilize a creature

subclassfeature10.name: Undying Nature
subclassfeature10.description:
I can hold my breath indefinitely; I don't require food, water, or sleep (I still need rest)
   I age more slowly, only 1 year for every 10 years that pass; I can't be magically aged

subclassfeature14.name: Indestructible Life
subclassfeature14.description: As a bonus action, I can regain HP and reattach severed body parts

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature2.name: Training in War and Song
subclassfeature2.description: I gain proficiency with light armor, a one-handed melee weapon, and Performance

subclassfeature2.1.name: Bladesong
subclassfeature2.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can start the bladesong for 1 minute; I can dismiss it at any time
   It stops when I wear a shield, medium or heavy armor, or attack with two hands
   While the bladesong is active I have the following benefits:
    • Intelligence modifier (min 1) to AC
    • Base walking speed increases by 10 foot
    • Advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks
    • Intelligence modifier (min 1) to concentration saves for maintaining conc. on a spell

subclassfeature6.name: Extra Attack
subclassfeature6.description:
I can attack twice instead of once when I take the Attack action on my turn
   Moreover, I can cast one of my cantrips in place of one of those attacks

subclassfeature10.name: Song of Defense
subclassfeature10.description:
As a reaction while my bladesong is active, I can expend a spell slot to reduce damage
   The damage I take is reduced by 5 for every level of the spell slot I expend

subclassfeature14.name: Song of Victory
subclassfeature14.description: While my bladesong is active, I add my Int mod (min 1) to melee weapon attack damage

atkCalc.body: function(e,a,t){a.isMeleeWeapon&&/blade.?song/i.test(a.WeaponTextName)&&(t.extraDmg+=Math.max(1,Number(What("Int Mod"))))}

atkCalc: If I include the word 'Bladesong' in the name or description of a melee weapon, it gets my Intelligence modifier added to its Damage.

subclassfeature3.name: Ancestral Protectors
subclassfeature3.description:
While raging, the first creature I hit with an attack on my turn becomes distracted
   While distracted, it has disadvantage on attack rolls that don't target me
   In addition, everybody but me counts as having resistance to all of the target's attacks
   This lasts until the start of my next turn, or until my rage ends

subclassfeature6.name: Spirit Shield
subclassfeature6.description:
As a reaction while raging when an ally I see within 30 ft is damaged, I can reduce it
   My guardian spirits reduce the damage by an amount equal to the roll of the dice

subclassfeature10.name: Consult the Spirits
subclassfeature10.description:
I can cast either Clairvoyance or Augury, without a spell slot or material components
   Augury consults ancestral spirits; Clairvoyance summons an invisible ancestral spirit
   Wisdom is my spellcasting ability for these spells

augury.description: Omen about specific course of action I plan to take in the next 30 min
augury.changes: My casting of Augury is a practice of consulting my ancestral spirits, thus requiring no material components.

clairvoyance.changes: My casting of Clairvoyance is a practice of consulting my an ancestral spirit of mine, thus requiring no material components.

subclassfeature14.name: Vengeful Ancestors
subclassfeature14.description: When using Spirit Shield, the attacker takes the reduced amount as force damage

subclassfeature3.name: Storm Aura
subclassfeature3.description:
While raging, I emanate a 10-ft radius aura, but not through total cover
   The aura's features activate when I enter my rage or as a bonus action while raging
   Use the "Choose Feature" button above to select the type of aura

desert.name: Storm Aura: Desert
desert.description:
While raging, I emanate a 10-ft radius aura, but not through total cover
   The aura's features activate when I enter my rage or as a bonus action while raging
   Whenever I active my aura, anybody in my aura other than me takes fire damage

sea.name: Storm Aura: Sea
sea.description:
While raging, I emanate a 10-ft radius aura, but not through total cover
   The aura's features activate when I enter my rage or as a bonus action while raging
   Whenever I active my aura, I can choose one creature in my aura other than me
   It takes lightning damage, or half as much on a successful Dexterity saving throw
   My Storm Herald features have DC 8 + my Proficiency Bonus + my Constitution modifier

tundra.name: Storm Aura: Tundra
tundra.description:
While raging, I emanate a 10-ft radius aura, but not through total cover
   The aura's features activate when I enter my rage or as a bonus action while raging
   Whenever I active my aura, all creatures of my choice in my aura gain temporary HP

subclassfeature6.name: Storm Soul
subclassfeature6.description: Use the "Choose Feature" button above to select the effect

desert.name: Storm Soul: Desert
desert.description:
I have resistance to fire damage and don't suffer the effects of extreme heat
   As an action, I can set fire to an unattended flammable object I touch

sea.name: Storm Soul: Sea
sea.description:
I can breathe underwater and I have 30 ft swim speed
   In addition, I have resistance to lightning damage

tundra.name: Storm Soul: Tundra
tundra.description:
I have resistance to cold damage and don't suffer the effects of extreme cold
   As an action, I can turn a 5-ft cube of water to ice, which melts after 1 minute
   This action fails if there are any creatures within the cube of water

subclassfeature10.name: Shielding Storm
subclassfeature10.description: In rage, creatures of my choice within my Storm Aura also gain Storm Soul resistance

desert.name: Shielding Storm: Desert
desert.description: While raging, creatures of my choice within my Storm Aura also gain resistance to fire

sea.name: Shielding Storm: Sea
sea.description: In rage, creatures of my choice within my Storm Aura also gain resistance to lightning

tundra.name: Shielding Storm: Tundra
tundra.description: While raging, creatures of my choice within my Storm Aura also gain resistance to cold

subclassfeature14.name: Raging Storm
subclassfeature14.description: Use the "Choose Feature" button above to select the effect

desert.name: Raging Storm: Desert
desert.description:
As a reaction when hit by a creature in my Storm Aura, I can have it make a Dex save
   On a failed save, the attacker takes fire damage equal to half my barbarian level
   My Storm Herald features have DC 8 + my Proficiency Bonus + my Constitution modifier

sea.name: Raging Storm: Sea
sea.description:
As a reaction when I hit a creature in my Storm Aura, I can have it make a Str save
   On a failed save, the creature is knocked prone, as if struck by a wave

tundra.name: Raging Storm: Tundra
tundra.description:
Whenever I activate my Storm Aura, I can choose a creature in my aura that I can see
   It must make a Str save or have its speed reduced to 0 until the start of my next turn
   My Storm Herald features have DC 8 + my Proficiency Bonus + my Constitution modifier

subclassfeature3.name: Divine Fury
subclassfeature3.description:
While raging, the first creature I hit with a weapon attack in my turn gets extra damage
   This is necrotic or radiant damage equal to 1d6 + half my barbarian level
   Choose a damage type using the "Choose Feature" button above

necrotic damage.name: Divine Fury
necrotic damage.description:
While raging, the first creature I hit with a weapon attack in my turn gets extra damage
   It takes an extra 1d6 + half my barbarian level worth of necrotic damage

radiant damage.name: Divine Fury
radiant damage.description:
While raging, the first creature I hit with a weapon attack in my turn gets extra damage
   It takes an extra 1d6 + half my barbarian level worth of radiant damage

atkAdd: If I include the word 'Rage' in a melee weapon's name, it will show in its description that its first hit does extra damage.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Warrior of the Gods
subclassfeature3.1.description: Spells restoring me to life (not undeath or anything else) don't require material comp.

subclassfeature6.name: Fanatical Focus
subclassfeature6.description:
When I fail a saving throw while raging, I can reroll it and must use the new roll
   I can use this ability only once per rage

subclassfeature10.name: Zealous Presence
subclassfeature10.description:
As a bonus action, I choose up to 10 creatures within 60 ft that can hear my battle cry
   These creatures gain adv. on attacks and saves until the start of my next turn

subclassfeature14.name: Rage Beyond Death
subclassfeature14.description:
While raging, having 0 hit points doesn't knock me unconscious
   I still must make death saves, and I suffer the normal effects of taking damage
   I only die due to failed death saves if my rage ends while I'm at 0 HP

subclassfeature3.name: Mantle of Inspiration
subclassfeature3.description:
As a bonus action, I expend one Bardic Inspiration die to aid those within 60 ft of me
   My Cha mod (min 1) of creatures that I can see and can see me gain temporary HP
   They can immediately use a reaction to move their speed, without opportunity attacks

subclassfeature3.1.name: Enthralling Performance
subclassfeature3.1.description:
By performing for at least 1 minute, I can charm humanoids within 60 ft of me
   After the performance, my Cha mod (min 1) number of targets must make a Wis save
   On a fail, a target is charmed for 1 hour; If success, it doesn't knows I tried to charm it
   While charmed, the target idolizes me, hinders those opposing me, and avoids violence
   This lasts until a target takes damage, I attack it, or if it sees me attacking its allies

subclassfeature6.name: Mantle of Majesty
subclassfeature6.description:
As a bonus action, I appear unearthly beautiful while I concentrate, up to 1 minute
   At the same time, and as a bonus action during, I can cast Command without a spell slot
   Creatures charmed by me automatically fail their saves against these Command spells

command.description: 1 crea save or follow one word command, e.g. approach, drop, flee, halt
command.changes: Using my Mantle of Majesty class feature, I can cast Command as a bonus action once per long rest without using a spell slot, thus only affect a single target.

subclassfeature14.name: Unbreakable Majesty
subclassfeature14.description:
As a bonus action, I gain a magically majestic presence for 1 min or until incapacitated
   During this, the first time a creature attacks me each turn they must make a Cha save
   If failed, it can't attack me this turn and must choose another target or lose its attack
   If successful, it can attack, but has disadv. on all saves against my spells on my next turn

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain proficiency with medium armor and scimitars
   My bardic spellcasting focus can be any simple or martial weapon I'm proficient with

subclassfeature3.1.name: Fighting Style
subclassfeature3.1.description: Select a Fighting Style for the college of swords using the "Choose Feature" button above

dueling.name: Dueling Fighting Style
dueling.description: +2 to damage rolls when wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons

atkCalc: When I'm wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no weapon in my other hand, I do +2 damage with that melee weapon. This condition will always be false if the bonus action 'Off-hand Attack' exists.

two-weapon fighting.name: Two-Weapon Fighting Style
two-weapon fighting.description: I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks

atkCalc: When engaging in two-weapon fighting, I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks. If a melee weapon includes 'off-hand' or 'secondary' in its name or description, it is considered an off-hand attack.

subclassfeature3.2.name: Blade Flourish
subclassfeature3.2.description:
When I take the Attack action on my turn, I gain bonus speed and special attack options
   I gain +10 ft to my walking speed until the end of the current turn
   Once per turn when I hit with a weapon attack, I can expend a Bardic Inspiration die
   The roll of that die is added to the weapon's damage, in addition to one of the following:
   • Defensive Flourish: the result is also added to my AC until the start of my next turn
   • Slashing Flourish: the extra damage is also dealt to any of my choosing in 5 ft of me
   • Mobile Flourish: the target is also pushed 5 plus the die result in feet away from me
     As a reaction after this push, I can move my speed to a space within 5 ft of the target

subclassfeature14.name: Master Flourish
subclassfeature14.description: When I do a Blade Flourish, I can use a d6 instead of expending a Bardic Inspiration die

subclassfeature3.name: Psychic Blades
subclassfeature3.description:
When I hit a creature with a weapon attack, I can expend one use of Bardic Inspiration
   If so, the attack does extra psychic damage; I can do so only once per round, on my turn

subclassfeature3.1.name: Words of Terror
subclassfeature3.1.description:
By speaking privately with a humanoid for at least 1 minute, I can try to inspire terror
   After the talk, it must make a Wis save or be frightened of me or someone of my choice
   If the save is successful, the target doesn't know I tried to frighten it
   This lasts for 1 hour, or until it sees its allies or itself being attacked or damaged

subclassfeature6.name: Mantle of Whispers
subclassfeature6.description:
As a reaction when a humanoid dies within 30 ft of me, I can capture its shadow
   As an action, I can use it to make me look just like the dead person did while it was alive
   While disguised, I know general information about it and its memories, but not its secrets
   Others can see through the disguise with a Wis (Insight) check vs. my Cha (Deception) +5
   A shadow lasts until used or next long rest; The disguise ends as a bonus action or 1 hour

subclassfeature14.name: Shadow Lore
subclassfeature14.description:
As an action, I whisper to a creature within 30 ft that can hear and understand me
   Only the target can hear me; It must make a Wis save or be charmed by me for 8 hours
   If failed, it thinks I know its most mortifying secret, otherwise it only hears mumbling
   While charmed, the target obeys my commands, but won't fight or risk its life for me
   This lasts for 8 hours, or until I or my allies attack it, damage it, or have it make a save

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature1.description: I gain proficiency with heavy armor and smith's tools

subclassfeature1.1.name: Blessing of the Forge
subclassfeature1.1.description:
At the end of a long rest, I can imbue magic into a nonmagical weapon or armor
   It becomes magical: +1 AC if armor, or +1 to attack and damage rolls if a weapon
   This lasts until the end of my next long rest or until I die

subclassfeature2.name: Channel Divinity: Artisan's Blessing
subclassfeature2.description:
With an hour-long ritual, I can craft a nonmagical item that is at least part metal
   Including: suit of armor, simple or martial weapon, set of tools, 10 pieces of ammunition
   The creation can be worth up to 100 gp, and I must expend metals of equal value to it
   The metals irretrievably coalesce into the new item, forming even nonmetal parts of it
   The item can be an exact duplicate of a nonmagical item if I possess the original
   The item comes into existence at the end of the hour in an unoccupied space within 5 ft

subclassfeature6.name: Soul of the Forge
subclassfeature6.description: I gain resistance to fire damage and +1 to AC while wearing medium or heavy armor

extraAC.text: I gain a +1 bonus to AC while wearing Medium or Heavy armor.

subclassfeature8.name: Divine Strike
subclassfeature8.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature with a weapon attack, I can do extra damage

atkAdd: Once per turn, I can have one of my weapon attacks that hit do extra fire damage.

subclassfeature17.name: Saint of Forge and Fire
subclassfeature17.description:
I gain immunity to fire damage
   When wearing heavy armor, I'm resistant to nonmagical bludg./piercing/slashing damage

subclassfeature1.name: Circle of Mortality
subclassfeature1.description:
Spells I cast to heal a living creature at 0 HP have their dice count as their max result
   I learn Spare the Dying, which I can cast as a bonus action with a range of 30 ft

spare the dying.changes: I can cast Spare the Dying as a bonus action instead of an action, and it has a range of 30 ft instead of touch.

subclassfeature1.1.name: Eyes of the Grave
subclassfeature1.1.description:
As an action, I sense undead within 60 ft that aren't protected from divination magic
   Until the end of my next turn, I sense the location of any undead not behind total cover

subclassfeature2.name: Channel Divinity: Path to the Grave
subclassfeature2.description:
As an action, I can curse a creature within 30 ft until the end of my next turn
   It is vulnerable to all the damage from the next attack by me or my allies that hits it

subclassfeature6.name: Sentinel at Death's Door
subclassfeature6.description: As a reaction, I turn a critical hit to me or an ally I see within 30 ft to a normal hit

subclassfeature8.name: Potent Spellcasting
subclassfeature8.description: I add my Wisdom modifier to the damage I deal with my cleric cantrips

atkCalc: My cleric cantrips get my Wisdom modifier added to their damage.
spellAdd: My cleric cantrips get my Wisdom modifier added to their damage.

subclassfeature17.name: Keeper of Souls
subclassfeature17.description:
Once per round, if I'm not incapacitated, I can manipulate the energy of the dying
   When an enemy I can see dies within 60 ft of me, I or an ally within 60 ft regain HP
   The HP regained is equal to the enemy's number of Hit Dice

subclassfeature2.name: Balm of the Summer Court
subclassfeature2.description:
I have a pool of fey energy represented by a number of d6s equal to my druid level
   As a bonus action, I can spend dice to heal an ally within 120 ft of me that I can see
   I can spend up to half my druid level worth of dice from the pool at once
   The ally heals an amount equal to the total rolled and gains 1 temp HP per die spent

subclassfeature6.name: Hearth of Moonlight and Shadow
subclassfeature6.description:
At the start of a rest, I can create a 30-ft radius invisible magical sphere
   The sphere extends from a point in space I touch, but doesn't extend through total cover
   Within this area, my allies and I gain +5 on Wis (Perception) and Dex (Stealth) checks
   Also, any light from open flames that are in the sphere is invisible from outside the area
   This effect lasts until the end of the rest or when I leave the sphere

subclassfeature10.name: Hidden Paths
subclassfeature10.description:
As a bonus action, I can teleport myself up to 60 ft to a spot I can see
   As an action, I can teleport a willing ally I touch up to 30 ft to a spot I can see

subclassfeature14.name: Walker in Dreams
subclassfeature14.description:
When I finish a short rest, I can cast either Dream, Scrying, or Teleportation Circle
   This doesn't require a spell slot or material components; Dream uses me as the messenger
   Teleportation Circle connects to the last place I finished a long rest, if on the same plane

dream.changes: Using Walker in Dreams, I can cast either Dream, Scrying, or Teleportation Circle once per long rest without requiring material components.

scrying.description: 1 crea save or sensor follows it around; or create sensor in familiar location; see book
scrying.changes: Using Walker in Dreams, I can cast either Dream, Scrying, or Teleportation Circle once per long rest without requiring material components.

teleportation circle.description: Create a circle to teleport to the place where I finished my last long rest, if on the same plane; see book
teleportation circle.changes:
Using Walker in Dreams, I can cast either Dream, Scrying, or Teleportation Circle once per long rest without requiring material components.
 • The teleportation circle brings me back to the place where I finished my last long rest.

subclassfeature2.name: Speech of the Woods
subclassfeature2.description:
I can talk with beasts, they understand me and I them, to the limit of their intelligence
   This doesn't automatically make me friends with all beasts; Additionally, I learn Sylvan

subclassfeature2.1.name: Spirit Totem
subclassfeature2.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can summon, or move, a spirit to a point I can see within 60 ft
   It is a spectral form of a Bear, Hawk, or Unicorn (my choice), with a 30-ft radius aura
   It is incorporeal, immobile, doesn't counts as a creature or object, and persists for 1 min
   The spirit persists for 1 minute or until I'm incapacitated
   • Bear: my allies and I, if in the aura, immediately gain 5 + my druid level in temp HP
     While in the aura, my allies and I gain advantage on Strength checks and saves
   • Hawk: As a reaction, I can grant advantage on an attack vs. a target in the aura
     While in the aura, my allies and I gain advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks
   • Unicorn: my allies and I gain advantage on ability checks to detect targets in the aura
     When I cast a healing spell with a spell slot, allies in the aura heal my druid level in HP

subclassfeature6.name: Mighty Summoner
subclassfeature6.description: Beasts or Fey I summon with spells get +2 HP per HD and their attacks count as magical

spellAdd: When I use a spell that summons beast or fey creatures, those summons have +2 HP per HD and their attacks count as magical.

subclassfeature10.name: Guardian Spirit
subclassfeature10.description: When a Beast or Fey that I summoned ends its turn in my Spirit Totem aura, it heals

subclassfeature14.name: Faithful Summons
subclassfeature14.description:
When I am reduced to 0 HP or incapacitated against my will, I can cast Conjure Animals
   This is done as if using a 9th-level spell slot to summon 4 beast of my choice up to CR 2
   They appear within 20 ft of me, last 1 hour, and protect me from harm and attack foes

conjure animals.description: Summon 4 CR 2 beasts; protect me from harm and attack foes
conjure animals.changes: Using my Faithful Summons class feature when I'm reduced to 0 HP, I can cast Conjure Animals as if using a 9th-level spell slot. This then summons 4 beast of my choice up to CR 2 within 20 ft of me without needing concentration.

subclassfeature3.name: Arcane Archer's Lore
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain proficiency with either the Arcana or Nature skill
   I also learn either the Prestidigitation or the Druidcraft cantrip

subclassfeature3.1.name: Arcane Shot
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I can unleash magical effects when I fire an arrow from a short- or longbow
   I can use this once per turn as part of the Attack action, after an attack hits
   I know a number of Arcane Shot Options and learn additional at certain levels
   Use the "Choose Feature" button above to add Arcane Shots Options to the third page

banishing arrow [abjuration].name: Banishing Arrow [Abjuration]
banishing arrow [abjuration].description:
The target makes a Cha save or is banished to the Feywild until the end of its next turn
   While banished, its speed is 0 and is incapacitated; It re-appearing in the same spot
   When I reach 18th level, this Arcane Shot Option also does an extra 2d6 force damage

beguiling arrow [enchantment].name: Beguiling Arrow [Enchantment]
beguiling arrow [enchantment].description:
The target takes extra psychic damage and must succeed on a Wisdom save
   If failed, it is charmed by one of my allies within 30 ft of it that I choose
   This lasts until my next turn starts or until the chosen ally attacks the target in any way

bursting arrow [evocation].name: Bursting Arrow [Evocation]
bursting arrow [evocation].description: The target, in addition to the shot, and all creatures within 10 ft of it take damage

enfeebling arrow [necromancy].name: Enfeebling Arrow [Necromancy]
enfeebling arrow [necromancy].description:
The target takes extra necrotic damage and must make a Constitution save
   If failed, the damage of the target's attacks are halved until the start of my next turn

grasping arrow [conjuration].name: Grasping Arrow [Conjuration]
grasping arrow [conjuration].description:
The target takes extra poison damage as brambles wrap around it for 1 minute
   The brambles give it -10 ft speed and do it slashing damage every round it moves
   These can be removed by it or another as an action with Strength (Athletics) vs. my DC

piercing arrow [transmutation].name: Piercing Arrow [Transmutation]
piercing arrow [transmutation].description:
With this I don't roll for the attack, but shoot the arrow in a 30-ft long, 1-ft wide line
   It passes through objects, ignoring cover, but all creatures in the area take damage
   The damage is the same as a normal hit from my attack, plus extra piercing damage
   A creature can make a Dexterity save to reduce the damage by half

seeking arrow [divination].name: Seeking Arrow [Divination]
seeking arrow [divination].description:
With this I don't roll for the attack, but I choose a target I have seen in the last minute
   The seeking arrow moves around corners, obstacles, and ignores cover to hit the target
   It is hit if it is within the weapon's range and there is a path for the arrow to get to it
   The target takes the full damage of the attack plus extra force damage
   It can make a Dexterity save to reduce the damage by half; If failed, I know its location

shadow arrow [illusion].name: Shadow Arrow [Illusion]
shadow arrow [illusion].description:
The target takes extra psychic damage and must succeed on a Wisdom save
   If failed, the target can't see anything beyond 5 ft until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature7.name: Magic Arrow
subclassfeature7.description: Whenever I fire a nonmagical arrow from a short- or longbow, I can make it magical

subclassfeature7.1.name: Curving Shot
subclassfeature7.1.description:
Once per turn when I miss with a magic arrow, I can use a bonus action to redirect it
   I reroll the attack against a different target within 60 ft of the original target

subclassfeature15.name: Ever-Ready Shot
subclassfeature15.description: I regain one use of Arcane Shot if I have no more remaining when I roll initiative

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain proficiency with Animal Handling, History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion
   Alternatively, I learn one language; Use the "Choose Feature" button above for this
choices: Skill proficiency: Animal Handling, History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion

language proficiency.name: Bonus Proficiency
language proficiency.description: I learn one language of my choice

skill proficiency: animal handling, hist.name: Bonus Proficiency
skill proficiency: animal handling, hist.description: I gain proficiency with Animal Handling, History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion
skill proficiency: animal handling, hist.skillstxt: Choose one from: Animal Handling, History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion

subclassfeature3.1.name: Born in the Saddle
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I have advantage on saves to avoid falling off my mount, and land on my feet if I fail
   Mounting or dismounting a creature costs me only 5 ft of movement instead of half

subclassfeature3.2.name: Unwavering Mark
subclassfeature3.2.description:
If I hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, I mark it until the end of my next turn
   While it is within 5 ft of me, a marked target has disadv. on attacks not directed at me
   If it damages anybody but me, I can make a special melee attack vs. it in my next turn
   This takes a bonus action, but has adv. and adds half my fighter level to the damage
   A mark ends early if I'm incapacitated, die, or somebody else marks the target

atkCalc: If I include the words 'Unwavering Mark' or 'Marked' in the name of a melee weapon, it gets half my fighter level added to its Damage.

subclassfeature7.name: Warding Maneuver
subclassfeature7.description:
As a reaction when I or a creature within 5 ft is hit, I can try to fend off the strike
   I add 1d8 to the target's AC; If the attack still hits, the target has resistance against it
   I can only do this while wielding a melee weapon or a shield

subclassfeature10.name: Hold the Line
subclassfeature10.description:
Creatures provoke opportunity attacks when moving 5 ft or more while within my reach
   If I hit an opportunity attack, the target's speed is reduced to 0 until the end of the turn

subclassfeature15.name: Ferocious Charger
subclassfeature15.description:
If I hit a creature after moving 10 ft in a straight line, it must make a Strength save
   If failed, the target is knocked prone; I can do this only once per turn

subclassfeature18.name: Vigilant Defender
subclassfeature18.description:
I can make opportunity attacks without using my reaction
   I can do this only once on every creature's turn, except on my own turn
   I can't do this on the same turn that I use my normal reaction

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain proficiency with History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion
   Alternatively, I learn one language; Use the "Choose Feature" button above for this
choices: Skill proficiency: History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion

language proficiency.name: Bonus Proficiency
language proficiency.description: I learn one language of my choice

skill proficiency: history, insight, per.name: Bonus Proficiency
skill proficiency: history, insight, per.description: I gain proficiency with History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion
skill proficiency: history, insight, per.skillstxt: Choose one from: History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion

subclassfeature3.1.name: Fighting Spirit
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can give myself advantage on weapon attacks and temporary HP
   This advantage on weapon attack rolls lasts until the end of my current turn

subclassfeature7.name: Elegant Courtier
subclassfeature7.description:
I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma (Persuasion) checks I make
   I gain proficiency with Wis saves, or if I'm already proficient, either Int or Cha saves

addMod.text: I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma (Persuasion) checks I make.

subclassfeature10.name: Tireless Spirit
subclassfeature10.description: I regain one use of Fighting Spirit if I have no more remaining when I roll initiative

subclassfeature15.name: Rapid Strike
subclassfeature15.description:
With the Attack action, I can forgo advantage on one attack to make one extra attack
   This extra attack is part of the same action; I can do this only once per turn

subclassfeature18.name: Strength Before Death
subclassfeature18.description:
If I'm reduced to 0 HP but not killed outright, I can delay falling unconscious
   I then immediately take a bonus turn, interrupting the current turn
   While I'm at 0 HP, I suffer damage normally and die if I have 3 failed death saves
   If I'm still at 0 HP at the end of this bonus turn, I fall unconscious

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature3.description: I gain proficiency with the Performance skill and brewer's supplies

subclassfeature3.1.name: Drunken Technique
subclassfeature3.1.description: When using Flurry of Blows, I gain the benefits of a Disengage and +10 ft speed this turn

subclassfeature6.name: Tipsy Sway
subclassfeature6.description: 1 ki point: as a reaction if missed in melee, attacker instead hits other I see within 5 ft
subclassfeature6.additional: Standing up from prone costs only 5 ft

subclassfeature11.name: Drunkard's Luck
subclassfeature11.description: By spending 2 ki points, I can remove disadv. from an ability check, attack roll, or save

subclassfeature17.name: Intoxicated Frenzy
subclassfeature17.description: I can make 3 extra attacks with Flurry of Blows if each is used on a different target

subclassfeature3.name: Path of the Kensei
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain proficiency with either calligrapher's supplies or painter's supplies
   Some weapons, that don't have the heavy or special property, are kensei weapons for me
   At least one ranged and one melee weapon, more at higher levels (longbow does qualify)
   With these: proficient, count as a monk weapons, special bonuses depending on type held:
   • Melee: if I do unarmed strike during an Attack action, +2 AC until my next turn starts
   • Ranged: as a bonus action, ranged weapon attacks deal +1d4 damage in current turn

atkAdd:
For the weapons that I select using the "Choose Feature" button on the second page or when I include the word 'Kensei' in the name of a weapon that doesn't have the Heavy or Special attribute, or that is a longbow, that weapon gains the same benefits as any other 'Monk Weapon'.
In addition, with ranged 'Kensei Weapons', I can take a bonus action to have that hit, and any other hit after that as part of the same action, do +1d4 damage.

ki-empowered strikes.name: One with the Blade
ki-empowered strikes.description: My unarmed strikes and kensei weapon attacks count as magical

atkAdd: My unarmed strikes and any Kensei Weapons count as magical for overcoming resistances and immunities.

deft strike.name: Deft Strike
deft strike.description: Once per turn when I hit with a kensei weapon, I can do a martial arts die extra damage

sharpen the blade.name: Sharpen the Blade
sharpen the blade.description:
As a bonus action, I can grant my kensei weapon a bonus to attack and damage rolls
   This bonus is equal to the number of ki points I spend and doesn't stack with magic
   This lasts for 1 minute or until I use this feature again

subclassfeature17.name: Unerring Accuracy
subclassfeature17.description: Once per turn, if I miss a monk weapon attack on my turn, I can reroll the attack roll

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Conquering Presence
subclassfeature3.description:
As an action, all creatures of my choice within a 30-ft radius must make a Wisdom save
   If failed, a target is frightened for 1 minute; It can save again at the end of each turn

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Guided Strike
subclassfeature3.1.description: When I make an attack roll, I can add a +10 bonus to the roll after seeing the d20 roll

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of Conquest
subclassfeature7.description:
Creatures that are frightened of me have their speed reduced to 0 while in my aura
   They also take psychic damage whenever they start theirs turn within my aura

subclassfeature15.name: Scornful Rebuke
subclassfeature15.description:
Whenever I'm hit with an attack while I'm not incapacitated, the attacker takes damage
   This is psychic damage equal to my Charisma modifier (minimum of 1)

subclassfeature20.name: Invincible Conqueror
subclassfeature20.description:
As an action, I can gain the following benefits for 1 minute:
    - I have resistance to all damage
    - I can make an additional attack as part of my Attack action
    - My melee weapons score critical hits on a roll of 19 or 20

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Emissary of Peace
subclassfeature3.description: As a bonus action, I grant myself +5 on Charisma (Persuasion) checks for 10 minutes

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Rebuke the Violent
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a reaction after a creature within 30 ft attacks and damages another, I can rebuke it
   It takes the same damage as it dealt but as radiant damage, with a Wis save to halve it

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of the Guardian
subclassfeature7.description:
As a reaction when an ally within my aura takes damage, I instead take the damage
   This damage can't be reduced in any way; Other effects might still apply to my ally

subclassfeature15.name: Protective Spirit
subclassfeature15.description: At the end of my turn when I'm below half HP and not incapacitated, I regain HP

subclassfeature20.name: Emissary of Redemption
subclassfeature20.description:
When taking damage from a creature, I take only half and it takes the other half
   This stops working on any that I attack or force to make a save, until I have a long rest

subclassfeature3.name: Dread Ambusher
subclassfeature3.description:
I can add my Wisdom modifier to my initiative rolls
   In the first turn of combat I get +10 ft speed and an extra attack with the Attack action
   If I take the Attack action and that extra attack hits, it does +1d8 damage

addMod.text: I can add my Wisdom modifier to my initiative rolls.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Gloom Stalker Magic
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I add a spell to my known spells at level 3, 5, 9, 13, and 17
   These count as ranger spells, but do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.2.name: Umbral Sight
subclassfeature3.2.description:
I gain 60 ft darkvision, or add 30 ft to darkvision if I already had it because of my race
   When I'm in darkness, others gain no benefit from darkvision to detect me

subclassfeature7.name: Iron Mind
subclassfeature7.description: I gain proficiency with Wis saves, or if I'm already proficient, either Int or Cha saves

subclassfeature11.name: Stalker's Flurry
subclassfeature11.description: Once on each of my turns when I miss a weapon attack, I can make an extra attack

subclassfeature15.name: Shadowy Dodge
subclassfeature15.description: As a reaction when I'm attacked without adv., I can impose disadv. on the attack roll

subclassfeature3.name: Detect Portal
subclassfeature3.description: As an action, I sense the distance and direction to the closest planar portal within 1 mile

subclassfeature3.1.name: Horizon Walker Magic
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I add a spell to my known spells at level 3, 5, 9, 13, and 17
   These count as ranger spells, but do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.2.name: Planar Warrior
subclassfeature3.2.description:
As a bonus action, I choose one creature that I can see within 30 ft of me
   All damage from my first weapon attack that hits it on this turn becomes force damage
   In addition, that first hit does extra damage

subclassfeature7.name: Ethereal Step
subclassfeature7.description: As a bonus action, I can cast the Etherealness spell, which lasts until the end of my turn

etherealness.description: I go to Ethereal Plane; move there, but able to perceive 60 ft into the normal plane
etherealness.changes: Using my Ethereal Step class feature I can cast Etherealness as a bonus action once per short rest, but it only affects myself and lasts until the end of my turn.

subclassfeature11.name: Distant Strike
subclassfeature11.description:
With the Attack action, I can teleport 10 ft before each attack, to a place I can see
   If I attack two different creatures with this action, I get an extra attack against a third

subclassfeature15.name: Spectral Defense
subclassfeature15.description: As a reaction when an attack damages me, I can give myself resistance vs. that attack

subclassfeature3.name: Hunter's Sense
subclassfeature3.description:
As an action, I learn vulnerabilities/immunities/resistances of a target I see within 60 ft
   If it is protected from divination magic, I sense it has none of these

subclassfeature3.1.name: Monster Slayer Magic
subclassfeature3.1.description: I get bonus spells known, which do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.2.name: Slayer's Prey
subclassfeature3.2.description:
As a bonus action, I designate a creature I see within 60 ft; This lasts until I do this again
   My first hit to the target with a weapon attack on each of my turns does +1d6 damage

subclassfeature7.name: Supernatural Defense
subclassfeature7.description:
I add 1d6 to saving throws the current target of my Slayer's Prey forces me to make
   In addition, I also add 1d6 to checks to escape that target's grapple

subclassfeature11.name: Magic-User's Nemesis
subclassfeature11.description:
As a reaction when I see someone within 60 ft casting a spell or teleporting, I can foil it
   The target must make a Wisdom save or have its spell or teleport fail and be wasted

subclassfeature15.name: Slayer's Counter
subclassfeature15.description:
As a reaction when the target of my Slayer's Prey has me make a save, I can attack it
   I can make one weapon attack; If this hits, I automatically succeed on the saving throw

subclassfeature3.name: Ear for Deceit
subclassfeature3.description: For Wis (Insight) to sense if another is lying, I can treat a die roll of 7 or lower as an 8

subclassfeature3.1.name: Eye for Detail
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can do either of the following:
   • Make a Wisdom (Perception) check to spot a hidden creature or object
   • Make an Intelligence (Investigation) check to uncover or decipher clues

subclassfeature3.2.name: Insightful Fighting
subclassfeature3.2.description:
As a bonus action, I can decipher the tactics of another I can see that's not incapacitated
   I have to make a Wisdom (Insight) check vs. the target's Charisma (Deception) check
   If I succeed, I can use my sneak attack on it even if I don't have adv. (but not if disadv.)
   This benefit lasts for 1 minute or until I successfully use Insightful Fighting again

subclassfeature9.name: Steady Eye
subclassfeature9.description:
I'm more perceptive when I don't move more than half my speed in the same turn
   If so, I gain adv. on Wis (Perception) and Int (Investigation) checks during that turn

subclassfeature13.name: Unerring Eye
subclassfeature13.description:
As an action, I can sense magical deceptions within 30 feet of me, but not what it does
   I learn the presence of illusions, shapechanged creatures, or magic designed to deceive

subclassfeature17.name: Eye for Weakness
subclassfeature17.description: While my Insightful Fighting is active, I add 3d6 to sneak attacks against that target

subclassfeature3.name: Skirmisher
subclassfeature3.description:
As a reaction when a hostile ends its turn within 5 ft of me, I can move half my speed
   This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity

subclassfeature3.1.name: Survivalist
subclassfeature3.1.description: I gain proficiency and expertise with the Nature and Survival skills

subclassfeature9.name: Superior Mobility
subclassfeature9.description: I gain +10 ft to my walking speed (and swimming/climbing speed, if applicable)

subclassfeature13.name: Ambush Master
subclassfeature13.description:
I gain advantage on Initiative rolls
   The first creature I hit in the first round of combat becomes an easy target
   Until the start of my next turn, all attacks against the target have advantage

subclassfeature17.name: Sudden Strike
subclassfeature17.description:
With the Attack action, I can make one additional attack as a bonus action
   This attack can benefit from my Sneak Attack even if I already used it this turn
   However, I still can't use Sneak Attack on a single target more than once per turn

subclassfeature1.name: Divine Magic
subclassfeature1.description:
When I learn spells/cantrips or replace known, I can also pick from the cleric spell list
   These cleric spells count as sorcerer spells for me
   I also learn a spell based on my affinity, use the "Choose Feature" button above for this

good.name: Divine Magic: Good
good.description:
When I learn spells/cantrips or replace known, I can also pick from the cleric spell list
   I also learn Cure Wounds, which doesn't count against my number of spells known
   These count as sorcerer spells for me; I can only replace the bonus spell with a cleric spell

evil.name: Divine Magic: Evil
evil.description:
When I learn spells/cantrips or replace known, I can also pick from the cleric spell list
   I also learn Inflict Wounds, which doesn't count against my number of spells known
   These count as sorcerer spells for me; I can only replace the bonus spell with a cleric spell

law.name: Divine Magic: Law
law.description:
When I learn spells/cantrips or replace known, I can also pick from the cleric spell list
   I also learn Bless, which doesn't count against my number of spells known
   These count as sorcerer spells for me; I can only replace the bonus spell with a cleric spell

chaos.name: Divine Magic: Chaos
chaos.description:
When I learn spells/cantrips or replace known, I can also pick from the cleric spell list
   I also learn Bane, which doesn't count against my number of spells known
   These count as sorcerer spells for me; I can only replace the bonus spell with a cleric spell

neutrality.name: Divine Magic: Neutrality
neutrality.description:
When I learn spells/cantrips or replace known, I can also pick from the cleric spell list
   I learn Protection from Evil × Good; It doesn't count against my number of spells known
   These count as sorcerer spells for me; I can only replace the bonus spell with a cleric spell

subclassfeature1.2.name: Favored by the Gods
subclassfeature1.2.description: If I fail a saving throw or miss with an attack roll, I can add 2d4 to the total

subclassfeature6.name: Empowered Healing
subclassfeature6.description:
Once per turn, when I or an ally in 5 ft roll dice to healing with a spell, I can reroll dice
   By spending 1 sorcery point; I can reroll any number of those dice for that spell once

subclassfeature14.name: Otherworldy Wings
subclassfeature14.description:
As a bonus action, I can manifest a pair of spectral wings that give me 30 ft fly speed
   These wings last until I become incapacitated or I dismiss them as a bonus action

eagle.name: Otherworldy Wings
eagle.description:
As a bonus action, I manifest a pair of spectral eagle wings, giving me 30 ft fly speed
   These wings last until I become incapacitated or I dismiss them as a bonus action

bat.name: Otherworldy Wings
bat.description:
As a bonus action, I manifest a pair of spectral bat wings, giving me 30 ft fly speed
   These wings last until I become incapacitated or I dismiss them as a bonus action

dragonfly.name: Otherworldy Wings
dragonfly.description:
As a bonus action, I create a pair of spectral dragonfly wings, giving me 30 ft fly speed
   These wings last until I become incapacitated or I dismiss them as a bonus action

subclassfeature18.name: Unearthly Recovery
subclassfeature18.description:
As a bonus action when I have less than half of my max HP remaining, I can heal myself
   I regain a number of HP equal to half my hit point maximum

subclassfeature1.name: Eyes of the Dark
subclassfeature1.description: I gain 120 ft darkvision

subclassfeature1.1.name: Strength of the Grave
subclassfeature1.1.description:
When damage reduces me to 0 HP, that isn't radiant damage or a critical hit,
   I can make a Charisma save (DC 5 + damage taken) to drop to 1 HP instead

subclassfeature3.name: Darkness
subclassfeature3.description:
I learn Darkness, which doesn't count against my number of spells known
   I can also cast it by spending 2 sorcery points and then I can see through it normally

subclassfeature6.name: Hound of Ill Omen
subclassfeature6.description:
As a bonus action, I summon a hound within 30 ft of a creature I see within 120 ft
   The hound has all the stats of a dire wolf with the following exceptions:
   • It is medium size and counts as a monstrosity not a beast
   • It starts with a number of temporary hit points equal to half my sorcerer level
   • At the start of its turn, it automatically knows where the (hidden) target is
   • It can only move towards and make (opportunity) attack against the target
   • It can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain
   • It takes 5 force damage if it ends its turn inside an object
   The target has disadvantage on saves vs. my spells while the hound is within 5 ft of it
   It disappears if reduced to 0 HP, if the target is reduced to 0 HP, or after 5 minutes

creatureOptions.name: Hound of Ill Omen
creatureOptions.senses:
Adv. on Wis (Perception) checks using hearing/smell;
At the start of each turn, knows where the target is

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.description: Target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.description: The hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The hound has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hound's allies is within 5 ft of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

features.name: Actions
features.description: The hound can only move towards its targets and make attacks or opportunity attacks against its target.

features.name: Temporary Hit Points
features.description: When the hound is summoned, it gains temporary HP equal to half my sorcerer level.

features.name: Shadowy Form
features.description: The hound can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

features.name: Sign of Ill Omen
features.description: While the hound is within 5 ft of its target, that target has disadvantage on saving throws versus my spells.

subclassfeature14.name: Shadow Walk
subclassfeature14.description:
As a bonus action when I'm in dim light or darkness, I can teleport up to 120 ft
   The destination has to be unoccupied, within line of sight, and in dim light or darkness

subclassfeature18.name: Umbral Form
subclassfeature18.description:
As a bonus action, I transform into a shadow form for 1 minute
   While transformed, I have resistance to all damage except force and radiant damage
   Also, I can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain
   I take 5 force damage if I end my turn inside an object
   This ends early if I end it as a bonus action, I die, or I'm incapacitated

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Cantrips
subclassfeature1.description: I learn the Light and Sacred Flame cantrips, not counting for the number I can know

subclassfeature1.1.name: Healing Light
subclassfeature1.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can heal a creature I can see within 60 ft by expending dice
   I can expend up to my Charisma modifier (min 1) of dice from my pool at a time
   The target heals HP equal to the roll of the dice; I regain all expended dice on a long rest

subclassfeature6.name: Radiant Soul
subclassfeature6.description:
I add my Cha modifier once to the fire or radiant damage of cantrips and spells I cast
   This bonus only applies to one target; Also, I have resistance to radiant damage

atkCalc: Cantrips and spells that fire or radiant damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage to one target.
spellAdd: Cantrips and spells that fire or radiant damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage to one target.

subclassfeature10.name: Celestial Resilience
subclassfeature10.description:
When I finish a short or long rest, I and up to five allies gain temporary hit points
   I get my warlock level + Cha mod, while my allies get half my warlock level + Cha mod

subclassfeature14.name: Searing Vengeance
subclassfeature14.description:
At the start of my turn when I would make a death save, I can instead spring back up
   I recover HP equal to half my current HP maximum, and can then stand up if I choose
   When I do, creatures of my choice within 30 ft take 2d8 + Cha mod in radiant damage
   Damaged creatures are blinded until the end of my current turn

subclassfeature1.name: Hexblade's Curse
subclassfeature1.description:
As a bonus action, I can curse a creature I can see within 30 ft of me for 1 minute
   • I add my proficiency bonus to damage rolls against the cursed target
   • My attack rolls against the curse target score a critical hit on a roll of 19 and 20
   • If the target dies while cursed, I regain HP equal to my warlock level + Cha mod
   The curse ends after 1 minute, when the target dies, I die, or I'm incapacitated

atkAdd: If I include the word 'Curse' in the name of a weapon, the automation will treat the attack as being against a target of the Hexblade's Curse: adding my proficiency bonus to the damage and adding the increased chance of a critical hit to the description.

subclassfeature1.1.name: Hex Warrior
subclassfeature1.1.description:
I gain proficiency with medium armor, shields, and martial weapons
