1 ki point; 2d10 force damage on summon

subclassfeature6.name: Visage of the Astral Self
subclassfeature6.description: [1 ki; see 3rd page "Notes"]As a bonus action, I can use my ki to summon the visage of my astral self for 10 minutes

astral visage.name: Astral Visage
astral visage.description:
[1 ki point]As a bonus action (or when summoning my astral arms), I can summon my astral visage
   It lasts for 10 minutes or until I'm incapacitated or die; I choose its appearance
   My astral visage covers my face like a helmet or mask and grants me the following benefits:
    • Astral Sight: I can see normally in normal and magical darkness to a distance of 120 ft
    • Wisdom of the Spirit: I have advantage on Wisdom (Insight) and Charisma (Intimidation)
    • Word of the Spirit: I can have only one target I can see in 60 ft hear me, or all in 300 ft

subclassfeature11.name: Body of the Astral Self
subclassfeature11.description:
[see 3rd page "Notes"]When I have both my astral arms and visage summoned, my astral body appears as well
   This spectral body covers me like an armor, connecting my astral arms and astral visage

astral body.name: Astral Body
astral body.description:
[if both astral arms & visage are present] • Deflect Energy: As a reaction when I take damage, I can reduce it by 1d10 + Wis mod
      I can only do this if the damage I take is acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder
    • Empowered Arms: Once per my turn, I can add martial art die to astral arms damage

atkAdd.body: function(e,a){a.theWea.isAstralArms&&classes.known.monk&&classes.known.monk.level&&(a=(a=classes.known.monk.level)<5?4:a<11?6:a<17?8:10,e.Description+=(e.Description?"; ":"")+"Once on each of my turns +1d"+a+" damage")}

atkAdd: Once on each of my turns when I hit a target with my astral arms, I can add my martial arts die to the damage dealt.

subclassfeature17.name: Awakened Astral Self
subclassfeature17.description: [5 ki; see 3rd page "Notes"]As a bonus action, I can use 5 ki points to summon astral arms and visage with benefits

astral body.name: Awakened Astral Self
astral body.description:
[5 ki points]As a bonus action, I can summon my astral arms and astral visage, with extra benefits:
    • Armor of the Spirit: I gain a +2 bonus to my armor class
    • Astral Barrage: I can do three attacks with the Attack action, if all are with astral arms
   This lasts for 10 minutes or until I'm incapacitated or die

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Watcher's Will
subclassfeature3.description: As an action, Cha mod of creatures I see in 30 ft adv. on Int/Wis/Cha saves for 1 min

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Abjure the Extraplanar
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As an action, all aberration, celestial, elemental, fey, fiend in 30 ft must make Wis save
   Succeeds if it can't hear me; On fail, turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage
   Turned: move away, never within 30 ft of me, no reactions or actions other than Dash
   Turned: may Dodge instead of Dash when nowhere to move and unable to escape bonds

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of the Sentinel
subclassfeature7.description: If I'm not incapacitated, chosen creatures in range and I add my Prof Bonus to Initiative

addMod.text: I can add my Proficiency Bonus to initiative rolls.

subclassfeature15.name: Vigilant Rebuke
subclassfeature15.description:
As a reaction when I or another I can see succeeds a Int, Wis, or Cha save, I can rebuke
   The creature that forced the saving throw takes 2d8 + my Charisma mod force damage

subclassfeature20.name: Mortal Bulwark
subclassfeature20.description:
As a bonus action, I can gain the following benefits for 1 minute:
    • Truesight 120 ft; Adv. on attacks vs. aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, and fiends
    • When I hit and damage a creature with an attack, I can banish it if it fails a Cha save
      It's banished to its native plane if not there now; It's immune for 24 hours on a success
   I can do this once per long rest, or by expending a 5th-level or higher spell slot (SS 5+)

subclassfeature3.name: Dreadful Strikes
subclassfeature3.description: My weapons deal extra psychic damage, but only once per turn per creature

atkAdd: When I hit a creature with a weapon, I can deal an extra 1d4 psychic damage to the target, which can take this extra damage only once per turn. From 11th-level, this damage increases to 1d6.

subclassfeature3.2.name: Otherworldly Glamour
subclassfeature3.2.description:
I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1)
   I gain proficiency in Deception, Performance, or Persuasion; Use "Choose Feature" button

addMod.text: I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1).
I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1).
I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1).
I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1).

deception proficiency.name: Otherworldly Glamour
deception proficiency.description:
[Deception proficiency]
   I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1)

performance proficiency.name: Otherworldly Glamour
performance proficiency.description:
[Performance proficiency]
   I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1)

persuasion proficiency.name: Otherworldly Glamour
persuasion proficiency.description:
[Persuasion proficiency]
   I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1)

subclassfeature7.name: Beguiling Twist
subclassfeature7.description:
I have advantage on saves against being charmed or frightened.
   As a reaction when a creature I see in 120 ft succeeds its save vs. charmed or frightened,
   I can have another I see in 120 ft make a Wis save or be charmed/frightened (my choice).
   This lasts for 1 minute and the target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns

subclassfeature11.name: Fey Reinforcements
subclassfeature11.description:
I learn Summon Fey; It needs no material component, nor counts against spells known.
   Once per long rest, I can cast it without expending a spell slot.
   When cast, I can have it not require concentration, its duration becomes 1 minute

subclassfeature15.name: Misty Wanderer
subclassfeature15.description:
I can cast Misty Step without expending a spell slot and can bring a willing creature within 5 ft
   That creature teleports to an unoccupied space of my choice within 5 ft of my destination.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Gathered Swarm
description:
I'm bonded to a swarm of nature spirits crawling in my space; I choose their appearance
   Once on each of my turns, I can have it assist me after I hit a creature with an attack:
    • The target takes an extra 1d6 piercing damage from the swarm
    • The target must make a Strength save or be moved 15 ft horizontally by the swarm
    • The swarm moves me 5 ft horizontally
   I get to choose the direction whenever the target or I'm moved by the swarm

    • The swarm moves me 5 ft horizontally and I have half cover until my next turn starts
   I get to choose the direction whenever the target or I'm moved by the swarm

   Once on each of my turns, I can have it assist me after I hit a creature with an attack:

subclassfeature3.1.name: Swarmkeeper Magic
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I learn Mage Hand; When cast, its hand takes the form of my swarming nature spirits
   I get bonus spells known, which do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature7.name: Writhing Tide
subclassfeature7.description: As a bonus action, I can fly on my swarm for 1 minute: 10 ft flying speed and can hover

subclassfeature11.name: Mighty Swarm
subclassfeature11.description:
[improves Gathered Swarm, see above]
   Now 1d8 damage, knocks prone on failed save, or grants me half cover until next turn

subclassfeature15.name: Swarming Dispersal
subclassfeature15.description:
As a reaction when I take damage, I can gain resistance to that damage and teleport
   I vanish into my swarm and teleport to an unoccupied space within 30 ft that I can see

subclassfeature3.name: Whispers of the Dead
subclassfeature3.description: When I finish a rest, I gain a skill or tool proficiency of my choice until I change it again
subclassfeature3.skillstxt: Choose one skill or tool; I can change the choice whenever I finish a short or long rest

subclassfeature3.1.name: Wails from the Grave
description:
Directly after I deal sneak attack damage to a creature on my turn, I can harm another
   I then deal half my sneak attack in necrotic damage to a creature I can see within 30 ft

   I then deal half my sneak attack in necrotic damage to a creature I can see within 30 ft

   I deal half my sneak attack in necrotic damage to both it and another I can see in 30 ft
   I can do this my Proficiency Bonus per long rest, or by destroying a soul trinket (ST)

Directly after I deal sneak attack damage to a creature on my turn, I also harm another
   I deal half my sneak attack in necrotic damage to both it and another I can see in 30 ft
   I can do this my Proficiency Bonus per long rest, or by destroying a soul trinket (ST)

   I deal half my sneak attack in necrotic damage to both it and another I can see in 30 ft

Directly after I deal sneak attack damage to a creature on my turn, I also harm another
   I deal half my sneak attack in necrotic damage to both it and another I can see in 30 ft
   I can do this my Proficiency Bonus per long rest, or by destroying a soul trinket (ST)

subclassfeature9.name: Tokens of the Departed
subclassfeature9.description:
[max Proficiency Bonus of soul trinkets]As a reaction when I see a creature within 30 ft die, I can create a Tiny soul trinket
   The token of its life essence appears in my free hand; The DM determines its appearance
   While a soul trinket is on my person, I have advantage on death and Constitution saves
   As an action, I can destroy one of my soul trinkets and ask its associated spirit a question
   Its spirit appears and answers concisely in a language it knew; Trinket can be anywhere

text: While soul trinket is on me, Adv. on Con and death saves

subclassfeature13.name: Ghost Walk
subclassfeature13.description:
As a bonus action, I can assume a spectral form with 10 ft flying speed and can hover
   Attacks vs. me have disadv.; I can move through creatures and objects as difficult terrain
   This lasts 10 min; I take 1d10 force damage if I end my turn inside a creature or object
   I can assume this form once per long rest, or by destroying one of my soul trinkets (ST)

subclassfeature17.name: Death's Friend
subclassfeature17.description:
Wails from the Grave now also deals damage to the target of the original sneak attack
   If I don't have any soul trinkets at the end of a long rest, one appears in my hand

subclassfeature3.name: Psionic Power
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain Psionic Energy Dice (PsiD), which fuel certain powers from this subclass.
   Features in this subclass that use a PsiD use only dice from this subclass. I can't use powers if all dice are expended.
   I regain one die when I finish a Short Rest and all when I finish a Long Rest.
   Psi-Bolstered Knack: If I fail an ability check using a skill or tool I'm proficient with, I can roll one PsiD and add the number rolled. The die is spent only if the roll succeeds.
   Psychic Whispers: As a Magic action, I can choose one or more creatures I can see up to my Prof Bonus, then roll one PsiD. For that number of hours, the chosen creatures can speak telepathically with me and vice versa when within 1 mile of each other (no action). A creature can end the telepathic connection at any time (no action).
   The first time I use this power after each Long Rest, I don't spend a PsiD.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Psychic Blades
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As part of an Attack or Opportunity Attack, I can manifest a Psychic Blade in my free hand to attack. The magic blade has the following traits;
   Simple Melee, 1d6 Psychic + Ability mod damage, Finesse, Thrown (range 60/120 feet).
   Mastery: Vex: If I damage a creature with this I have Adv. on my next attack roll against it before the end of my next turn. (Doesn't count against class Weapon Masteries).
   The blade vanishes immediately after it hits or misses and leaves no mark.
   As a bonus action after this attack, I can manifest a second psychic blade on the same turn.
   My other hand must be free. The damage die of the bonus attack is 1d4.

weaponOptions.name: Psychic Blade
weaponOptions.description: Finesse, Thrown, Vex; Bonus action: 1d4 instead of 1d6

subclassfeature9.name: Soul Blades
subclassfeature9.description:
I can use more powers with my Psychic Blades.
   Homing Strikes: If I miss an attack roll with my Psychic Blade, I can roll one Psionic Energy Die (PsiD) and add it to the attack roll. If the attack hits the die is spent.
   Psychic Teleportation: As a Bonus Action, I manifest a Psychic Blade, spend one PsiD roll it, and throw the blade at an unoccupied space I can see up to 10 times the die roll feet away and teleport to that space. The blade vanishes.

subclassfeature13.name: Psychic Veil
subclassfeature13.description:
As a Magic action, I become Invisible for 1 hour or until I dismiss it (no action).
   It ends immediately after I deal damage to or force a creature to make a save.
   I can spend a Psionic Energy Die (no action) to restore it. It returns after a Long Rest.

subclassfeature17.name: Rend Mind
subclassfeature17.description:
When I deal Sneak Attack damage to a creature with my Psychic Blades I can force it to make a Wis save (DC 8 + Dex mod + Prof Bonus). On a fail, it's Stunned for 1 min. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending it on a pass.
   I can spend 3 Psionic Energy Die (no action) to restore it. It returns after a Long Rest.

subclassfeature1.name: Psionic Spells
subclassfeature1.description:
I learn additional spells, which do not count towards the number of spell I can know
   Whenever I gain a sorcerer level, I can replace one of these with another of the same level
   It must be a divination or enchantment spell on the sorcerer, wizard, or warlock spell list

subclassfeature1.1.name: Telepathic Speech
subclassfeature1.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can telepathic link myself with a creature within 30 ft that I can see
   If we share a language, we can talk telepathically while in my Cha mod of miles (min 1)
   This last for my level in minutes, until I'm incapacitated, I die, or I use this feature again

subclassfeature6.name: Psionic Sorcery
subclassfeature6.description:
I can expend sorcery points instead of a spell slot to cast a spell from my Psionic Spells
   This costs the spell's level in sorcery points, but in doing so requires no other components
   However, I do need to provide a material components if it is consumed by the spell

subclassfeature6.1.name: Psychic Defenses
subclassfeature6.1.description: I gain resistance to psychic damage and adv. on saves vs. being charmed or frightened

subclassfeature14.name: Revelation in Flesh
subclassfeature14.description:
As a bonus action, I can expend 1 or more sorcery points to transform for 10 minutes
   For each sorcery point used, I gain one of the following benefits of my choice:
    • I can see any invisible creatures within 60 ft of me not behind total cover
    • I gain a flying speed equal to my walking speed and I can hover
    • I gain a swimming speed equal to twice my walking speed & I can breathe underwater
    • I can move, with equipment, through any space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing
      Also, I can spend 5 ft of movement to escape form a grapple or nonmagical restraints

subclassfeature18.name: Warping Implosion
subclassfeature18.description:
As an action, I can teleport to an unoccupied space I can see within 120 ft
   All within 30 ft of where I left take 3d10 force damage and must make a Strength save
   If failed, each is pulled towards the space I left, ending up in the nearest empty space
   If successful, a creature takes only half damage and isn't pulled
   I can do this once per long rest, or by expending 5 sorcery points (5 SP)

subclassfeature1.name: Clockwork Magic
subclassfeature1.description:
I learn additional spells, which do not count towards the number of spell I can know
   Whenever I gain a sorcerer level, I can replace one of these with another of the same level
   It must be an abjuration or transmutation spell on the sorcerer, wizard, or warlock list

subclassfeature1.1.name: Restore Balance
subclassfeature1.1.description:
As a reaction when a creature I can see in 60 ft is about to roll a d20 with adv./disadv.,
   I can prevent that roll from being affected by advantage and disadvantage

subclassfeature6.name: Bulwark of Law
subclassfeature6.description:
As an action, I can imbue a creature I can see within 30 ft with a magical ward
   The ward has a number of d8s equal to the number of sorcery points I expend to do this
   As a reaction when the creature takes damage, it can expend any number of those dice
   The dice roll reduces the damage; The ward lasts until I finish a long rest or do this again

subclassfeature14.name: Trance of Order
subclassfeature14.description:
As a bonus action, I can enter a state of clockwork consciousness for 1 minute
   While in this state, attack rolls against me can't benefit from advantage
   Also, I can then treat a d20 roll below 9 as a 10 for my attack rolls, checks, and saves
   I can do this once per long rest, or by expending 5 sorcery points (5 SP)

subclassfeature18.name: Clockwork Cavalcade
subclassfeature18.description:
As an action, I can call spirits to bring balance in a 30-ft cube originating from me
   Inside the cube, the intangible spirits do all the following before vanishing:
    • Restore up to 100 HP, divided among the creatures in the cube as I choose
    • Repair all damaged objects entirely in the cube instantly
    • End every spell of 6th-level or lower on objects or creatures of my choice in the cube
   I can do this once per long rest, or by expending 7 sorcery points (7 SP)

subclassfeature1.name: Tentacle of the Deeps
subclassfeature1.description:
As a bonus action, I can summon or move a spectral tentacle and make an attack with it
   I can summon it to a space within 60 ft that I can see or move an existing one 30 ft
   I make melee spell attacks with 10 ft reach with it that deal cold damage
   Creatures hit by the tentacle suffer 10 ft speed reduction until the start of my next turn
   The 10-ft long tentacle lasts for 1 minute or until I summon another

weaponOptions.name: Tentacle of the Deeps
weaponOptions.description: On hit, -10 ft speed until my next turn starts

subclassfeature1.1.name: Gift of the Sea
subclassfeature1.1.description: I have a swimming speed of 40 ft and I can breathe underwater

subclassfeature6.name: Oceanic Soul
subclassfeature6.description:
I gain resistance to cold damage now that I'm even more at home in the depths
   While I'm fully submerged, others who are as well can understand my speech and I theirs

summon elemental.description: Summon Water Elemental Spirit; obeys commands; takes turn after mine; vanishes at 0 hp (400gp)
summon elemental.changes: My warlock spell Summon Elemental can only call forth an elemental spirit of water.

subclassfeature6.1.name: Guardian Coil
subclassfeature6.1.description:
As a reaction when I or a creature I see in 10 ft of my tentacle is damaged, it can help
   The tentacle interposes itself, reducing the damage of the attack for that creature

subclassfeature10.name: Grasping Tentacles
subclassfeature10.description:
I learn Evard's Black Tentacles; Once per long rest, I can cast it without using a spell slot
   It counts as a warlock spell for me, but not towards the number of spell I can know
   Whenever I cast it, I gain temporary hit points equal to my warlock level
   Moreover, damage can't break my concentration on this spell
additional: 10 temp HP; 1× per long rest no SS
11 temp HP; 1× per long rest no SS
12 temp HP; 1× per long rest no SS
13 temp HP; 1× per long rest no SS
14 temp HP; 1× per long rest no SS
15 temp HP; 1× per long rest no SS
16 temp HP; 1× per long rest no SS
17 temp HP; 1× per long rest no SS
18 temp HP; 1× per long rest no SS
19 temp HP; 1× per long rest no SS
20 temp HP; 1× per long rest no SS

spellAdd:
Whenever I cast Evard's Black Tentacles, I gain temporary hit points equal to my warlock level.
 • Damage can't break my concentration on this spell.

subclassfeature14.name: Fathomless Plunge
subclassfeature14.description:
As an action, I can teleport myself and up to 5 willing creatures I can see within 30 ft
   We reappear up to 1 mile away, inside or within 30 ft of a body of water I've seen

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature1.name: Choose Genie Kind
subclassfeature1.description: Use the "Choose Feature" button above to choose the kind of genie your patron is

spellList: The Genie patron adds Wish as a spell available for my 9th-level Mystic Arcanum selection.

dao (earth).name: Dao Genie Patron
dao (earth).description: My genie patron is a Dao, associated with earth

djinni (air).name: Djinni Genie Patron
djinni (air).description: My genie patron is a Djinni, associated with air

efreeti (fire).name: Efreeti Genie Patron
efreeti (fire).description: My genie patron is an Efreeti, associated with fire

marid (water).name: Marid Genie Patron
marid (water).description: My genie patron is a Marid, associated with water

subclassfeature1.1.name: Genie's Vessel
subclassfeature1.1.description:
My patron gifts me a magical vessel, a Tiny object, granting me a measure of its power
   I choose the vessel's appearance; I can use it as my spellcasting focus for warlock spells
   The vessel's AC is my spell save DC and it has my warlock level + Proficiency Bonus in HP
   If it is destroyed or lost, I can get a replacement with a 1-hour ceremony during a rest

subclassfeature1.2.name: Genie's Vessel: Bottled Respite
subclassfeature1.2.description:
As an action, I can vanish and enter the extradimensional space inside my genie's vessel
   The vessel stays in its location; The space inside is a 20-ft high, 20-ft radius cylinder
   As a bonus action, I can exit my vessel; I exit it early if I die or the vessel is destroyed
   I can remain inside for twice my Proficiency Bonus in hours; Objects can be left inside

subclassfeature1.3.name: Genie's Wrath
subclassfeature1.3.description:
I can deal bonus damage on my attacks, its type depending on my patron's genie kind
   Use the "Choose Feature" button above to choose the kind of genie your patron is

dao (earth).name: Dao's Wrath
dao (earth).description:
[once on each of my turns]
   When I hit an attack, I can have it deal my Prof Bonus in extra bludgeoning damage

   When I hit an attack, I can have it deal my Proficiency Bonus in extra cold damage

subclassfeature6.name: Elemental Gift
subclassfeature6.description:
I gain resistance to a damage type depending on my patron's genie kind
   Use the "Choose Feature" button above to choose the kind of genie your patron is
   As a bonus action, I can gain a flying speed of 30 ft and I can hover, for 10 minutes

dao (earth).name: Dao's Elemental Gift
dao (earth).description:
I gain resistance to bludgeoning damage
   As a bonus action, I can gain a flying speed of 30 ft and I can hover, for 10 minutes

djinni (air).name: Djinni's Elemental Gift
djinni (air).description:
I gain resistance to thunder damage
   As a bonus action, I can gain a flying speed of 30 ft and I can hover, for 10 minutes

efreeti (fire).name: Efreeti's Elemental Gift
efreeti (fire).description:
I gain resistance to fire damage
   As a bonus action, I can gain a flying speed of 30 ft and I can hover, for 10 minutes

marid (water).name: Marid's Elemental Gift
marid (water).description:
I gain resistance to cold damage
   As a bonus action, I can gain a flying speed of 30 ft and I can hover, for 10 minutes

subclassfeature10.name: Sanctuary Vessel
subclassfeature10.description:
When I enter my vessel I can have up to 5 willing creatures I can see in 30 ft join me
   As a bonus action, I can eject any number of creatures from my genie's vessel
   Everyone is ejected when I leave it, I die, or if the vessel is destroyed
   Anyone who remains in the vessel for at least 10 min gains the benefits of a short rest
   Also, HD spend as part of this short rest has my Proficiency Bonus added to the roll

subclassfeature14.name: Limited Wish
subclassfeature14.description:
[1× per 1d4 long rests]As an action, I can cast a 6th-level or lower spell with a casting time time of one action
   This can be any spell; It doesn't require any costly components, it simply takes effect

subclassfeature2.name: Wizardly Quill
subclassfeature2.description:
As a bonus action, I can magically create a Tiny quill with the following properties:
    • It doesn't require ink and produces ink in the color of my choice when writing with it
    • I require only 2 minutes per spell level to transcribe spells into my spellbook with it
    • As a bonus action, I can use it to erase a text written with it if within 5 ft of the text
   The quill disappear if I create another or if I die

subclassfeature2.1.name: Awakened Spellbook
subclassfeature2.1.description:
My spellbook gains sentience and grants me the following benefits while I am holding it:
    • I can use the book as a spellcasting focus for my wizard spells
    • When I cast a wizard spell using a spell slot, I can temporarily replace its damage type
      The new type must appear in my spellbook in a spell of the same level as the spell slot
    • Once per long rest, I can ritual cast a wizard spell without 10 min extra casting time
   I can replace it over a short rest, transferring its spells and sentience to a blank book

subclassfeature6.name: Manifest Mind
subclassfeature6.description:
As a bonus action, I can have the mind of my awakened spellbook manifest within 60 ft
   The spellbook needs to be on my person to do this; The mind is a Tiny spectral object
   The mind is intangible, doesn't occupy a space, hovers, and sheds dim light in 10 ft
   It can hear, see, has 60 ft darkvision, and telepathically shares with me what it perceives
   As a bonus action, I can dismiss it or move it up to 30 ft to an empty space I can see
   It can pass through creatures; It stops manifesting if it's over 300 ft from me or I die
   It also stop manifesting if Dispel Magic is cast on it or the awakened spellbook is no more
   I can do this once per long rest, or by expending a spell slot (SS 1+) to manifest it again

subclassfeature6.1.name: Manifest Mind: Cast Spell
subclassfeature6.1.description: I can have wizard spells I cast on my turn originate from the mind while its manifested

subclassfeature10.name: Master Scrivener
subclassfeature10.description:
When I finish a long rest, I can write a spell in my awakened spellbook on a blank paper
   It must be a level 1 or 2 spell with 1 action casting time; My spellbook must be in 5 ft
   As an action, I can use this scroll to cast the spell on it at one higher level than normal
   Only I can use the scroll; The scroll turns blank again when I use it or finish a long rest
   Also, using my Wizardly Quill, the gold and time I need to craft spell scrolls is halved

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t,n){if(!n&&"wizard"===t&&"MS"===a.firstCol&&(1===a.level||2===a.level)){for(var i=/(\d*d?\d+)\+(\d*d?\d+)\/(\d*SL)\b/i;i.test(a.description);){var o=a.description.match(i),s=!isNaN(o[1])||!!/\d+d\d+/i.test(o[1])&&o[1].replace(/\d+(d\d+)/i,"$1"),r=!isNaN(o[2])||(/\d+d\d+/i.test(o[2])?o[2].replace(/\d+(d\d+)/i,"$1"):void 0);/^SL$/i.test(o[3])?/^\d/.test(o[1])&&s===r?(s=Number(o[1].replace(/^(\d+).*/,"$1"))+Number(o[2].replace(/^(\d+).*/,"$1"))+o[1].replace(/^\d+(.*)/,"$1"),a.description=a.description.replace(i,s)):a.description=a.description.replace(i,"$1+$2"):removeSpellUpcasting(a)}return a.description=a.description.replace(/ \(\d+ ?gp( cons\.?)?\)/i,""),a.components="M†",a.compMaterial="Spells cast from spell scrolls don't require any components other than the spell scroll itself.",!0}}

spellAdd: When I finish a long rest, I can create a scroll of a spell in my spellbook using my Master Scrivener class feature. I can then cast this spell from the scroll and the spell is cast as if using a spell slot one level higher than its spell level.

subclassfeature14.name: One with the Word
subclassfeature14.description: [see 3rd page "Notes" section]

one with the word.name: One with the Word
one with the word.description:
While my awakened spellbook is on my person, I have advantage on Int (Arcana) checks
   As a reaction when I take damage while my spellbook's mind is manifested, I can dismiss it
   In dismissing the manifested mind like this, I prevent all of the damage taken by me
   After doing so, I lose spells with a combined level of 3d6 from my awakened spellbook
   If I do not have enough spells left to cover the number rolled, I drop to 0 HP instead
   The spells vanish from my spellbook, reappearing only after I finish 1d6 long rests
   I can't cast spells that I lost this way, even if found on a scroll or in another spellbook

subclassfeature3.name: Guiding Whispers
subclassfeature3.description: I learn the Guidance cantrip and can cast it with a range of 60 ft

guidance.changes: I can cast Guidance with a range of 60 ft.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Spiritual Focus
subclassfeature3.1.description: [only for bard spells]I can use a candle, crystal ball, skull, spirit board, or tarokka deck as a spellcasting focus

subclassfeature3.2.name: Tales from Beyond
subclassfeature3.2.description:
As a bonus action, I can expend a bardic inspiration die to roll on the Spirit Tales table
   I retain the rolled tale in my mind until I bestow its effects or finish a short or long rest
   I can only retain one tale at a time; I need to hold a spiritual focus to roll on the table
   As an action, I can choose a creature I see in 30 ft or myself to bestow the tale's effect
   The tales use my spell save DC; See the Notes page for the Spirit Tales table

toNotesPage.name: Spirit Tales Table
toNotesPage.note:
As a bonus action while I'm holding my spiritual focus, I can reach out to spirits who tell their tales through me. I expend one use of my Bardic Inspiration and roll on the table below using my Bardic Inspiration die to determine the tale. I retain the tale in mind until I bestow the tale's effect or finish a short or long rest.
   I can retain only one of these tales in mind at a time, and rolling on the table immediately ends the effect of the previous tale.
   As an action, I can choose myself or one creature I can see within 30 ft to be the target of the tale's effect. If the tale requires a saving throw, the DC equals my spell save DC.
   
Roll  Tale  1    Tale of the Clever Animal: For the next 10 minutes, whenever the target makes an Intelligence, a Wisdom, or a Charisma check, the target can roll my Bardic Inspiration die immediately after rolling the d20 and add it to the check.
  2    Tale of the Renowned Duelist: I make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes force damage equal to two rolls of my Bardic Inspiration die + my Charisma modifier.
  3    Tale of the Beloved Friends: The target and another creature of its choice it can see within 5 ft of it gains temporary hit points equal to a roll of my Bardic Inspiration die + my Charisma modifier.
  4    Tale of the Runaway: The target can immediately use its reaction to teleport up to 30 ft to an unoccupied space it can see. When the target teleports, it can choose a number of creatures it can see within 30 ft of it up to my Charisma modifier (minimum of 0) to immediately use the same reaction.
  5    Tale of the Avenger: For 1 minute, any creature that hits the target with a melee attack takes force damage equal to a roll of my Bardic Inspiration die.
  6    Tale of the Traveler: The target gains temporary hit points equal to a roll of my Bardic Inspiration die + my bard level. While it has these temporary hit points, the target's walking speed increases by 10 ft and it gains a +1 bonus to its AC.
  7    Tale of the Beguiler: The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take psychic damage equal to two rolls of my Bardic Inspiration die, and the target is incapacitated until the end of its next turn.
  8    Tale of the Phantom: The target becomes invisible until the end of its next turn or until it hits a creature with an attack. If the target hits a creature with an attack during this invisibility, the creature it hits takes necrotic damage equal to a roll of my Bardic Inspiration die and is frightened of the target until the end of the frightened creature's next turn.
  9    Tale of the Brute: Each creature of the target's choice it can see within 30 ft of it must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes thunder damage equal to three rolls of my Bardic Inspiration die and is knocked prone. A creature that succeeds on its saving throw takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.
 10    Tale of the Dragon: The target spews fire from the mouth in a 30-ft cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking fire damage equal to four rolls of my Bardic Inspiration die on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
 11    Tale of the Angel: The target regains hit points equal to two rolls of my Bardic Inspiration die + my Charisma modifier, and I end one condition from the following list affecting the target: blinded, deafened, paralyzed, petrified, or poisoned.
 12    Tale of the Mind-Bender: I evoke an incomprehensible fable from an otherworldly being. The target must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or take psychic damage equal to three rolls of my Bardic Inspiration die and be stunned until the end of its next turn.

subclassfeature6.name: Spiritual Focus: Improve spells
subclassfeature6.description: While holding a spiritual focus, I can add 1d6 to one damage or healing roll of bard spells

atkAdd:
When I cast a bard spell, I can use my spiritual focus to add 1d6 to one damage roll or roll to restore hit points.
   Going by rules as written (RAW), the spiritual focus has to be used as a spellcasting focus for this bonus to be added. This means that it can only be used on spells with a non-costly material component. Most DMs will forgo this technicality and that is why this sheet will add the 1d6 to any damage/healing spell by default. You can enable to use the stricter rules as written with the "Choose Feature" button on the second page.

Most DMs will forgo this technicality and that is why this sheet will add the 1d6 to any damage/healing spell by default. You can enable to use the stricter rules as written with the "Choose Feature" button on the second page.

choices: RAW: only +1d6 for spells with non-costly material components

raw: only +1d6 for spells with non-costl.name: Spiritual Focus: Improve spells
raw: only +1d6 for spells with non-costl.description: If I use a spiritual focus to cast a bard spell, I can add 1d6 to one damage or healing roll

allow +1d6 for any bard spell.name: Spiritual Focus: Improve spells
allow +1d6 for any bard spell.description: While holding a spiritual focus, I can add 1d6 to one damage or healing roll of bard spells

subclassfeature6.1.name: Spirit Session
subclassfeature6.1.description:
Using my spiritual focus, I can conduct a hour-long ritual to channel spirit during a rest
   The number of willing participants, me included, can be up to my Proficiency Bonus
   At the end, I learn a divination or necromancy spell of my choice until I start a long rest
   The spell can't be higher level than the number of participants and of a level I can cast

subclassfeature14.name: Mystical Connection
subclassfeature14.description:
For Tales from Beyond, I now roll my bardic inspiration die twice and select which to use
   If I roll the same number on both dice, I can instead choose any effect on the table

subclassfeature1.name: Form of Dread
subclassfeature1.description:
As a bonus action, I can transform for 1 minute and gain the following benefits:
    • I gain temporary hit points equal to 1d10 + my warlock level
    • I am immune to the frightened condition
    • Once per turns when I hit an attack, I can force the target to make a Wis save
      If the target fails this save, it is frightened of me until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature6.name: Grave Touched
subclassfeature6.description:
I no longer need to eat, drink, or breathe
   Once per turn if I damage a creature with an attack, I can change its type to necrotic
   While I'm in my Form of Dread, I can roll one extra damage die for this necrotic damage

subclassfeature10.name: Necrotic Husk
subclassfeature10.description:
I have resistance to necrotic damage, or immunity while I'm in my Form of Dread
   As a reaction when reduced to 0 HP, I can drop to 1 HP instead and erupt with energy
   Each creature of my choice within 30 ft takes 2d10 + my warlock level necrotic damage
   After this, I gain 1 level of exhaustion and must complete 1d4 long rests to do so again

subclassfeature14.name: Spirit Projection
subclassfeature14.description:
As an action, I can project my spirit from my body, leaving it suspended and unconscious
   This lasts 1 hour or until my concentration is broken; Damage and effects affect both
   When it ends, I can have my spirit return to my body or my body teleport to my spirit
   My spirit has my abilities, but no gear; While projecting I gain the following benefits:
    • My spirit and body gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage
    • My conjuration/necromancy spells need no verbal, somatic, non-costly material comp.
    • I gain a flying speed equal to my walking speed and can hover
    • Move through creatures/objects as difficult terrain; 1d10 force damage if end turn in
    • While in my Form of Dread, once per turns when I deal necrotic damage, I can heal
      I regain hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt

subclassfeature3.name: Draconic Disciple
subclassfeature3.description:
I learn to speak, read, and write Draconic or one other language of my choice
   I can change the damage type of my unarmed strikes to acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison
   As a reaction when I fail an Intimidation or Persuasion check, I can reroll the check
   If this reroll turns the check into a success, I can't do so again until I finish a long rest

atkAdd: When I damage a target with an unarmed strike, I can change the damage type to acid, cold, fire, lightning or poison.

   This deals 2d4 acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison (my choice) damage to all in the area
   The area can be a 20-ft cone or a 5-ft wide, 30-ft line; Dex save to halve the damage
   I can do this my Proficiency Bonus times per long rest, or by expending 2 ki points

weaponOptions.name: Breath of the Dragon
weaponOptions.description: All in area; Dex save for half damage; Alt: 20-ft cone; Type: acid/cold/fire/lightning/poison

atkAdd: My Breath of the Dragon deals damage equal to two rolls of my Martials Arts die. At 11th level, this increases to three rolls of my Martial Arts die. At 17th level, I can expend 1 ki point to augment the breath to increase the damage to four rolls of my Martial Arts die.

subclassfeature6.name: Wings Unfurled
subclassfeature6.description: When I use Step of the Wind, I can gain a flying speed equal to my walking speed

aspect of the wyrm.name: Aspect of the Wyrm
description:
As a bonus action, I can activate a 10 ft aura for 1 minute that grants me one benefit:
    • My allies in the aura and I gain resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage
    • When I create this aura and as a bonus action while it is active, I can frighten a creature
         One creature must make a Wisdom save or become frightened of me for 1 minute
         It can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success
   I can activate this aura once per long rest, or by expending 3 ki points

    • When I create this aura and as a bonus action while it is active, I can frighten a creature
         One creature must make a Wisdom save or become frightened of me for 1 minute
         It can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success
   I can activate this aura once per long rest, or by expending 3 ki points
   From 17th-level, when I active this, I can choose any creatures I can see in the aura
   Each must then make a Dex save or take 3d10 acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage

subclassfeature17.name: Ascendant Aspect
subclassfeature17.description: I gain 10 ft blindsight and both Breath of the Dragon and Aspect of the Wyrm improve

weaponOptions.name: Breath of the Dragon (Augmented)
weaponOptions.description: [1 ki] All in area; Dex save for half damage; Alt: 60-ft cone; Type: acid/cold/fire/lightning/poison

subclassfeature3.name: Draconic Gift
subclassfeature3.description: I learn the Draconic language and the Thaumaturgy cantrip

subclassfeature3.1.name: Drake Companion
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As an action, I can summon my drake to appear in an empty space within 30 ft
   Select a "Drake Companion" on the companion page for its stats and rules
   I can do this once per long rest, or by expending a 1st-level or higher spell slot (SS 1+)

creatureOptions.name: Drake Companion
creatureOptions.damage_immunities: the chosen Draconic Essence damage type

features.name: Warden
features.description: The drake obeys the commands of its warden and shares its proficiency bonus. It takes its turn immediately after that of its warden, on the same initiative. It can move and take reactions on its own, but only takes the Dodge action on its turn unless its warden takes a bonus action to command it to take another action. If its warden is incapacitated, the drake can take any action, not just Dodge. The drake vanishes when it is reduced to 0 hit points, when its warden summons another drake, or when its warden dies.

traits.name: Draconic Essence
traits.description: Chosen when summoned: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage.

traits.name: Infused Strikes
traits.description: As a reaction when another creature within 30 ft of the drake that it can see hits with a weapon attack, the drake can infuse the strike with its essence, causing the attack to deal an extra 1d6 damage of its chosen Draconic Essence damage type

traits.name: Bond of Fang and Scale (Drakewarden 7)
traits.description: The drake is now Medium and can be ridden as a mount. It has a flying speed equal to its walking speed, but can't fly with a rider on its back. The drake's bite deals an extra 1d6 damage of its chosen Draconic Essence type.

subclassfeature7.name: Bond of Fang and Scale
subclassfeature7.description:
My drake is now Medium, has a 40 ft fly speed, and can be ridden, but not while flying
   The drake's bite attack deals an extra 1d6 damage chosen by its Draconic Essense
   While it is summoned, I gain resistance to the damage type of its Draconic Essense

subclassfeature11.name: Drake's Breath
subclassfeature11.description:
As an action, I can cause my drake or myself to exhale a 30-ft cone breath weapon
   Its damage type is acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison; Dex save to halve the damage
   I can do this once per long rest, or by expending a 3rd-level or higher spell slot (SS 3+)

weaponOptions.name: Drake's Breath
weaponOptions.description: Hits all in area; Dex save for half damage; Damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison

atkCalc.body: function(e,a,t){a.theWea.DrakewardenDrakeBreath&&classes.known.rangerua&&(a.theWea.useSpellMod="rangerua")}

subclassfeature15.name: Perfected Bond
subclassfeature15.description:
My drake is now Large, can serve as a mount, and adds another +1d6 damage to its bite
   As a reaction when the drake or I take damage while within 30 ft of each other,
   I can give myself or the drake resistance to that instance of damage

subclassfeature1.1.name: Moon Fire
subclassfeature1.1.description: I know the Sacred Flame cantrip and can use it on 2 creatures within 5 ft of each other

sacred flame.description: Up to 2 creas I see, max 5 ft apart, save or 1d8 Radiant dmg; no cover bonus; +1d8 at CL 5, 11, and 17
sacred flame.descriptionShorter: Up to 2 creas I see, max 5 ft apart, save or 1d8 Radiant dmg; no cover bonus; +1d8 CL 5/11/17
sacred flame.descriptionCantripDie: Up to 2 creas I see, max 5 ft apart, save or `CD`d8 Radiant dmg; no bonus for cover on save
sacred flame.changes: When I cast Sacred Flame, I can target one creature as normal or target two creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other.

subclassfeature6.name: Lunar Boons
subclassfeature6.description:
Each lunar phase is additionally associated with spells of the following schools of magic:
   ○ Full: Abjur & Div		● New: Ench & Necro	       ◖ Crescent: Illus & Trans
   I can reduce the sorcery point needed for Metamagic of spells of my current phase by 1

subclassfeature6.1.name: Waxing and Waning
subclassfeature6.1.description:
[1 sorcery point]As a bonus action, I can spend 1 sorcery point to change my lunar phase
   I can cast each lunar phase's 1st-level spells once per long rest, if it is my current phase

extraLimitedFeatures.name: Ray of Sickness (in New lunar phase)

subclassfeature14.name: Lunar Empowerment
subclassfeature14.description:
[passive benefits for current phase]○ Full: I shed bright light in a 10-ft radius & dim light for extra 10 ft
     Myself and creatures I choose in 10 ft have adv. on Investigation and Perception checks
   ● New: I have adv. on Stealth checks; While I'm in darkness, attacks have disadv. vs me
   ◖ Crescent: I have resistance to Necrotic and Radiant damage

subclassfeature18.name: Lunar Phenomenon
subclassfeature18.description:
[per phase: 1× per long rest or 5 SP]As a bonus action, or as part of changing phase, I can use a power of the (new) phase:
   ○ Full: Chosen creatures within 30 ft of me must make a Constitution save or be blinded
     This lasts until their next turn ends; I also heal one creature within 30 ft for 3d8 HP
   ● New: Chosen creatures within 30 ft of me must make a Dexterity save
     If failed, they take 3d10 Necrotic damage and have 0 speed until their next turn ends
     Also, I become invisible until the end of my next turn, or until I attack or cast a spell
   ◖ Crescent: I can magically teleport to an unoccupied space I can see within 60 ft
     Both of us gain resistance to all damage until the start of my next turn
   I can use each phase's bonus action 1/LR, or by spending 5 sorcery points to use it again

subclassfeature3.description: I learn Giant, and the Druidcraft or Thaumaturgy cantrip with Wis as spellcasting ability

   While raging, its damage type changes to the chosen type and it deals +2d6 damage,
   it gains the thrown (20/60 ft) property, and reappears instantly after a thrown attack
   As a bonus action, I can change the chosen type; The bonuses only function for me

   As a bonus action, I can change the chosen type; The bonuses only function for me

   As a bonus action, I can change the chosen type; The bonuses only function for me

atkAdd: If I include the words 'Elemental Cleaver' in a weapon's name, the Elemental Cleaver infused weapon properties will be added to it and its damage type will be set to 'Varies'. Also, my Rage's bonus damage will be added to it if it is a melee weapon that uses Strength.

atkCalc.body: function(e,a,t){a.isMeleeWeapon&&1===e.Mod&&classes.known.barbarian&&classes.known.barbarian.level&&/^(?!.*\brage\b)(?=.*elemental)(?=.*cleaver).*$/i.test(a.WeaponTextName)&&(t.extraDmg+=classes.known.barbarian.level<9?2:classes.known.barbarian.level<16?3:4)}

subclassfeature10.name: Mighty Impel
description:
[DC 8 + Prof Bonus + Str mod]As a bonus action while raging, I can hurl a Medium or smaller creature within my reach
   I move it to an empty space I can see within 30 ft; Unwilling can save to avoid this
   If it doesn't end this movement on a surface that can support it, it falls and lands prone

subclassfeature14.name: Demiurgic Colossus
subclassfeature14.description:
While raging, my reach increases by 10 ft, and my size can increase to Huge
   Mighty Impel works on Large creatures; Elemental Cleaver increases to +2d6 damage

subclassfeature2.name: Infuse Potions
subclassfeature2.description:
I can produce magic potions if I spend 10 minutes and expend a spell slot
   I can not regain the spell slot until the potion is consumed or a week has passed

subclassfeature2.1.name: Infuse Scrolls
subclassfeature2.1.description:
I can produce a scroll after a short rest if I spend 10 minutes and my Arcane Recovery
   I subtract the spell's level from the levels worth of slots I regain using Arcane Recovery
   This reduction applies till the scroll is used and I finish a long rest

subclassfeature6.name: Infuse Weapons and Armor
subclassfeature6.description:
I can spend 10 minutes to produce a magic weapon, armor, a shield, or ammunition
   The item retains its magic for 8 hours and the spell slot I expend is:
   2nd: +1 ammunition (20 pieces), 3rd: +1 weapon or +1 shield, 4th: +1 armor,
   5th: +2 weapon or +2 ammunition (20 pieces), 6th: +3 armor.

subclassfeature10.name: Superior Artificer
subclassfeature10.description: I can create one additional scroll, potion, weapon, or armor when I use Infuse

subclassfeature14.name: Master Artificer
subclassfeature14.description:
I can produce a variety of magic items from Tables A and B from the DMG
   It takes 1 week for such an item and I cannot do it again for a month

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature1.description: I gain proficiency with light armor, medium armor, shields, and simple weapons

subclassfeature1.1.name: Chosen of the Gods
subclassfeature1.1.description:
Choose a Cleric Domain using the "Choose Feature" button above
   I add the chosen domain's spells to my known spells, when they are of a level I can cast
   These count as sorcerer spells, but do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature14.name: Divine Wings
subclassfeature14.description:
As a bonus action, I sprout feathered or bat wings from my back unless blocked by armor
   I gain a fly speed equal to my current speed until I dismiss the wings as a bonus action

subclassfeature18.name: Power of the Chosen
subclassfeature18.description:
When I cast a spell I gained from the Chosen of the Gods class feature, I heal myself
   I regain a number of HP equal to my Charisma modifier (minimum 1) + the spell's level

subclassfeature3.name: Hunter's Prey
subclassfeature3.description: Choose Colossus Slayer, Giant Killer, or Horde Breaker with the "Choose Feature" button

colossus slayer.name: Hunter's Prey: Colossus Slayer
colossus slayer.description: Once per turn, when hitting someone that is below max HP, I do an extra 1d8 damage

giant killer.name: Hunter's Prey: Giant Killer
giant killer.description: As a reaction, when a Large or larger enemy in 5 ft attacks me, I can attack it once

horde breaker.name: Hunter's Prey: Horde Breaker
horde breaker.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature, I can make an attack vs. another within 5 ft of it

subclassfeature7.name: Defensive Tactics
subclassfeature7.description: "Choose Feature" button to choose Escape the Horde, Multiattack Defense, or Steel Will

escape the horde.name: Defensive Tactic: Escape the Horde
escape the horde.description: Creatures attacking me with opportunity attacks have disadvantage on the attack rolls

multiattack defense.name: Defensive Tactic: Multiattack Defense
multiattack defense.description: When a creature hits me, I gain +4 AC against that creature for the rest of the turn

steel will.name: Defensive Tactic: Steel Will
steel will.description: I have advantage on saves against being frightened

subclassfeature11.name: Multiattack
subclassfeature11.description: Choose Volley or Whirlwind Attack using the "Choose Feature" button above

volley.name: Multiattack: Volley
volley.description: As an action, I can make ranged attacks vs. all within a 10-ft radius of a point in range

whirlwind attack.name: Multiattack: Whirlwind Attack
whirlwind attack.description: As an action, I can make melee attacks vs. all creatures within 5 ft of me

subclassfeature15.name: Superior Hunter's Defense
subclassfeature15.description: "Choose Feature" button to choose Evasion, Stand Against the Tide, or Uncanny Dodge

evasion.name: Evasion
evasion.description: If I make a Dex save to halve damage, I instead take none if I succeed and half if I fail.

text: **Dex save for half dmg**. *Failure:* half dmg, *Success:* no dmg

stand against the tide.name: Stand Against the Tide
stand against the tide.description:
When a creature misses me with a melee attack, I can use my reaction on the attack
   I force the attacker to repeat it vs. another (not attacker) of my choice within range

uncanny dodge.name: Uncanny Dodge
uncanny dodge.description: As a reaction, I halve the damage of an attack from an attacker that I can see

subclassfeature3.name: Ranger's Companion
subclassfeature3.description:
It adds my proficiency bonus to AC, attacks, damage, and save/skill proficiencies
   Its hit point maximum equals four times my ranger level if higher than its normal HP
   It takes a turn on my initiative; It takes the Dodge action unless I command it otherwise
   As an action, I can have it take the Attack, Dash, Disengage, or Help action on its turn
   I can still use Extra Attack while commanding it to Attack; No action to order to move
subclassfeature3.additional: Medium or smaller beast, CR ¼ or less

subclassfeature7.name: Exceptional Training
subclassfeature7.description:
My beast's attacks count as magical for overcoming resistances and immunities
   As a bonus action, I can command it to take the Dash/Disengage/Help action on its turn

subclassfeature11.name: Bestial Fury
subclassfeature11.description: When I command my beast to use the Attack action, it can attack twice on its turn

subclassfeature15.name: Beastly Coordination
subclassfeature15.description: My companion can, as a reaction, halve an attack's damage from an attacker that I see

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Cantrip
subclassfeature1.description: I learn the On/Off cantrip if I didn't already know it

subclassfeature1.1.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature1.1.description: I gain proficiency with sidearms and land vehicles

subclassfeature1.2.name: Heart of the City
subclassfeature1.2.description:
While I'm in a city, I can gain adv. on a Cha (Deception, Intimidation, Persuasion) check
   I'm considered proficient with the appropriate skill for that one check

subclassfeature2.name: Channel Divinity: Spirits of the City
subclassfeature2.description:
As an action, I make all city utilities in 30 ft either stop or work perfectly for 1 min
   Additionally, all hostiles within 30 ft must make a Cha save at the time of use
   If failed, it is either knocked prone or restrained (my choice) by city hazards
   A restrained target can escape with an Athletics or Acrobatics check vs. my spell DC

subclassfeature6.name: Block Watch
subclassfeature6.description: While in an urban environment, I'm proficient and expertise in Insight and Perception

subclassfeature8.name: Divine Strike
subclassfeature8.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature with a weapon attack, I can do extra damage

atkAdd: Once per turn, I can have one of my weapon attacks that hit do extra psychic damage.

subclassfeature17.name: Express Transit
subclassfeature17.description:
As an action, I can teleport from one mass transit site to another in the same city
   This works just like a Teleport spell; Mass transits sites include bus/train/subway stops

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature1.description: I am proficient with hacking tools and know the On/Off cantrip

subclassfeature1.1.name: Information Surge
subclassfeature1.1.description:
As an action, I can cause a computerized device within 30 ft to make an Int save
   If the device is held/used by a creature, that creature makes the saving throw
   If the device is not held/used, it makes a save with a +0 modifier and disadvantage
   On a failed save, the device stops functioning until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature6.name: Wire Walk
subclassfeature6.description:
As a bonus action, I can teleport through a hardwired network to a point I can see
   Both where I start and end must be a device, cable, or socket connected to the network

subclassfeature10.name: Personal Encryption
subclassfeature10.description:
I have adv. on saves vs. scrying, thought detection, and magics for learning my location
   If the effect doesn't let me a save, the user has disadv. on checks to use it on me, if any

subclassfeature14.name: Technovirus
subclassfeature14.description:
As an action, I make a melee spell attack to infect someone with a techno-organic virus
   The target takes 8d10 psychic damage, or half that with a successful Con save
   If it failed its save, I can use an action to cast Command on it while it remains infected
   It makes its save vs. this Command with disadvantage and I can cast it at any range
   It is infected until my next long rest; The virus can be removed with Lesser Restoration

subclassfeature2.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature2.description: I gain proficiency with sidearms and hacking tools

subclassfeature2.1.name: Technological Savant
subclassfeature2.1.description:
I can use a single tablet computer (or similar) instead of a spellbook
   Spells copied into this device cost half the normal amount of gp

subclassfeature6.name: Program Spell
subclassfeature6.description:
I can cast a spell into a device of at least smartphone-level of computing power
   Variables of the spell are chosen at time of casting; I can have only one active at a time
   As an action within the next 48 hours, the spell can be cast from the device
   I can't activate a concentration spell in this way if I am concentrating on another spell

subclassfeature10.name: Online Casting
subclassfeature10.description:
I can cast a spell, that is not area-of-effect, through networked electronic devices
   If the spell requires sight/hearing, the audio/visual must be transmitted electronically
   The spell's range is determined from me to my device plus from the target to its device

subclassfeature14.name: Chained Device
subclassfeature14.description:
I can use a held/worn tablet computer to concentrate on a spell I cast instead of me
   If the device is separated from me, turned off, or broken, the effect is lost

subclassfeature3.name: Brown Bear Spirit Companion
subclassfeature3.description:
As a bonus action, I can have my brown bear spirit animal materialize or dismiss it
   It has all the stats of a brown bear and adds my Wis mod to its attacks and saves
   Its HP is half my ranger level or the total in its stat block, whichever is higher
   It takes it turn right after my initiative and is under my complete control

subclassfeature3.1.name: Guardian's Shroud
subclassfeature3.1.description: When I call my spirit animal, I grant me or an ally I can see 2d6 + Wis mod temp HP

subclassfeature3.name: Giant Eagle Spirit Companion
subclassfeature3.description:
As a bonus action, I can have my giant eagle spirit animal materialize or dismiss it
   It has all the stats of a giant eagle and adds my Wis mod to its attacks and saves
   Its HP is half my ranger level or the total in its stat block, whichever is higher
   It takes it turn right after my initiative and is under my complete control

subclassfeature3.1.name: Seeker's Eye
subclassfeature3.1.description:
When I call my spirit animal, I can choose a creature that I can see
   Until the end of my next turn, all attacks against the target have advantage

subclassfeature3.name: Dire Wolf Spirit Companion
subclassfeature3.description:
As a bonus action, I can have my dire wolf spirit animal materialize or dismiss it
   It has all the stats of a dire wolf and adds my Wis mod to its attacks and saves
   Its HP is half my ranger level or the total in its stat block, whichever is higher
   It takes it turn right after my initiative and is under my complete control

subclassfeature3.1.name: Stalker's Fangs
subclassfeature3.1.description:
When I call my spirit animal, I can choose a creature that I can see
   The target's next weapon attack hit deals 2d6 + Wis mod extra slashing damage

subclassfeature3.name: Underdark Scout
subclassfeature3.description:
In the first turn of combat I have +10 ft speed and +1 attack with the Attack action
   All turns after that, I can take the Hide action as a bonus action at the end of my turn

subclassfeature3.1.name: Deep Stalker Magic
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I have 90 ft darkvision and add a spell to my known spells at level 3, 5, 9, 13, and 17
   These count as ranger spells, but do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature7.name: Iron Mind
subclassfeature7.description: I am proficient with Wisdom saving throws

subclassfeature11.name: Stalker's Flurry
subclassfeature11.description: Once during my turn when I miss an attack, I can immediately make an extra attack

subclassfeature15.name: Stalker's Dodge
subclassfeature15.description: As a reaction when I'm attacked without adv., I can impose disadv. on the attack roll

subclassfeature1.name: Eyes of the Dark
subclassfeature1.description:
I have 60 ft darkvision and can cast Darkness by spending 1 sorcery point
   I can see through any darkness spell I cast using this ability

darkness.description: 15-ft rad darkness on point/obj; I see normally; darkvision doesn't work; only magical light of SL 3+
darkness.changes: Using my Eyes of the Dark class feature I can cast Darkness by spending 1 sorcery point and I can see through that Darkness without issue.

subclassfeature1.1.name: Strength of the Grave
subclassfeature1.1.description:
When damage reduces me to 0 HP, that isn't radiant damage or a critical hit,
   I can make a Constitution save (DC 5 + damage taken) to drop to 1 HP instead

subclassfeature6.name: Hound of Ill Omen
subclassfeature6.description:
As a bonus action, I target a creature I can see and summon a hound within 30 ft of it
   The hound has all the stats of a medium sized dire wolf with the following exceptions:
    - At the start of its turn, it automatically knows where the target is
    - It can only move towards and make (opportunity) attack against the target
    - It can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain
    - It takes 5 force damage if it ends its turn inside an object
   The target has disadvantage on saves vs. my spells while the hound is within 5 ft of it

subclassfeature14.name: Shadow Walk
subclassfeature14.description:
As a bonus action when I'm in dim light or darkness, I can teleport up to 120 ft
   The destination has to be unoccupied, within line of sight, and in dim light or darkness

subclassfeature18.name: Shadow Form
subclassfeature18.description:
As a bonus action, I transform into a shadow form for 1 minute
   While transformed, I have resistance to all damage types except force damage
   Also, I can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain
   I take 5 force damage if I end my turn inside an object

subclassfeature1.name: Radiant Soul
subclassfeature1.description:
I add my Cha modifier to cantrips/spells I cast that deal fire or radiant damage
   I have resistance to radiant damage and know the Light and Sacred Flame cantrips

atkCalc.body: function(e,a,t){a.isSpell&&/fire|radiant/i.test(e.Damage_Type)&&(t.extraDmg+=What("Cha Mod"))}

atkCalc: Cantrips and spells that fire or radiant damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){if(!a.psionic)return genericSpellDmgEdit(e,a,"fire|radiant","Cha")}

spellAdd: Cantrips and spells that fire or radiant damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.

subclassfeature6.name: Searing Vengeance
subclassfeature6.description:
When I would make a death saving throw, I can instead spring back to my feet
   I immediately stand up and recover HP equal to half my current HP maximum
   Also, all hostiles within 30 ft of me take 10 + Charisma modifier in radiant damage
   Damaged creatures are blinded until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature10.name: Radiant Resilience
subclassfeature10.description:
When I finish a short or long rest, I and up to five allies gain temporary hit points
   I get my warlock level + Cha mod, while my allies get half my warlock level + Cha mod

subclassfeature14.name: Healing Light
subclassfeature14.description:
As a bonus action, I touch a creature and heal it by expending dice from my pool
   I subtract the number of d6's used from my pool; I can expend up to 5d6 at a time
   The target heals HP equal to the roll of the dice; I regain expended uses with a long rest

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature3.description: I gain proficiency with medium armor and scimitars

subclassfeature3.1.name: Two-Weapon Fighting Style
subclassfeature3.1.description: I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks

atkCalc: When engaging in two-weapon fighting, I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks. If a melee weapon includes 'off-hand' or 'secondary' in its name or description, it is considered an off-hand attack.

subclassfeature3.2.name: Blade Flourish
subclassfeature3.2.description:
When I take the Attack action on my turn, I can do one of the following flourishes:
   I have to use a dagger, longsword, rapier, scimitar, or shortsword while doing this
    - Defensive Flourish [one Bardic Inspiration die]
       As a bonus action, I add the die to my AC until the start of my next turn
    - Trick Shooter's Flourish [one Bardic Inspiration die]
       As a bonus action with a dagger ranged attack, I add the die to the attack roll
       If the target is an unattended, inanimate object, the result of the die is doubled
    - Unnerving Flourish [one Bardic Inspiration die]
       As a bonus action when reducing a foe to 0 HP with a melee attack, I leave it alive
       The target stays at 1 HP and is frightened of me for my Cha modifier in minutes
       It must also make a Cha save at a DC of my spell save + the bardic inspiration die
       If failed, it answers truthfully any questions I ask and obeys me while frightened

subclassfeature14.name: Battle Magic
subclassfeature14.description: When I use my action to cast a Bard spell, I can make one bonus action weapon attack

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature3.description: I gain proficiency with thieves' tools, sleight of hand, and one other skill of my choice
subclassfeature3.skillstxt: Thieves' Tools, Sleight of Hand, and any one other skill

subclassfeature3.1.name: Tumbling Fool
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, I tumble which gives the benefits of the Dash and Disengage actions
   I also gain a climbing speed at my current speed and half damage from falling

subclassfeature6.name: Fool's Insight
subclassfeature6.description: I can cast Detect Thoughts, but on a save the target suffers an embarrassing social gaffe

detect thoughts.description: 1 a read thoughts of visible Int>3 crea or detect invisible in 30 ft; save for probing, social gaffe on save
detect thoughts.changes: I can cast this spell a number of times equal to my Charisma modifier per long rest and when I do so and the target makes its save, it suffers an embarrassing social gaffe.

subclassfeature14.name: Fool's Luck
subclassfeature14.description:
[one bardic inspiration die]
   When I fail an ability check, saving throw, or attack roll, I can add one inspiration die
   If this turns the roll into a success, I have to note down the number rolled
   I can't use this ability again until the DM subtracts the amount from a check or attack

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain proficiency with two skills or one skill and any one tool
   For skills I can choose from Animal Handling, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion

1 skill and 1 tool proficiencies.name: Bonus Proficiencies
1 skill and 1 tool proficiencies.description:
I gain proficiency with one skill and any one tool of my choice
   For the skill, I can choose Animal Handling, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion
1 skill and 1 tool proficiencies.skillstxt: Choose one from: Animal Handling, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion

2 skill proficiencies.name: Bonus Proficiencies
2 skill proficiencies.description: I gain two skill proficiencies: Animal Handling, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion
2 skill proficiencies.skillstxt: Choose two from: Animal Handling, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion

subclassfeature3.1.name: Born in the Saddle
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I have advantage on saves to avoid falling off my mount, and land on my feet if I fail
   Mounting or dismounting a creature costs me only 5 ft of movement instead of half

subclassfeature3.2.name: Combat Superiority
subclassfeature3.2.description:
I gain a number of superiority dice that I can use to fuel special maneuvers (see below)
   I can use only one maneuver per attack; I regain all superiority dice after a short rest
    - Use after rolling to influence/control an animal; I add the superiority die to the roll
    - Use after rolling to hit; I add the superiority die to my attack roll
    - Use on a mount, before rolling to hit with a lance; I add the die to the damage roll
       Also, the target must make a Str save (DC 8 + Prof + Str mod) or be knocked prone
    - As a reaction when I'm hit or my mount is hit, I add the superiority die to AC
       If the attack still hits, I or my mount only take half damage from it

subclassfeature7.name: Ferocious Charger
subclassfeature7.description:
I can use two superiority dice, instead of just one, to increase the damage of my lance
   If doing so, the target has disadvantage on its Str save to avoid being knocked prone

subclassfeature10.name: Improved Combat Superiority
subclassfeature10.description: My superiority dice turn into d10s at 10th level and into d12s at 18th level

subclassfeature15.name: Relentless
subclassfeature15.description: I regain one superiority die if I have no more remaining when I roll initiative

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain proficiency with three skills or two skills and Thieves' Tools; For skills choose from:
   Acrobatics, Athletics, Investigation, Medicine, Nature, Perception, Stealth, and Survival
choices: 2 Skill proficiencies and Thieves' Tools proficiency

2 skill proficiencies and thieves' tools.name: Bonus Proficiencies
2 skill proficiencies and thieves' tools.description:
I gain proficiency with two skills and Thieves' Tools; For skills choose from:
   Acrobatics, Athletics, Investigation, Medicine, Nature, Perception, Stealth, and Survival
2 skill proficiencies and thieves' tools.skillstxt: Choose two from: Acrobatics, Athletics, Investigation, Medicine, Nature, Perception, Stealth, or Survival

3 skill proficiencies.name: Bonus Proficiencies
3 skill proficiencies.description:
I gain proficiency with three skills, chosen from:
   Acrobatics, Athletics, Investigation, Medicine, Nature, Perception, Stealth, and Survival
3 skill proficiencies.skillstxt: Choose three from: Acrobatics, Athletics, Investigation, Medicine, Nature, Perception, Stealth, or Survival

subclassfeature3.1.name: Combat Superiority
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I gain a number of superiority dice that I can use to fuel special maneuvers (see below)
   I can use only one maneuver per attack; I regain all superiority dice after a short rest
    - Use after rolling an Athletics, Nature, Perception, Stealth, or Survival check
       I add half the superiority die to the roll (rounding up)
    - Use after rolling to hit; I add the superiority die to my attack roll
    - As a reaction when I'm hit while wearing light/medium armor, I add the die to AC
       If the attack still hits, I only take half damage from it

subclassfeature3.2.name: Natural Explorer
subclassfeature3.2.description: Use the "Choose Feature" button above to add a favored terrain to the third page

travel benefits.name: Favored Terrain Travel Benefits
travel benefits.description:
I can double my Proficiency Bonus for Int/Wis checks concerning my favored terrains
   While traveling for an hour or more in a favored terrain, I gain the following benefits:
    • My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic
    • I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food
    • If alone (or alone with beast companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace
    • When tracking, I also learn the exact number, size, and time since passing

subclassfeature10.name: Improved Combat Superiority
subclassfeature10.description: My superiority dice turn into d10s at 10th level and into d12s at 18th level

subclassfeature15.name: Relentless
subclassfeature15.description: I regain one superiority die if I have no more remaining when I roll initiative

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain proficiency with two skills or one skill and any one tool
   For skills I can choose Arcana, History, Insight, Investigation, Nature, or Perception

1 skill and 1 tool proficiencies.name: Bonus Proficiencies
1 skill and 1 tool proficiencies.description:
I gain proficiency with one skill and any one tool of my choice
   For the skill, I can choose Arcana, History, Insight, Investigation, Nature, or Perception
1 skill and 1 tool proficiencies.skillstxt: Choose one from: Arcana, History, Insight, Investigation, Nature, or Perception

2 skill proficiencies.name: Bonus Proficiencies
2 skill proficiencies.description: I gain 2 skill proficiencies: Arcana, History, Insight, Investigation, Nature, or Perception
2 skill proficiencies.skillstxt: Choose two from: Arcana, History, Insight, Investigation, Nature, and Perception

subclassfeature3.1.name: Combat Superiority
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I gain a number of superiority dice that I can use to fuel special maneuvers (see below)
   I can use only one maneuver per attack; I regain all superiority dice after a short rest
    - Use after rolling to hit; I add the superiority die to my attack roll
    - Use after damaging a creature; I add the superiority die to the damage roll
       Also, the attack imposes disadvantage on any concentration save resulting from it
    - Use after Int/Wis/Cha save, before knowing success/fail; add the die to the save total
    - Use with Wis (Perception) to detect hidden or Wis (Insight) to see if lying to me
       After rolling but before knowing if success/fail; I add the superiority die to the check

subclassfeature3.2.name: Hunter's Mysticism
subclassfeature3.2.description:
I can cast Detect Magic as a ritual and Protection from Evil & Good once per long rest
   I gain the ability to speak one of the following languages: Abyssal, Celestial, or Infernal

detect magic.changes: I can cast this spell only as a ritual, thus its casting time is 10 minutes longer.

subclassfeature7.name: Monster Slayer
subclassfeature7.description:
Whenever I use a superiority die, I can choose to expend two, adding both to the roll
   If the target is an aberration, fey, fiend, or undead, both dice deal maximum damage

subclassfeature10.name: Improved Combat Superiority
subclassfeature10.description: My superiority dice turn into d10s at 10th level and into d12s at 18th level

subclassfeature15.name: Relentless
subclassfeature15.description: I regain one superiority die if I have no more remaining when I roll initiative

subclassfeature3.name: Ear for Deceit
subclassfeature3.description:
When using Wis (Insight) to sense if someone is lying, I can choose to use a fixed total
   This total is 8 + Wis modifier + proficiency bonus (if proficient, or twice if expertise)

subclassfeature3.1.name: Eye for Detail
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I can use the bonus action granted by Cunning Action for the following as well:
    - To make a Wisdom (Perception) check to spot a hidden creature or object
    - To make an Intelligence (Investigation) check to uncover and decipher clues
    - To use Insightful Fighting (see below)

subclassfeature3.2.name: Insightful Fighting
subclassfeature3.2.description:
As an action or bonus action, I can decipher the tactics of an active opponent I can see
   I have to make a Wisdom (Insight) check vs. the target's Charisma (Deception) check
   If I succeed, I can use sneak attack on the target regardless of advantage/disadvantage
   This benefit lasts for 1 minute or until I successfully use Insightful Fighting again

subclassfeature9.name: Steady Eye
subclassfeature9.description: If not moving during my turn, I gain adv. on Wis (Perception) to find hidden things

subclassfeature13.name: Unerring Eye
subclassfeature13.description:
As an action, I can sense magical deceptions within 30 feet of me, but not what it does
   I learn the presence of illusions, shapechanged creatures, or magic designed to deceive

subclassfeature17.name: Eye for Weakness
subclassfeature17.description: While my Insightful Fighting is active, I add 2d6 to sneak attacks against that target

subclassfeature1.name: Shielding Aurora
subclassfeature1.description:
As a bonus action, I create a whirling aurora of brilliant energy around me
   It lasts until the end of my next turn and grants me resistance to all damage
   Any hostile ending its turn in 10 ft of me get Warlock level + Cha mod radiant damage

subclassfeature6.name: Astral Refuge
subclassfeature6.description:
As an action, I can step into an astral refuge, coming back at the end of the turn
   While in the astral refuge, I can take two actions to cast spells targeting just me
