subclassfeature10.name: Far Wanderer
subclassfeature10.description: I no longer need to breathe, and I gain resistance to fire damage and cold damage

subclassfeature14.name: Astral Sequestration
subclassfeature14.description:
With a 5 minutes ritual, I can shift myself and ten willing creatures to the Astral Plane
   While sequestered an Astral Plane, we gain the full benefits of a short rest
   After this rest, we return to the same space as before, without any time having passed

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature2.name: Arcane Initiate
subclassfeature2.description:
Choose a Cleric Domain using the "Choose Feature" button above
   When I gain a wizard level I can replace one of the spells I would add to my spellbook
   I can replace it with one of the chosen domain spells, if it is of a level I can cast
   If my spellbook has all the domain spells, I can select any cleric spell of a level I can cast
   Other wizards cannot copy cleric spells from my spellbook into their own spellbooks

spellList: When I gain a wizard level after my spellbook already has all the spells of my chosen domain, I can instead select any cleric spell of a level I can cast as one of the spells I gain from levelling up.

subclassfeature2.1.name: Channel Arcana
subclassfeature2.1.description: I can channel arcane energy from my deity; the save for this is my wizard spell DC

subclassfeature2.2.name: Channel Arcana: Divine Arcana
subclassfeature2.2.description:
As a bonus action, I speak a prayer to control the flow of magic around me
   The next spell I cast gains a +2 bonus to its attack roll or saving throw DC

subclassfeature2.3.name: Channel Arcana: Domain
subclassfeature2.3.description: Use the "Choose Feature" button above to select the domain

subclassfeature6.name: Arcane Acolyte
subclassfeature6.description: Use the "Choose Feature" button above to select the domain

subclassfeature10.name: Arcane Priest
subclassfeature10.description: Use the "Choose Feature" button above to select the domain

subclassfeature14.name: Arcane High Priest
subclassfeature14.description: Use the "Choose Feature" button above to select the domain

subclassfeature3.name: Animal Companion
subclassfeature3.description: I call an animal by spending 8 hours and 50 gp; I can revive it with 8 hours and 25 gp

creaturesAdd.body: function(e,a){e&&(e=AskUserOptions("Select Animal Companion",'Select which beast you would like to have as your animal companion.\nYou can change the beast at any time using the "Companion Options" button at the top of the Companion page.',["Ape","Black Bear","Boar","Giant Badger","Giant Weasel","Mule","Panther","Wolf"],"radio",!0),ApplyCompRace(e,a,"companionrr"))}

subclassfeature3.1.name: Companion's Bond
subclassfeature3.1.description: My companion gains several benefits, see the Companion's sheet

subclassfeature5.name: Coordinated Attack
subclassfeature5.description: If I take the Attack action, my companion can use its reaction to make a melee attack

subclassfeature7.name: Beast's Defense
subclassfeature7.description: While my companion can see me, it has advantage on all saving throws

subclassfeature11.name: Storm of Claws and Fangs
subclassfeature11.description: My companion can, as an action, make melee attacks vs. all creatures within 5 ft of it

subclassfeature15.name: Superior Beast's Defense
subclassfeature15.description: My companion can, as a reaction, halve an attack's damage from attacker that it sees

subclassfeature3.name: Hunter's Prey
subclassfeature3.description: Choose Colossus Slayer, Giant Killer, or Horde Breaker with the "Choose Feature" button

colossus slayer.name: Hunter's Prey: Colossus Slayer
colossus slayer.description: Once per turn, when hitting someone that is below max HP, I do an extra 1d8 damage

giant killer.name: Hunter's Prey: Giant Killer
giant killer.description: As a reaction, when a Large or larger enemy in 5 ft attacks me, I can attack it once

horde breaker.name: Hunter's Prey: Horde Breaker
horde breaker.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature, I can make an attack vs. another within 5 ft of it

subclassfeature7.name: Defensive Tactics
subclassfeature7.description: "Choose Feature" button to choose Escape the Horde, Multiattack Defense, or Steel Will

escape the horde.name: Defensive Tactic: Escape the Horde
escape the horde.description: Creatures attacking me with opportunity attacks have disadvantage on the attack rolls

multiattack defense.name: Defensive Tactic: Multiattack Defense
multiattack defense.description: When a creature hits me, I gain +4 AC against that creature for the rest of the turn

steel will.name: Defensive Tactic: Steel Will
steel will.description: I have advantage on saves against being frightened

subclassfeature11.name: Multiattack
subclassfeature11.description: Choose Volley or Whirlwind Attack using the "Choose Feature" button above

volley.name: Multiattack: Volley
volley.description: As an action, I can make ranged attacks vs. all within a 10-ft radius of a point in range

whirlwind attack.name: Multiattack: Whirlwind Attack
whirlwind attack.description: As an action, I can make melee attacks vs. all creatures within 5 ft of me

subclassfeature15.name: Superior Hunter's Defense
subclassfeature15.description: "Choose Feature" button to choose Evasion, Stand Against the Tide, or Uncanny Dodge

evasion.name: Evasion
evasion.description: My Dexterity saves vs. areas of effect negate damage on success and halve it on failure

text: Dex save vs. area effects: fail ― half dmg, success ― no dmg

stand against the tide.name: Stand Against the Tide
stand against the tide.description:
When a creature misses me with a melee attack, I can use my reaction on the attack
   I force the attacker to repeat it vs. another (not attacker) of my choice within range

uncanny dodge.name: Uncanny Dodge
uncanny dodge.description: As a reaction, I halve the damage of an attack from an attacker that I can see

subclassfeature3.name: Underdark Scout
subclassfeature3.description:
In the first turn of combat I have +10 ft speed and +1 attack with the Attack action
   When I'm hiding or trying to hide, others gain no benefit from darkvision to detect me

subclassfeature3.1.name: Deep Stalker Magic
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I have 90 ft darkvision (or +30 ft) and gain extra known spells at level 3, 5, 9, 13, 17
   These count as ranger spells, but do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature7.name: Iron Mind
subclassfeature7.description: I am proficient with Wisdom saving throws

subclassfeature11.name: Stalker's Flurry
subclassfeature11.description: Once during my turn when I miss an attack, I can immediately make an extra attack

subclassfeature15.name: Stalker's Dodge
subclassfeature15.description: As a reaction when I'm attacked without adv., I can impose disadv. on the attack roll

subclassfeature3.name: Ancestral Protectors
subclassfeature3.description:
As a bonus action while raging, I can choose a creature within 5 ft of me that I can see
   The creature has disadvantage on attack rolls that don't target me
   If it takes the Disengage action within 5 feet of me, its speed is halved for its turn
   This lasts until the start of my next turn or my rage ends, whichever comes

subclassfeature6.name: Ancestral Shield
subclassfeature6.description:
While I'm raging, I can transfer my resistance to an ally I can see within 30 ft of me
   As a reaction when an ally takes bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage
   My ally keeps the resistance, and I lose it, until the start of my next turn

subclassfeature10.name: Consult the Spirits
subclassfeature10.description: I can consult my ancestral spirits to give myself advantage on a Int or Wis check

subclassfeature14.name: Vengeful Ancestors
subclassfeature14.description:
While I'm raging, I can have my vengeful ancestors attack for 2d8 force damage
   As a reaction when I or an ally I can see within 30 feet of me is damaged in melee

subclassfeature3.name: Storm Aura
subclassfeature3.description:
While raging, I emanate a 10-ft radius aura that shapes the environment around me" + "
   " + "Use the "Choose Feature" button above to select the aura

desert.name: Storm of Fury: Desert
desert.description:
While raging, I emanate a 10-ft radius aura that shapes the environment around me
   Any enemy that ends its turn in my aura takes fire damage

sea.name: Storm of Fury: Sea
sea.description:
While raging, I emanate a 10-ft radius aura that shapes the environment around me
   At the end of each of my turns, I can choose a creature in my aura, other than myself
   It must make a Dex save or take lightning damage, or half damage on a successful save
   The DC for this save is 8 + my proficiency bonus + my Constitution modifier

tundra.name: Storm of Fury: Tundra
tundra.description:
While raging, I emanate a 10-ft radius aura that shapes the environment around me
   Any enemy that ends its turn in my aura takes cold damage

subclassfeature6.name: Storm Soul
subclassfeature6.description: Use the "Choose Feature" button above to select the effect

desert.name: Storm Soul: Desert
desert.description: I have resistance to fire damage and don't suffer the effects of extreme heat

sea.name: Storm Soul: Sea
sea.description: I have resistance to lightning damage and can breathe underwater

tundra.name: Storm Soul: Tundra
tundra.description: I have resistance to cold damage and don't suffer the effects of extreme cold

subclassfeature10.name: Shield of the Storm
subclassfeature10.description: While I'm raging, allies within my aura gain the benefits of my Storm Soul feature

subclassfeature14.name: Raging Storm
subclassfeature14.description: Use the "Choose Feature" button above to select the effect

desert.name: Raging Storm: Desert
desert.description:
Enemy in my aura move more than 5 ft on the ground must make a Strength save
   On a fail, it moves only 5 ft and its speed drops to 0 until the start of its next turn
   The DC for this save is 8 + my proficiency bonus + my Constitution modifier

sea.name: Raging Storm: Sea
sea.description:
Creatures in my aura hit by my attack must make a Str save or be knocked prone
   The DC for this save is 8 + my proficiency bonus + my Strength modifier

atkAdd: If I include the word 'Rage' in a melee weapon's name, it will show in its description that it forces targets that are hit to make a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

tundra.name: Raging Storm: Tundra
tundra.description: The area within my aura is difficult terrain for my enemies

subclassfeature3.name: Divine Fury
subclassfeature3.description:
While raging, I can become cloaked in an aura of divine power until my rage ends" + "
   " + "Choose a damage type using the "Choose Feature" button above

necrotic damage.name: Divine Fury: Necrotic
necrotic damage.description:
While raging, I become cloaked in an aura of divine power until my rage ends
   At the end of my turn, each creature within 5 feet of me takes necrotic damage

radiant damage.name: Divine Fury: Radiant
radiant damage.description:
While raging, I become cloaked in an aura of divine power until my rage ends
   At the end of my turn, each creature within 5 feet of me takes radiant damage

subclassfeature3.1.name: Warrior of the Gods
subclassfeature3.1.description: Spells restoring me to life (not undeath or anything else) don't need material comp.

subclassfeature6.name: Zealous Focus
subclassfeature6.description:
As a reaction when I fail a saving throw while raging, I can instead succeed on it
   Doing so immediately ends my rage and I can't rage again until I finish a short rest

subclassfeature10.name: Zealous Presence
subclassfeature10.description:
As an action, I howl in fury and unleash a battle cry infused with divine energy
   Allies within 60 ft of me gain adv. on attacks and saves until the start of my next turn

subclassfeature14.name: Rage Beyond Death
subclassfeature14.description:
While raging, having 0 hit points doesn't knock me unconscious
   I still must make death saves, and I suffer the normal effects of taking damage
   However, if I would die due to failing death saves, I don't die until my rage ends

subclassfeature3.name: Mantle of Inspiration
subclassfeature3.description:
As a bonus action, I expend one bardic inspiration die to aid those within 60 ft of me
   A number of allies equal to my Cha mod gain twice the die roll in temporary HP
   They can use a reaction to move their speed toward me, without opportunity attacks

subclassfeature3.1.name: Enthralling Performance
subclassfeature3.1.description:
By performing for at least 10 minutes, I can charm humanoids within 60 ft of me
   At the end of the performance, my Cha mod number of targets must make a Wis save
   On a fail, a target is charmed for 1 hour; If success, it doesn't knows I tried to charm it
   While charmed, the target idolizes me, hinders those opposing me, and avoids violence
   This lasts until a target takes damage, I attack it, or if it sees me attacking its allies

subclassfeature6.name: Mantle of Majesty
subclassfeature6.description:
As a bonus action, I take on an appearance of unearthly beauty for 1 minute
   As a bonus action during this time, I can cast Command without using a spell slot
   Creatures charmed by me automatically fail their saves against these Command spells

command.description: 1 crea save (fails save if charmed) or follow one word command, e.g. approach, drop, flee, halt
command.changes: Using my Mantle of Majesty class feature, I can cast Command as a bonus action once per long rest without using a spell slot, thus only affect a single target.

subclassfeature14.name: Unbreakable Majesty
subclassfeature14.description:
As an action, I can cast Sanctuary on myself without using a spell slot
   If a creature fails its save to this, I gain adv. on all Cha checks against it for 1 min
   In addition, the target has disadv. on saves it makes against my spells on my next turn

sanctuary.description: Any trying to atk/target me must save or fail, dis. on save vs. spell I cast next turn, I adv. on Cha vs. it
sanctuary.changes: Using my Unbreakable Majesty class feature, I can cast Sanctuary once per short rest without using a spell slot, but only on myself.

subclassfeature3.name: Venomous Blades
subclassfeature3.description:
When I hit with a weapon attack, I can expend a bardic inspiration die to add damage
   I roll the inspiration die twice, dealing the total in Poison damage to the target
   I can do this no more than once per round on my turn

subclassfeature3.1.name: Venomous Words
subclassfeature3.1.description:
By speaking in private with a humanoid for at least 10 minutes, I can try to frighten it
   After the conversation, the target must make a Wisdom save or be frightened of me
   If the save is successful, the target doesn't know I try to frighten it
   While frightened, the target avoids the company of others, including its allies
   The target also tries to hide in the most secret, safest place available to it
   This lasts for 1 hour or until it is attacked/damaged, or if it sees me attacking its allies

subclassfeature6.name: Mantle of Whispers
subclassfeature6.description:
As a reaction when a creature dies within 5 ft or by my hand, I can capture its shadow
   I can use shadows of those with the same type and size as me (or Medium if I'm Small)
   I can have only one captured shadow at a time and I can don it as a shadow disguise

shadow disguise.name: Shadow Disguise
shadow disguise.description:
As an action, I can don a shadow that I captured as a disguise for 1 hour or until I stop it
   I take on the creature's appearance and I can access its surface memories, but not secrets
   I have access to information that it would would freely share with a casual acquaintance
   This is enough that I can pass myself off as the creature by drawing on its memories
   Anybody can see through the disguise with a Wis (Insight) check vs. my Cha (Deception) +5
   The knowledge disappears when the disguise ends

subclassfeature14.name: Shadow Lore
subclassfeature14.description:
As an action, I whisper to a creature within 30 ft that can hear and understand me
   Only the target can hear me; It must make a Wisdom save or be charmed by me
   If failed, it thinks I know its most mortifying secret, otherwise it only hears mumbling
   While charmed, the target obeys my commands, but won't risk its life or fight for me
   This lasts for 8 hours or until I or my allies attack or damage it
   When the effect ends, the target has no idea why it was so afraid of me

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature1.description: I gain proficiency with heavy armor

subclassfeature1.1.name: Blessing of the Forge
subclassfeature1.1.description:
At the end of a long rest, I can imbue magic into a nonmagical weapon or armor
   It becomes magical: +1 AC if armor, or +1 to attack and damage rolls if a weapon
   This lasts until the end of my next long rest

subclassfeature2.name: Channel Divinity: Artisan's Blessing
subclassfeature2.description:
During a short rest, I can conduct a ritual to craft an item that is at least part metal
   The object can be worth up to 100 gp, and I must expend metals of equal value to it
   The item can be an exact duplicate of a nonmagical item if I possess the original

subclassfeature6.name: Soul of the Forge
subclassfeature6.description:
I gain a +1 AC while wearing medium or heavy armor, and resistance to fire damage
   When I hit a construct with an attack, I deal my cleric level in additional force damage

extraAC.text: I gain a +1 bonus to AC while I'm wearing medium or heavy armor.

subclassfeature8.name: Divine Strike
subclassfeature8.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature with a weapon attack, I can do extra damage

atkAdd: Once per turn, I can have one of my weapon attacks that hit do extra fire damage.

subclassfeature17.name: Saint of Forge and Fire
subclassfeature17.description:
I gain immunity to fire damage
   If wearing heavy armor, I'm resistant to nonmagical bludg./piercing/slashing damage

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature1.description: I gain proficiency with heavy armor

subclassfeature1.1.name: Circle of Mortality
subclassfeature1.1.description:
Spells I cast to heal a living creature at 0 HP have their dice count as their max result
   As a bonus action, I can cast the Spare the Dying cantrip, if I know it

spare the dying.changes: I can cast spare the dying as a bonus action instead of an action.

subclassfeature1.2.name: Eyes of the Grave
subclassfeature1.2.description:
By spending 1 min in uninterrupted contemplation, I sense undead within 1 mile
   I learn their number, distance, and direction from me
   In addition, I know the creature type of the one with the highest CR

subclassfeature2.name: Channel Divinity: Path to the Grave
subclassfeature2.description:
As an action, I can touch a creature to make it take extra damage from one attack
   It is vulnerable to all the damage from the next spell or attack from me or an ally
   This only applies to the first time that source inflicts damage, and then ends
   If the creature has resistance or is immune to the damage, it instead loses it

subclassfeature6.name: Sentinel at Death's Door
subclassfeature6.description: As a reaction, I turn a critical hit to me or an ally I see within 30 ft to a normal hit

subclassfeature8.name: Divine Strike
subclassfeature8.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature with a weapon attack, I can do extra damage

atkAdd: Once per turn, I can have one of my weapon attacks that hit do extra necrotic damage.

subclassfeature17.name: Keeper of Souls
subclassfeature17.description:
Once per round, if I'm not incapacitated, I can manipulate the energy of the dying
   When an enemy I can see dies within 30 ft of me, I or an ally within 30 ft regain HP
   The HP regained is equal to the enemy's number of Hit Dice

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature1.description: I gain proficiency with heavy armor

subclassfeature1.1.name: Shield of the Faithful
subclassfeature1.1.description:
As a reaction, when someone within 5 ft of me is attacked, I impose disadv. on the roll
   To do this, I must be able to see both the attacker and the target

subclassfeature2.name: Channel Divinity: Radiant Defense
subclassfeature2.description:
As an action, I channel blessed energy into an ally that I can see within 30 ft of me
   The first time the ally is hit within the next minute, the attacker takes radiant damage

subclassfeature6.name: Blessed Healer
subclassfeature6.description: When I restore HP to another with a spell, I regain 2 + the spell (slot) level in HP

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){var n=a.description;switch(e){case"life transference":a.description=a.description.replace("Necrotic","Necro").replace(", and",",")+"; I then regain 2+SL HP";break;case"mass heal":a.description="Heal 700 HP, split over crea in range, each then +11 HP; also cures blind, deaf, diseases; I heal +11 HP";break;case"power word heal":a.description=a.description.replace(/heals all.*/i,"full HP; not charmed, frightened, paralyzed, stunned; can stand up as rea; if other, I heal 2+SL");break;case"regenerate":a.description=a.description.replace(" for rest of duration","");case"heal":a.description=a.description.replace("all diseases","diseases");case"cure wounds":case"healing word":case"mass cure wounds":case"mass healing word":case"prayer of healing":a.description=a.description.replace(/creatures?/i,"crea").replace("within","in").replace("spellcasting ability modifier","spellcasting ability mod")+"; if other, I heal 2+SL"}return n!==a.description}

spellAdd: When I cast a spell that restores hit points to another creature than myself at the moment of casting, I also heal 2 + the level of the spell slot (or spell slot equivalent) hit points.

subclassfeature8.name: Divine Strike
subclassfeature8.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature with a weapon attack, I can do extra damage

atkAdd: Once per turn, I can have one of my weapon attacks that hit do extra radiant damage.

subclassfeature17.name: Indomitable Defense
subclassfeature17.description:
I gain resistance to two of: bludgeoning, necrotic, piercing, radiant, or slashing damage
   Whenever I finish a short or long rest, I can change the damage types chosen
   As an action, I can transfer both resistances to one creature I touch
   As a bonus action, I can transfer the resistances back to myself
   Otherwise, the creature keeps this resistance until the end of my next short or long rest

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells
spellcastingExtra: protection from evil and good legacy

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

legacySpells: protection from evil and good legacy

subclassfeature2.name: Balm of the Summer Court
subclassfeature2.description:
I have a pool of fey energy represented by a number of d6s equal to my druid level
   As a bonus action, I can spend dice to heal an ally within 120 ft of me that I can see
   I can spend up to half my druid level worth of dice from the pool at once
   The ally heals an amount equal to the total rolled and gains 1 temp HP per die spent
   In addition, the ally gains +5 ft speed per die spent, which lasts for 1 minute

subclassfeature6.name: Hearth of Moonlight and Shadow
subclassfeature6.description:
At the start of a short or long rest, I can create a warded area of 30-ft radius
   Within this area, my allies and I gain +5 on Wis (Perception) checks to detect creatures
   Also, any light from open flames is not visible from outside the area
   This effect lasts until the end of the rest or when I leave the area

subclassfeature10.name: Hidden Paths
subclassfeature10.description:
On my turn, I can teleport up to 30 ft to where I can see; Moved distance costs speed
   As an action, I can teleport a willing ally I touch up to 30 ft to a spot I can see
   Once I used either option, I can't use this feature again until 1d4 rounds have passed

subclassfeature14.name: Purifying Light
subclassfeature14.description:
When I use a spell slot with a spell to restores HP, I can use Dispel Magic on the target
   The Dispel Magic counts as if being cast with the same spell slot as the healing spell
   Each creature effected by the Dispel Magic costs as one use of this feature

subclassfeature2.name: Beast Speech
subclassfeature2.description:
I can talk with beasts, they understand me and I them, to the limit of their intelligence
   This doesn't automatically make me friends with all beasts

subclassfeature2.1.name: Spirit Bond
subclassfeature2.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can summon a spirit to an empty space within 60 ft that I can see
   The Bear, Hawk, or Wolf spirit, creates a 30-ft radius aura and persist for 1 minute
   It doesn't occupy space, is immobile, and counts as neither a creature nor an object
    - Bear: my allies in the area and I instantly gain 5 + my druid level in temp HP
       While in the aura, my allies and I gain advantage on Strength checks and saves
    - Hawk: my allies and I gain advantage on attacks against targets in the aura
    - Wolf: my allies and I gain advantage on ability checks to detect targets in the aura
       If I cast a healing spell with a spell slot, allies in the aura heal my druid level in HP

subclassfeature6.name: Mighty Summoner
subclassfeature6.description: Beast I summon with my spells have +2 HP per HD and their attacks count as magical

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){switch(e){case"conjure animals":case"conjure fey":return a.description+="; each +2 HP/HD, magical natural attacks",!0;case"conjure woodland beings":return a.description=a.description.replace(/fey.*/,"fey; obeys commands if its align. agrees; breaks free if break conc.; +2 HP/HD, magic atks"),!0}}

spellAdd: When I use a spell that restores hit points, it restores an additional 2 + the level of the spell slot (or spell slot equivalent) used to cast the spell.

subclassfeature10.name: Guardian Spirit
subclassfeature10.description: Whenever I finish a long rest, I gain the benefits of a Death Ward spell for 24 hours

death ward.description: Once, when I drops to 0 HP I drops to 1 HP instead; or negates first instantaneous kill effect
death ward.changes: Whenever I finish a long rest, I gain the benefits of a Death Ward spell for 24 hours.

subclassfeature14.name: Faithful Summons
subclassfeature14.description:
When I am reduced to 0 HP or incapacitated against my will, I can summon protectors
   I gain the benefits of a Conjure Animals spell as if cast with a 9th-level spell slot
   It summons 4 beast of my choice with CR 2 or lower within 20 ft of me for 1 hour
   If they receive no commands from me, they protect me from harm and attack foes

subclassfeature2.name: Harvest's Scythe
subclassfeature2.description:
I have a pool of energy represented by a number of d10s equal to my druid level
   When I roll damage for a spell, I can do extra necrotic damage with dice from the pool
   I can spend up to half my druid level worth of dice from the pool at once
   If I any hostiles die from an augmented spell, I can heal one ally I can see within 30 ft
   The ally regains 2 HP per die spent; or 5 HP per die if one of the slain was undead

subclassfeature6.name: Speech Beyond the Grave
subclassfeature6.description:
Once per short rest, I can cast Speak with Dead without spell slots or material comp.
   The target and I can understand each other, regardless of language or intelligence

speak with dead.changes: I can cast this spell once per short rest without requiring material components.

subclassfeature10.name: Watcher at the Threshold
subclassfeature10.description:
I gain resistance to necrotic and radiant damage
   While I'm not incapacitated, allies within 30 ft of me gain adv. on their death saves

subclassfeature14.name: Paths of the Dead
subclassfeature14.description: Once per short rest, I can cast Etherealness without needing a spell slot

etherealness.description: I go to Ethereal Plane; move there, but able to perceive 60 ft into the normal plane
etherealness.changes: Using my Paths of the Dead class feature I can cast Etherealness once per short rest without needing a spell slot, thus can only target 1 creature.

subclassfeature3.name: Arcane Arrow
subclassfeature3.description:
As a bonus action, I can create one magical arrow that I can fire with a bow
   A shot with the arrow counts as magical and does additional force damage on a hit
   When I create the arrow, I can apply one of my known Arcane Shots on it
   This arrow lasts until the end of my turn or until I hit or miss a target with it

atkAdd: If I include the words 'Arcane Arrow' in a longbow or shortbow's name, it gets an added description of the damage this Arcane Arrow adds.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Arcane Shot
subclassfeature3.1.description: Use the "Choose Feature" button above to add Arcane Shots to the third page

beguiling arrow.name: Beguiling Arrow
beguiling arrow.description:
[Enchantment]
   If the arrow hits, I choose an ally withing 30 feet of the target
   The target can't attack the chosen ally or include the ally in any harmful area of effects
   This effect stops if the target is immune to charm effects or the ally damages the target

brute bane arrow.name: Brute Bane Arrow
brute bane arrow.description:
[Necromancy]
   If the arrow hits, the target's attacks deal half damage until the end of my next turn
   Only attacks that deal bludgeoning, piercing or slashing damage are halved

bursting arrow.name: Bursting Arrow
bursting arrow.description:
[Evocation]
   If the arrow hits, all creatures within 10 ft of the target creature take 2d6 force damage

defending arrow.name: Defending Arrow
defending arrow.description:
[Abjuration]
   If the arrow hits, the target has disadv. on its next attack before the end of my next turn

grasping arrow.name: Grasping Arrow
grasping arrow.description:
[Conjuration]
   If the arrow hits, the target is wrapped with grasping, thorny brambles for 1 minute
   The target has -10 ft speed; It takes 2d6 slashing damage when moving more than 1 ft
   As an action, the target or a creature can remove the brambles with a DC 10 Str check

piercing arrow.name: Piercing Arrow
piercing arrow.description:
[Transmutation]
   The arrow transform into an ethereal dart that creates a line of 1 ft wide and 30 ft long
   I then make a separate attack using my Arcane Arrow against each creature in that line

seeking arrow.name: Seeking Arrow
seeking arrow.description:
[Divination]
   As an action, I can make a ranged attack against a creature I have seen in the last minute
   The seeking arrow moves around corners and obstacles to hit the target
   The attack ignores 1/2 and 3/4 cover and disadvantage from range or being out of sight
   The attack misses if the target is too far away or there is no path for the arrow to travel
   I know if the arrow hits the target, but don't learn the location unless it's in line of sight

shadow arrow.name: Shadow Arrow
shadow arrow.description:
[Illusion]
   If the arrow hits, the target can't see beyond 30 ft until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature3.2.name: Archer's Lore
subclassfeature3.2.description:
I gain proficiency with two skills
   I can choose from: Arcana, Athletics, Nature, Perception, Stealth, or Survival
subclassfeature3.2.skillstxt: Choose two from Arcana, Athletics, Nature, Perception, Stealth, and Survival

subclassfeature7.name: Conjure Arrows
subclassfeature7.description:
As an action, I can create up to 20 nonmagical arrows that remain for 10 minutes
   The arrows vanish if I use this feature again with 10 minutes

subclassfeature15.name: Ever-Ready Arrow
subclassfeature15.description: I regain one use of Arcane Arrow one minute after I expend my last remaining use of it

subclassfeature3.name: Born in the Saddle
subclassfeature3.description:
Mounting or dismounting a creature costs me only 5 ft of movement
   I have advantage on saving throws made to avoid falling off my mount
   If I fall off my mount for less than 10 ft while not incapacitated, I land on my feet

subclassfeature3.1.name: Implacable Mark
subclassfeature3.1.description:
If I hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, I mark it until the end of my next turn
   A marked target has disadv. on any attacks vs. those that didn't mark it
   I can attack the target I marked if it is within 5 ft of me and does one of the following:
    - It moves at least 1 foot on its turn
    - It makes an attack that it suffers disadv. on from being marked
   This attack uses my reaction, has adv., and adds my fighter level as extra damage
   I can still do this if I already used my reaction this round, but not this turn

atkCalc.body: function(e,a,t){a.isMeleeWeapon&&classes.known.fighter&&2<classes.known.fighter.level&&/\b(implacable.?mark|marked)\b/i.test(a.WeaponTextName)&&(t.extraDmg+=classes.known.fighter.level)}

atkCalc: If I include the words 'Implacable Mark' or 'Marked' in the name of a melee weapon, it gets my fighter level added to its Damage.

subclassfeature7.name: Noble Cavalry
subclassfeature7.description:
I gain proficiency with two skills or one language
   I can choose the skills from: Animal Handling, History, Insight, Persuasion, and Religion
choices: 2 Skill proficiencies: Animal Handling, History, Insight, Persuasion, or Religion

language proficiency.name: Noble Cavalry
language proficiency.description: I learn one language of my choice

2 skill proficiencies: animal handling,.name: Noble Cavalry
2 skill proficiencies: animal handling,.description: I gain 2 skill proficiencies: Animal Handling, History, Insight, Persuasion, or Religion
2 skill proficiencies: animal handling,.skillstxt: Choose two from: Animal Handling, History, Insight, Persuasion, or Religion

subclassfeature10.name: Hold the Line
subclassfeature10.description:
As a reaction when a creature within 5 ft of me moves at least 1 ft, I can attack it
   This attack is made with a melee weapon attack and deals extra damage on a hit
   If this hits, the attack reduces the target's speed to 0 until the end of this turn

atkCalc.body: function(e,a,t){a.isMeleeWeapon&&classes.known.fighter&&9<classes.known.fighter.level&&/holds?.the.line/i.test(a.WeaponTextName)&&(t.extraDmg+=Math.floor(classes.known.fighter.level/2))}

atkCalc: If I include the words 'Hold the Line' in the name of a melee weapon, it gets half my fighter level added to its Damage.

subclassfeature15.name: Rapid Strike
subclassfeature15.description:
If I have adv. on an attack, I can forgo it to make an extra attack as a bonus action
   This attack has to be with the same weapon against the same target

subclassfeature18.name: Defender's Blade
subclassfeature18.description:
I can do opportunity attacks if I already used my reaction this round, but not this turn
   I gain a +1 bonus to AC when I'm wearing heavy armor

extraAC.text: I gain a +1 bonus to AC while I'm wearing heavy armor.

subclassfeature3.name: Fighting Spirit
subclassfeature3.description:
As a bonus action, I can give myself benefits that last until the end of my next turn
   I then gain adv. on my attacks and resistance to bludgeoning/piercing/slashing damage

subclassfeature7.name: Elegant Courtier
subclassfeature7.description:
I can add my Wis modifier to any Cha check to persuade anyone of a high social station
   I gain proficiency with either one language or the History, Insight, or Persuasion skill
choices: Skill proficiency: History, Insight, or Persuasion

language proficiency.name: Elegant Courtier
language proficiency.description:
I can add my Wis modifier to any Cha check to persuade anyone of a high social station
   I gain proficiency with one language of my choice

skill proficiency: history, insight, or.name: Elegant Courtier
skill proficiency: history, insight, or.description:
I can add my Wis modifier to any Cha check to persuade anyone of a high social station
   I gain proficiency with one skill: History, Insight, or Persuasion
skill proficiency: history, insight, or.skillstxt: Choose one from: History, Insight, or Persuasion

subclassfeature10.name: Unbreakable Will
subclassfeature10.description: I gain proficiency with Wis saves, or if I'm already proficient, either Int or Cha saves

subclassfeature15.name: Rapid Strike
subclassfeature15.description:
If I have adv. on an attack, I can forgo it to make an extra attack as a bonus action
   This attack has to be with the same weapon against the same target

subclassfeature18.name: Strength Before Death
subclassfeature18.description:
If I take damage that would reduce me to 0 HP, I can delay that damage
   I then immediately take a bonus turn, interrupting the current turn
   I don't take the delayed damage until the bonus turn ends and can affect that damage

subclassfeature3.name: Steady Aim
subclassfeature3.description:
As a bonus action, I can carefully aim my ranged weapon on a target I can see in range
   Until the end of my turn, my attacks with this weapon on that target get to:
   Ignore half and three-quarter cover; Add 2 + half fighter level damage per hit

atkAdd: If I include the words 'Steady Aim' in the name of a ranged weapon, it gets 2 + half my fighter level added to its Damage, and the fact that it ignores half and three-quarter cover added to its description.

atkCalc.body: function(e,a,t){a.isRangedWeapon&&classes.known.fighter&&2<classes.known.fighter.level&&/steady.{0,3}aim/i.test(a.WeaponTextName)&&(t.extraDmg+=2+Math.floor(classes.known.fighter.level/2))}

subclassfeature7.name: Careful Eyes
subclassfeature7.description:
As a bonus action, I can take the Search action
   I gain proficiency with one skill, Perception, Investigation, or Survival
subclassfeature7.skillstxt: Choose one from: Perception, Investigation, or Survival

subclassfeature10.name: Close-Quarters Shooting
subclassfeature10.description:
I don't have disadvantage when making a ranged attack while within 5 ft of a hostile
   A hostile within 5 ft that I hit with a ranged attack on my turn, can't take reactions
   This lasts until the end of my turn

subclassfeature15.name: Rapid Strike
subclassfeature15.description:
If I have adv. on an attack, I can forgo it to make an extra attack as a bonus action
   This attack has to be with the same weapon against the same target

subclassfeature18.name: Snap Shot
subclassfeature18.description: I can make one more ranged attack with my Attack action on my first turn of combat

subclassfeature3.name: Path of the Kensei
subclassfeature3.description:
[3 martial weapons proficiencies]
   Martial weapons I am proficient with count as kensei weapons for me
   With these, I can use Dex instead of Str and use the Martial Arts damage die
   As a bonus action, my kensei weapon deal +1d4 bludg. damage for an Attack action

atkAdd.body: function(e,a){if(classes.known.monk&&2<classes.known.monk.level&&e.Proficiency&&!a.isSpell&&"shortsword"!==a.baseWeaponName&&/martial/i.test(a.theWea.type)){n=(n=classes.known.monk.level)<5?4:n<11?6:n<17?8:10;try{var t=eval_ish(e.Damage_Die.replace("d","*"))}catch(e){t="x"}(isNaN(t)||t<n)&&(e.Damage_Die="1d"+n),e.Mod=a.StrDex,e.Description+=(e.Description?"; ":"")+"As bonus action with Attack action, +1d4 bludg. damage"}var n}

atkAdd:
I can use either Strength or Dexterity and my Martial Arts damage die in place of the normal damage die for any martial weapons I am proficient with (Kensei Weapons).
 • If I score a hit with one of these kensei weapons as part of an Attack action, I can take a bonus action to have that hit, and any other hit after that as part of the same action, do +1d4 bludgeoning damage.

kensei defense.name: Kensei Defense
kensei defense.description:
If I make an unarmed strike with an Attack action, I can use my kensei weapon to defend
   Until the start of my next turn, if I'm not incapacitated, I gain +2 AC while holding it

ki-empowered strikes.name: One with the Blade
ki-empowered strikes.description: My unarmed strikes and kensei weapon attacks count as magical

atkAdd: My unarmed strikes and Kensei Weapons count as magical for overcoming resistances and immunities.

subclassfeature6.name: Precise Strike
subclassfeature6.description:
As a bonus action, I can focus my attention on one creature I can see within 30 ft
   This turn, I double my proficiency bonus on my next weapon attack against that mark

atkCalc.body: function(e,a,t){a.isSpell||a.isDC||!/precise.{0,3}strike/i.test(a.WeaponTextName)||(t.prof*=2)}

atkCalc: If I include the words 'Precise Strike' in a weapon's name, or description it gets twice my proficiency bonus added to its To Hit instead of only once.

sharpen the blade.name: Sharpen the Blade
sharpen the blade.description:
[1 to 3 ki points]
   As a bonus action, I can grant my weapon a bonus to attack and damage rolls
   This bonus is equal to the number of ki points I spend; It lasts for 1 minute

subclassfeature17.name: Unerring Accuracy
subclassfeature17.description: On each of my turns, I can reroll one weapon attack roll I make that misses

subclassfeature3.name: Path of Tranquility
subclassfeature3.description: I cast Sanctuary on me, no material comp., lasts 8 hours, hostiles must save every hour

sanctuary.description: I'm warded; any who want to attack/target must first make save; doesn't protect vs. area spells
sanctuary.changes: Using my Path of Tranquility class feature I can cast Sanctuary without requiring material components and lasting for 8 hours, but it only affects myself and hostiles can attempt a new save every hour.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Healing Hands
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As an action, I use points to heal living creature; or 5 points to cure one poison/disease
   With Flurry of Blows, I can replace one unarmed strike with a use of this feature

subclassfeature6.name: Emissary of Peace
subclassfeature6.description:
[Performance or Persuasion prof]
   I get adv. on Cha checks to calm or counsel peace; not with Deception or Intimidation
subclassfeature6.skillstxt: Choose one from: Performance or Persuasion

douse the flames of war.name: Douse the Flames of War
douse the flames of war.description:
As an action, a creature I touch must make a Wisdom save or have no violent impulses
   If the target is missing any HP it succeeds on the save; The effect lasts for 1 minute
   During this time, it can't attack or cast spells that deal damage or force a saving throw
   This effect ends if the target is attacked, takes damage, or is forced to make a saving throw
   It also ends if the target witnesses any of those things happening to its allies

subclassfeature17.name: Anger of a Gentle Soul
subclassfeature17.description: As a reaction if another I see goes to 0 HP, I get bonus damage until my next turn ends

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Conquering Strike
subclassfeature3.description:
I can use my channel divinity to break a foe's will that I hit with my melee weapon
   The target must make a Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute
   The target can repeat this save at the end of each or its turn to end the effect

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Guided Strike
subclassfeature3.1.description: When I make an attack roll, I can add a +10 bonus to the roll after seeing the d20 roll

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of Conquest
subclassfeature7.description: While I'm not incapacitated, enemies in range have disadv. on saves vs. being frightened

subclassfeature15.name: Implacable Spirit
subclassfeature15.description: I can't be charmed

subclassfeature20.name: Invincible Conqueror
subclassfeature20.description:
As an action, I can gain the following benefits for 1 minute:
    - I have resistance all damage
    - I can make an additional attack as part of my Attack action
    - My melee weapons score critical hits on a roll of 19 or 20

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Conjure Duplicate
subclassfeature3.description:
As an action, I create 1 illusory duplicate of myself within 30 ft of me for 1 min (conc)
   As a bonus action, I can move it up to 30 ft to a space I can see within 120 ft of me
   I can cast spells as though I was in its space, but still have to use my own senses
   I have advantage on attacks if the target is within 5 ft of the duplicate and me

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Poison Strike
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, I imbue one weapon or piece of ammunition with poison upon touch
   This poison lasts for 1 minute and will affect the next time I hit a target with it
   The target takes 2d10 + my paladin level poison damage immediately after the hit
   I automatically roll 20 on the 2d10 if I have advantage on the attack roll

atkAdd: If I include the words 'Poison Strike' in a weapon's name, it gets an added description of the extra 2d10 + paladin level of poison damage it would do. If I have advantage on the attack, I can treat the 2d10 as rolling 20 in total.

subclassfeature7.name: Cull the Herd
subclassfeature7.description: I have adv. on melee attacks against creatures that have an ally of it within 5 ft of it

subclassfeature7.1.name: Treacherous Strike
subclassfeature7.1.description:
As a reaction when a creature within 5 ft misses me, I can redirect the attack
   If it can be charmed, it rerolls the attack on a target of my choice within 5 ft of it

subclassfeature15.name: Blackguard's Escape
subclassfeature15.description:
As a reaction after I am hit by an attack, I can teleport up to 60 ft to a spot I can see
   In doing this, I also become invisible (as the spell) until the end of my next turn

icon of deceit.name: Icon of Deceit
icon of deceit.description:
As an action, I can gain the following benefits for 1 minute:
    - I become invisible
    - If I have adv. on an attack, I do 20 extra damage with it if it hits
    - If a creature hits me on its turn, it must make a Wis save or I control its next action
       Provided it can be charmed and I am not incapacitated when it takes the action

subclassfeature3.name: Planar magic
subclassfeature3.description:
I add a spell to my known spells at level 3, 5, 9, 13, and 17
   These count as ranger spells, but do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.1.name: Planar Walker
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, I choose an enemy within 30 ft of me that I can see
   Until the end of this turn, my attack against that enemy ignore damage resistances
   In addition, the first time I hit it this turn, it takes an extra 1d6 force damage

subclassfeature3.2.name: Portal Lore
subclassfeature3.2.description:
As an action, I sense the distance and direction to any planar portals within 1000 ft
   I also sense to which plane the portal leads to; I can't sense details if obscured by magic
   I can use this feature additional times by expending spell slots of 2nd level or higher

subclassfeature7.name: Ethereal Step
subclassfeature7.description: As a bonus action, I can cast the Etherealness spell, which lasts until the end of the turn

etherealness.description: I go to Ethereal Plane; move there, but able to perceive 60 ft into the normal plane
etherealness.changes: Using my Ethereal Step class feature I can cast Etherealness as a bonus action once per short rest, but it only affects myself and lasts until the end of my turn.

subclassfeature11.name: Distant Strike
subclassfeature11.description:
With the Attack action, I can teleport 10 ft before each attack, to a place I can see
   If I attack two different creatures with this action, I get an extra attack against a third

subclassfeature15.name: Spectral Defense
subclassfeature15.description: As a reaction when I take damage, I can halve that damage against me

subclassfeature3.name: Guardian magic
subclassfeature3.description: I get bonus spells known, which do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.1.name: Guardian Soul
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, I transform to or from a guardian form, changing me as follows:
    - I grow to Large size, all my movement is reduced to 5 ft, and I get +5 ft reach
    - I gain half my ranger level in temporary HP at the start of each of my turns
   This ends when I'm incapacitated; When it ends, I lose all temporary HP I got from it

subclassfeature3.2.name: Piercing Thorns
subclassfeature3.2.description: Once each turn, a hit from my weapon attack can deal 1d6 extra piercing damage

atkAdd: My weapon attacks can deal 1d6 extra piercing damage once per turn.

subclassfeature7.name: Ancient Fortitude
subclassfeature7.description:
When I assume my guardian form, my HP & max HP increase by twice my ranger level
   When I leave the form, my max HP reverts back, and any excess HP I have is lost

subclassfeature11.name: Rooted Defense
subclassfeature11.description: While in guardian form, the ground within 30 ft of me is difficult terrain for hostiles

subclassfeature15.name: Guardian Aura
subclassfeature15.description:
While I'm in my guardian form, I heal allies that start their turn within 30 ft of me
   They heal half my ranger level if they are below half HP and not undead or constructs

subclassfeature3.name: Planar magic
subclassfeature3.description:
I add a spell to my known spells at level 3, 5, 9, 13, and 17
   These count as ranger spells, but do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.1.name: Planar Walker
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, I choose an enemy within 30 ft of me that I can see
   Until the end of this turn, my attack against that enemy ignore damage resistances
   In addition, the first time I hit it this turn, it takes an extra 1d6 force damage

subclassfeature3.2.name: Portal Lore
subclassfeature3.2.description:
As an action, I sense the distance and direction to any planar portals within 1000 ft
   I also sense to which plane the portal leads to; I can't sense details if obscured by magic
   I can use this feature additional times by expending spell slots of 2nd level or higher

subclassfeature7.name: Ethereal Step
subclassfeature7.description: As a bonus action, I can cast the Etherealness spell, which lasts until the end of the turn

etherealness.description: I go to Ethereal Plane; move there, but able to perceive 60 ft into the normal plane
etherealness.changes: Using my Ethereal Step class feature I can cast Etherealness as a bonus action once per short rest, but it only affects myself and lasts until the end of my turn.

subclassfeature11.name: Distant Strike
subclassfeature11.description:
With the Attack action, I can teleport 10 ft before each attack, to a place I can see
   If I attack two different creatures with this action, I get an extra attack against a third

subclassfeature15.name: Spectral Defense
subclassfeature15.description: As a reaction when I take damage, I can halve that damage against me

subclassfeature3.name: Guardian magic
subclassfeature3.description: I get bonus spells known, which do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.1.name: Guardian Soul
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, I transform to or from a guardian form, changing me as follows:
    - I grow to Large size, all my movement is reduced to 5 ft, and I get +5 ft reach
    - I gain half my ranger level in temporary HP at the start of each of my turns
   This ends when I'm incapacitated; When it ends, I lose all temporary HP I got from it

subclassfeature3.2.name: Piercing Thorns
subclassfeature3.2.description: Once each turn, a hit from my weapon attack can deal 1d6 extra piercing damage

atkAdd: My weapon attacks can deal 1d6 extra piercing damage once per turn.

subclassfeature7.name: Ancient Fortitude
subclassfeature7.description:
When I assume my guardian form, my HP & max HP increase by twice my ranger level
   When I leave the form, my max HP reverts back, and any excess HP I have is lost

subclassfeature11.name: Rooted Defense
subclassfeature11.description: While in guardian form, the ground within 30 ft of me is difficult terrain for hostiles

subclassfeature15.name: Guardian Aura
subclassfeature15.description:
While I'm in my guardian form, I heal allies that start their turn within 30 ft of me
   They heal half my ranger level if they are below half HP and not undead or constructs

subclassfeature3.name: Skirmisher
subclassfeature3.description:
As a reaction when a hostile ends its turn within 5 ft of me, I can move half my speed
   This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity

subclassfeature3.1.name: Survivalist
subclassfeature3.1.description: I gain proficiency and expertise with the Nature and Survival skills

subclassfeature9.name: Superior Mobility
subclassfeature9.description: I gain +10 ft to my walking speed (and swimming/climbing speed, if applicable)

subclassfeature13.name: Ambush Master
subclassfeature13.description:
As a bonus action in the first combat round with a surprised foe, I can lead the ambush
   If I do so, allies who can see me gets +5 to their initiative roll, up to my initiative value
   Also, each ally gains +10 ft to its speed that lasts until the end their next turn

subclassfeature17.name: Sudden Strike
subclassfeature17.description:
With the Attack action, I can make one additional attack as a bonus action
   This attack can benefit from my Sneak Attack even if I already used it this turn
   However, I still can't use Sneak Attack on a single target more than once per turn

subclassfeature1.name: Divine Magic
subclassfeature1.description:
When I select my 1st level or higher spells, I can also pick spells from the cleric spell list
   These cleric spells count as sorcerer spells for me

subclassfeature1.1.name: Supernatural Resilience
subclassfeature1.1.description: My hit point maximum increases by an amount equal to my sorcerer level

subclassfeature1.2.name: Favored by the Gods
subclassfeature1.2.description: If I fail a saving throw or miss with an attack roll, I can add 2d4 to the total

subclassfeature6.name: Blessed Countenance
subclassfeature6.description:
Choose an otherworldly quality using the "Choose Feature" button above
   When my proficiency bonus applies to a Charisma check, I double that bonus

beautiful.name: Beautiful
beautiful.description:
My appearance takes on an otherworldly quality of beauty
   When my proficiency bonus applies to a Charisma check, I double that bonus

youthful.name: Youthful
youthful.description:
My appearance takes on an otherworldly quality of youthfulness
   When my proficiency bonus applies to a Charisma check, I double that bonus

kind.name: Kind
kind.description:
My appearance takes on an otherworldly quality of kindness
   When my proficiency bonus applies to a Charisma check, I double that bonus

imposing.name: Imposing
imposing.description:
My appearance takes on an otherworldly quality of imposingness
   When my proficiency bonus applies to a Charisma check, I double that bonus

subclassfeature6.skillstxt: I gain expertise in any Charisma-based skill I'm proficient with

subclassfeature14.name: Divine Purity
subclassfeature14.description: I become immune to disease and poison

subclassfeature18.name: Unearthly Recovery
subclassfeature18.description:
As a bonus action when I have less than half of my max HP, I can heal myself
   I regain a number of HP equal to half my maximum hit points

subclassfeature1.name: Ignite
subclassfeature1.description: As an action, I can magically ignite a flammable object by touching it with my hand

subclassfeature1.1.name: Mantle of Flame
subclassfeature1.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can wreathe myself in fire for 1 minute, gaining these benefits:
    - I shed bright light in a 30-ft radius and dim light for an additional 30 ft
    - I deal my Charisma modifier in fire damage to all that touch me
    - I also deal this damage to all that hit me with a melee attack from within 5 ft
    - When I roll for fire damage on my turn, I add my Charisma damage to the result

subclassfeature6.name: Phoenix Spark
subclassfeature6.description:
As a reaction when I am reduced to 0 HP, I can draw on the phoenix to stay at 1 HP
   All creatures within 10 ft of me take half my sorcerer level + my Cha mod fire damage
   If I have Mantle of Flame active, this damage is my sorcerer level + twice my Cha mod
   If I use this feature, my Mantle of Flame immediately ends

subclassfeature14.name: Nourishing Fire
subclassfeature14.description:
When I cast a spell using a spell slot that includes a fire damage roll, I regain HP
   The HP regained is equal to the spell slot level + my Charisma modifier

subclassfeature18.name: Form of the Phoenix
subclassfeature18.description:
While my Mantle of Flame is active, I gain the following additional benefits:
   - I have a flying speed of 40 ft and can hover
   - I have resistance to all damage
   - If I use my Phoenix Spark, it deals an extra 20 fire damage to each creature

subclassfeature1.name: Soul of the Sea
subclassfeature1.description: I can breathe underwater and I have a swim speed equal to my walking speed

subclassfeature1.1.name: Curse of the Sea
subclassfeature1.1.description:
I can curse a target that I hit with a cantrip or that fails its save against my cantrip
   This lasts until the end of my next turn or until I curse another target like this
   Once per turn when I cast a spell, I can trigger an active curse, if a condition is met
    - If spell dealt cold damage to it, its has -15 ft speed until the end of my next turn
    - If the spell dealt lightning damage to it, that damage is increased with my Cha mod
    - If the spell moved the target, it is moved an additional 15 ft
   Only one of these effects can be applied, even if the spell meets multiple conditions
   If the spell triggering the curse is a cantrip, the target stays cursed for another round

subclassfeature6.name: Watery Defense
subclassfeature6.description:
I gain resistance to fire damage
   I can protect myself when an attack deals bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage
   As a reaction when that happens, I reduce the damage by my sorcerer level + Charisma
   I can then also move up to 30 ft without provoking opportunity attacks

subclassfeature14.name: Shifting Form
subclassfeature14.description:
I gain the ability to enter a liquid state while moving, squeezing through small spaces
   When I move on my turn, I take half damage from opportunity attacks
   I can move through any enemy's space, but can't willingly end my move in that space
   On my turn, I can move through any opening of at least 3 inches in diameter
   I can't end my move in a space smaller than one size category smaller than I am

subclassfeature18.name: Water Soul
subclassfeature18.description:
I no longer need to eat, drink, or sleep; Critical hits against me become normal hits
   I gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature1.description: I gain proficiency with shields, simple weapons and martial weapons

subclassfeature1.1.name: Metal Magic
subclassfeature1.1.description: My affinity for metal allows me to select from a broader range of spells

subclassfeature1.2.name: Stone's Durability
subclassfeature1.2.description:
My hit point maximum increases by an amount equal to my sorcerer level
   As an action, I can gain an AC of 13 + Constitution modifier + shield
   This AC lasts until I don armor, I'm incapacitated, or use a bonus action to end it

subclassfeature6.name: Stone Aegis
subclassfeature6.description:
As a bonus action, I can grant an aegis to an ally I can see within 60 ft of me
   The aegis reduces any bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage taken by the target
   This aegis lasts for 1 minute, until I use it again, or until I'm incapacitated
   As a reaction when the protected ally is attacked with a melee attack, I can teleport
   I can do this only if the attacker is within 60 ft of me and I can see it
   I teleport to an empty space next to it and make one melee weapon attack against it
   If this attack hits, the attack deals extra force damage

subclassfeature14.name: Stone's Edge
subclassfeature14.description:
Once per casting of a spell that deals damage, I can choose one creature damaged by it
   That creature takes extra force damage equal to half my sorcerer level

subclassfeature18.name: Earth Master's Aegis
subclassfeature18.description: My Stone's Aegis can now affect up to three creatures

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature1.name: Hex Warrior
subclassfeature1.description:
I gain proficiency with medium armor, shields, and martial weapons
   With one-handed melee weapons I can use Charisma instead of Strength or Dexterity

atkAdd: For melee weapons that lack the two-handed property, I can use my Charisma instead of Strength or Dexterity.

subclassfeature1.1.name: Hexblade's Curse
subclassfeature1.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can curse a creature I can see within 30 ft of me for 1 minute
    - I add my proficiency bonus to damage rolls against the cursed target
    - My attack rolls against the curse target score a critical hit on a roll of 19 and 20
    - If the target dies while cursed, I regain HP equal to my warlock level + Cha mod

atkAdd: If I include the word 'Hexblade' in the name of a weapon, the automation will treat the attack as being against a target of the Hexblade's Curse: adding my proficiency bonus to the damage and adding the increased chance of a critical hit to the description.

atkCalc.body: function(e,a,t){/hexblade/i.test(a.WeaponTextName)&&(t.extraDmg+=t.prof)}

subclassfeature6.name: Shadow Hound
subclassfeature6.description:
My shadow becomes a hound of pure darkness; Truesight reveals its nature
   As a bonus action, I can have it slip into the shadow of another I can see within 60 ft
   I know the distance/direction to the target; I ignore 1/2, 3/4 cover of the target
   My shadow returns to me if I use a bonus action to do so, I become incapacitated, 
   a spell is used to stop it, or if one of us moves to another plane of existence

subclassfeature10.name: Armor of Hexes
subclassfeature10.description: Targets affected by my hexblade's curse have a 50% of missing me with any attack roll

subclassfeature14.name: Master of Hexes
subclassfeature14.description:
I no longer need to rest to be able to use my Hexblade's Curse again
   However, when I curse a new target, the curse immediately ends on the previous target

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature1.name: Sentinel Raven
subclassfeature1.description:
I gain the services of a spirit in the form of a raven (using the stats of a raven)
   It always obeys my commands, rolls its own initiative, and can be slain
   While it's within 100 ft, I can telepathically speak with it and see/hear what it does
   While it's on my shoulder, I gain Darkvision 30 ft and add my Cha mod to Perception
   While it's on my shoulder, it can't be targeted, take damage, or take actions
   It vanishes if it is more than 5 miles away from me, it dies, or if I die
   If it dies, I gain advantage on all attack rolls against its killer for 24 hours
   After a short rest, I can recall it to me regardless of its location or if it died

addMod.text: While my sentinel raven is perched on my shoulder, I can add my Charisma modifier to Perception.

traits.name: Mimicry
traits.description: The raven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

traits.name: Sentinel
traits.description: The raven doesn't require sleep. While it is within 100 feet of me, it can awaken me from sleep as a bonus action.

traits.name: Shoulder Perch
traits.description: While perched on my shoulder, the raven can't be targeted by any attack or other harmful effect; only I can cast spells on it; it can't take damage; and it is incapacitated. It then also grants me darkvision 30 ft and a bonus to my Wisdom (Perception) equal to my Charisma modifier.

features.name: Sent by the Raven Queen
features.description:
The raven acts independently of me, but it always obeys my commands. In combat, it rolls its own initiative and acts on its own turn, but I control how it acts. If it is slain by a creature, I gain advantage on all attack rolls against the killer for the next 24 hours. While the raven is within 100 ft of me, I can telepathically command it and see through its eyes and hear what it hears.
   The raven vanishes when it dies, if I die, or if we are separated by more than 5 miles. At the end of a short or long rest, I can call the raven back to reappear within 5 ft of me, regardless where it is or if it died.

subclassfeature6.name: Soul of the Raven
subclassfeature6.description:
As a bonus action, when my raven is perched on my shoulder, I can merge our bodies
   I become tiny and replace my speed with the raven's (10 ft, fly 50 ft)
   I can then use my action only to Dash, Disengage, Dodge, Help, Hide, or Search
   While merged, I still get all the benefits of my raven being perched on my shoulder
   I can end this as an action

subclassfeature10.name: Raven's Shield
subclassfeature10.description: I can't be frightened, have advantage on death saves, and resistance to necrotic damage

subclassfeature14.name: Queen's Right Hand
subclassfeature14.description: I can cast Finger of Death once per long rest

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature2.name: Lore Master
subclassfeature2.description:
I can use my Intelligence modifier for initiative instead of my Dexterity modifier
   I get expertise with each Arcana, History, Nature, and Religion, if I'm proficient with it

addMod.text: I use my Intelligence modifier for initiative rolls instead of Dexterity.

subclassfeature2.1.name: Spell Secrets: Elements
subclassfeature2.1.description:
I can change the damage type of spells I cast using spell slots (so not cantrips)
   I can swap out acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, radiant, or thunder damage

subclassfeature2.2.name: Spell Secrets: Saves
subclassfeature2.2.description: I can change the saving throw ability score to another for a spell I cast using a spell slot

subclassfeature6.name: Alchemical Casting
subclassfeature6.description:
When I cast a spell with a spell slot, I can expend one additional spell slot to augment it
    - 1st-level slot: one damage roll of the spell adds +2d10 force damage
    - 2nd-level slot: if the range of the spell is at least 30 ft, it becomes 1 mile
    - 3rd-level slot: the spell's save DC increases by 2

subclassfeature10.name: Prodigious Memory
subclassfeature10.description: As a bonus action, I can replace one of my prepared spells with another from my book

subclassfeature14.name: Master of Magic
subclassfeature14.description:
As a bonus action, I can call to mind one spell of my choice from any class' spell list
   This spell must be of a level I have spell slots for and that I don't already have prepared
   I can then cast it using the normal spellcasting rules, including expending a spell slot
   It counts a wizard spell; I can only cast the spell during the same turn I call it to mind

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Disciplines
subclassfeature1.description: I know two additional psionic disciplines, chosen from the avatar disciplines

subclassfeature1.1.name: Armor Training
subclassfeature1.1.description: I gain proficiency with medium armor and shields.

subclassfeature3.name: Avatar of Battle
subclassfeature3.description: Allies within 30 ft of me gain +2 on initiative rolls while I'm not incapacitated

subclassfeature6.name: Avatar of Healing
subclassfeature6.description:
Allies within 30 ft of me that get healed through a psionic discipline, get extra healing
   They add my Intelligence modifier to the HP regained, as long as I'm not incapacitated

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){if(What("Int Mod")&&!(What("Int Mod")<=0))switch(e){case"pr1-mend wounds":return a.description=a.description.replace("healed for ","healed for "+What("Int Mod")+"+"),!0;case"pr2-restore health":return a.description=a.description.replace("1 HP",1+What("Int Mod")+" HP"),!0}}

spellAdd: I add my Intelligence modifier to the hit points I restore using my psionic disciplines.

subclassfeature14.name: Avatar of Speed
subclassfeature14.description: Allies within 30 ft of me can use Dash as a bonus action while I'm not incapacitated

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Disciplines
subclassfeature1.description: [+2 awakened disciplines]

subclassfeature1.1.name: Awakened Talent
subclassfeature1.1.description:
I gain proficiency with two skills of my choice, taken from the following list:
   Animal Handling, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Perception, Persuasion
subclassfeature1.1.skillstxt: Choose two from: Animal Handling, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Perception, and Persuasion

subclassfeature3.name: Psionic Investigation
subclassfeature3.description:
By concentrating on an object I'm holding for 10 minutes, I learn the object's history
   I see/hear its surroundings the previous hour and know who hold it in the last 24 hours
   Also, for the next 24 hours, I can use an action to locate it and see its surroundings

subclassfeature6.name: Psionic Surge
subclassfeature6.description:
I can end my psychic focus to impose disadv. on a save vs. a discipline or talent I use
   Once I do this, I can't regain psychic focus in any discipline until I can use this again

subclassfeature14.name: Spectral Form
subclassfeature14.description:
As an action, I can become ghostly and move through objects and creatures for 10 min
   I also have resistance to all damage and move at half speed; I can end it as an action

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Disciplines
subclassfeature1.description: I know two additional psionic disciplines, taken from the immortal disciplines

subclassfeature1.1.name: Immortal Durability
subclassfeature1.1.description:
My hit point maximum increases by an amount equal to my mystic level
   If not wearing armor or wielding a shield, my AC is 10 + my Dex mod + my Con mod

subclassfeature3.name: Psionic Resilience
subclassfeature3.description: At the start of each turn, I gain my Intelligence modifier in temporary HP (min 0)

subclassfeature6.name: Surge of Health
subclassfeature6.description:
As a reaction when I take damage, I can halve that damage, but end my psychic focus
   Once I do this, I can't regain psychic focus in any discipline until I can use this again

subclassfeature14.name: Immortal Will
subclassfeature14.description: If I end my turn at 0 HP, I can use 5 psi points to regain mystic level + Con mod in HP

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Disciplines
subclassfeature1.description: I know two additional psionic disciplines, taken from the nomad disciplines

subclassfeature1.1.name: Breadth of Knowledge
subclassfeature1.1.description:
After I finish a long rest, I gain two proficiencies in chosen language, tool, or skill
   These proficiencies last until I finish my next long rest

subclassfeature3.name: Memory of One Thousand Steps
subclassfeature3.description:
As a reaction when hit by an attack, I can teleport away, causing the attack to miss
   I can teleport to any empty space that I had occupied since the start of my last turn

subclassfeature6.name: Superior Teleportation
subclassfeature6.description: When I use a psionic discipline to teleport, I can increase its distance by up to 10 ft

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){switch(e){case"ns1-step of a dozen paces":var n="metric"===What("Unit System")?3:10;return a.description=a.description.replace(/(\d+ (ft|m))/i,n+"+$1"),!0;case"ns3-defensive step":case"ns4-there and back again":var n="metric"===What("Unit System")?3:10,i=Number(a.description.replace(/.*(\d+) (ft|m).*/i,"$1"));return a.description=a.description.replace(/(\d+) (ft|m)/i,i+n+" $2"),!0}}

spellAdd: My psionic disciplines that teleport have 10 ft added to the distance of their teleportation.

subclassfeature14.name: Effortless Journey
subclassfeature14.description:
Once during my turn, I can teleport instead of moving, up to my movement speed 
   I subtracting the distance teleported from my remaining speed

subclassfeature1.name: Martial Training
subclassfeature1.description: I gain proficiency with medium armor and martial weapons

subclassfeature1.1.name: Soul Knife
subclassfeature1.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can create or dismiss my soul knives on both my fists
   As a bonus action, I can parry with these to get +2 AC until the start of my next turn

weaponOptions.name: Soul Knife
weaponOptions.description: Finesse, light

subclassfeature3.name: Hone the Blade
subclassfeature3.description:
I can spend psi points to give my soul knives a bonus to attack and damage for 10 min
   2 psi points: +1; 5 psi points: +2; 7 psi points: +4

subclassfeature6.name: Consumptive Knife
subclassfeature6.description: Whenever I slay an enemy with a soul knife attack, I immediately regain 2 psi points

subclassfeature14.name: Phantom Knife
subclassfeature14.description: As an action, I can make one attack with my soul knife, treating the target's AC as 10

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Disciplines
subclassfeature1.description: [+2 wu jen disciplines]

subclassfeature1.1.name: Hermit's Study
subclassfeature1.1.description:
I gain proficiency with two skills of my choice, taken from the following list:
   Animal Handling|Arcana|History|Insight|Medicine|Nature|Perception|Religion|Survival
subclassfeature1.1.skillstxt: Choose two from: Animal Handling, Arcana, History, Insight, Medicine, Nature, Perception, Religion, and Survival

subclassfeature3.name: Elemental Attunement
subclassfeature3.description:
If a target's resistance reduces damage of one of my psionic disciplines, I can bypass it
   With 1 extra psi point for the discipline (psi limit permitting), the resistance is ignored

subclassfeature6.name: Arcane Dabbler
subclassfeature6.description:
I know 3 wizard spells (1-3 level); When I gain a mystic level, I can swap one of these
   As a bonus action, I can use psi points to make spell slots; Last until my next long rest
   2 PP: 1st-level; 3 PP: 2nd-level; 5 PP: 3rd-level; 6 PP: 4th-level; 7 PP: 5th-level

subclassfeature14.name: Elemental Mastery
subclassfeature14.description:
As a reaction when I take damage to which I have resistance, I can ignore that damage
   I gain immunity to that damage type until the start of my next turn

subclassfeature2.name: Arcane Deflection
subclassfeature2.description:
As a reaction when I'm hit by an attack, I can gain +2 to my AC against that attack
   As a reaction when I fail a Con save, I can gain +4 bonus to that saving throw
   After I do either, I can't cast spells other than cantrips until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature2.1.name: Tactical Wit
subclassfeature2.1.description: I gain a bonus to my initiative rolls equal to my Intelligence modifier

addMod.text: I can add my Intelligence modifier to initiative rolls.

subclassfeature6.name: Power Surge
subclassfeature6.description:
When multiple targets have to save vs. one of my spells, I can have it do more damage
   On the turn I cast the spell, I can roll 2 additional damage dice for it

subclassfeature10.name: Durable Magic
subclassfeature10.description: While I'm maintaining concentration on a spell, I gain +2 to AC and all saving throws

subclassfeature14.name: Deflecting Shroud
subclassfeature14.description:
When I use my Arcane Deflection feature, magical energy arcs from me
   Any creatures of my choice within 10 ft of me take half my level in force damage

subclassfeature3.name: Drunken Technique
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain proficiency with the Performance skill
   When using Flurry of Blows, I gain the benefits of a Disengage and +10 ft speed this turn

subclassfeature6.name: Tipsy Sway
subclassfeature6.description: As a reaction when missed in melee, attacker instead hits another I can see within 5 ft

subclassfeature11.name: Drunkard's Luck
subclassfeature11.description: Before I roll for a save, I can spend 1 ki to give myself advantage on it

subclassfeature17.name: Intoxicated Frenzy
subclassfeature17.description: I can make 3 extra attacks with Flurry of Blows if each is used on a different target

subclassfeature3.name: Armor of Peace
subclassfeature3.description: When not wearing armor or wielding a shield, my AC is 16 + my Dexterity modifier

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Emissary of Peace
subclassfeature3.1.description: As a bonus action, I gain +5 to my next Charisma (Persuasion) check in the next min

subclassfeature3.2.name: Channel Divinity: Rebuke the Violent
subclassfeature3.2.description:
As a reaction when a hostile within 10 ft damages another in melee, I can rebuke it
   It takes the same damage as it dealt but as radiant damage, with a Wis save to halve it

subclassfeature3.3.name: Warrior of Reconciliation
subclassfeature3.3.description:
I can charm a creature when I reduce it to 0 HP with a simple, bludgeoning weapon
   It is peaceful, docile and only does what I command it to, but it can't cause harm
   For 1 min, until I'm incap., or I or allies attack it or have it save; after it is unconscious

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of the Guardian
subclassfeature7.description:
As a reaction when an ally within 10 ft takes damage, I instead take the damage
