   This damage can't be reduced in any way; Other effects might still apply to my ally

subclassfeature15.name: Protective Spirit
subclassfeature15.description: At the end of my turn when I'm below half HP and not incapacitated, I regain HP

subclassfeature20.name: Emissary of Redemption
subclassfeature20.description:
When taking damage from a creature, I take only half and it takes the other half
   This stops working on any that I attack or force to make a save, until I have a long rest

subclassfeature3.name: Slayer's Mysticism
subclassfeature3.description: I get bonus spells known, which do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.1.name: Slayer's Eye
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can study a creature within 120 ft that I can see
   I learn its vulnerabilities, immunities, resistances, and the effects damaging it can have
   My first weapon hit on it each turn does +1d6 damage, until I study another or rest

subclassfeature7.name: Supernatural Defense
subclassfeature7.description: I add 1d6 to saves I make against abilities of the current target of my Slayer's Eye

subclassfeature11.name: Relentless Slayer
subclassfeature11.description:
As a reaction, I can stop the target of my Slayer's Eye from escaping, if within 30 ft
   If I win a contested Wis check, it wastes it action to teleport/transform/plane shift

subclassfeature15.name: Slayer's Counter
subclassfeature15.description:
As a reaction when the target of my Slayer's Eye has me make a save, I can attack it
   I can make one weapon attack; If this hits, I automatically succeed on the saving throw

subclassfeature3.name: Ancestral Protectors
subclassfeature3.description:
While raging, the first creature I hit with an attack on my turn becomes distracted
   While distracted, it has disadvantage on attack rolls that don't target me
   In addition, everybody but me counts as having resistance to all of the target's attacks
   This lasts until the start of my next turn, or until my rage ends

subclassfeature6.name: Spirit Shield
subclassfeature6.description:
As a reaction while raging when an ally I see within 30 ft is damaged, I can reduce it
   My guardian spirits reduce the damage by an amount equal to the roll of the dice

subclassfeature10.name: Consult the Spirits
subclassfeature10.description: Through consulting my ancestral spirits, I can cast Clairvoyance without a spell slot

subclassfeature14.name: Vengeful Ancestors
subclassfeature14.description: Whenever I use Spirit Shield to reduce damage, the attacker takes the reduced damage

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain proficiency with medium armor and scimitars
   I can use a simple or martial melee weapon that I'm proficient with as spellcasting focus

subclassfeature3.1.name: Fighting Style
subclassfeature3.1.description: Select a Fighting Style for the college of swords using the "Choose Feature" button above

dueling.name: Dueling Fighting Style
dueling.description: +2 to damage rolls when wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons

atkCalc: When I'm wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no weapon in my other hand, I do +2 damage with that melee weapon. This condition will always be false if the bonus action 'Off-hand Attack' exists.

two-weapon fighting.name: Two-Weapon Fighting Style
two-weapon fighting.description: I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks

atkCalc: When engaging in two-weapon fighting, I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks. If a melee weapon includes 'off-hand' or 'secondary' in its name or description, it is considered an off-hand attack.

subclassfeature3.2.name: Blade Flourish
subclassfeature3.2.description:
As an action, I can make one melee weapon attack and use one flourish option below
   In addition, I gain +10 ft to my walking speed until the end of the current turn
    - Defensive Flourish [one Bardic Inspiration die]
       I add the result of the die to my AC until the start of my next turn
    - Slashing Flourish [one Bardic Inspiration die]
       If the attack hits, I can use a die to deal damage to creatures next to the target
       All creatures within 5 ft of the target take the result of the die in damage
    - Mobile Flourish [one Bardic Inspiration die]
       If the attack hits, I can use a die to push the target back 5 + the die result in feet
       After this, I can use my reaction to move my speed to a space next to the target

subclassfeature6.name: Cunning Flourish
subclassfeature6.description: When I take the Blade Flourish action, I can attack twice, but still only use one flourish

subclassfeature14.name: Master Flourish
subclassfeature14.description: When I do a Blade Flourish, I can use a d6 instead of expending a Bardic Inspiration die

subclassfeature3.name: Magic Arrow
subclassfeature3.description:
Whenever I fire a nonmagical arrow from a short- or longbow I can make it magical
   This magical arrow gives a +1 bonus to the attack and damage rolls for the one attack

atkCalc.body: function(e,a,t){/longbow|shortbow/i.test(a.baseWeaponName)&&!a.theWea.isMagicWeapon&&(t.magic+=1)}

atkCalc: Any longbow or shortbow that doesn't include a magic bonus in its name gets a +1 magical bonus to damage and to hit as any arrows fired with it are automatically made magical.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Arcane Shot
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I can unleash magical effects when I fire a magic arrow from a short- or longbow
   I can use this once per turn as part of the Attack action, after an attack hits
   I know a number of Arcane Shot Options and learn additional at certain levels
   Use the "Choose Feature" button above to add Arcane Shots Options to the third page

banishing arrow [abjuration].name: Banishing Arrow [Abjuration]
banishing arrow [abjuration].description:
The target makes a Cha save or is banished to the Feywild until the end of its next turn
   While banished, its speed is 0 and is incapacitated; It re-appearing in the same spot
   When I reach 18th level, this Arcane Shot Option also does an extra 2d6 force damage

brute bane arrow [necromancy].name: Brute Bane Arrow [Necromancy]
brute bane arrow [necromancy].description:
The target takes extra necrotic damage and must make a Constitution save
   If failed, the damage of the target's attacks is halved until the start of my next turn

bursting arrow [evocation].name: Bursting Arrow [Evocation]
bursting arrow [evocation].description: The target, in addition to the shot, and all creatures within 10 ft of it take damage

grasping arrow [conjuration].name: Grasping Arrow [Conjuration]
grasping arrow [conjuration].description:
The target takes extra poison damage as brambles wrap around it for 1 minute
   The brambles give it -10 ft speed and do it slashing damage every round it moves
   These can be removed by it or another as an action with Strength (Athletics) vs. my DC

mind-scrambling arrow [enchantment].name: Mind-Scrambling Arrow [Enchantment]
mind-scrambling arrow [enchantment].description:
The target takes extra psychic damage and must succeed on a Wisdom save
   If failed, it can't attack or harm one of my allies within 30 ft of it that I choose
   This lasts until the start of my next turn or until the chosen ally harms the target

piercing arrow [transmutation].name: Piercing Arrow [Transmutation]
piercing arrow [transmutation].description:
With this I don't roll for the attack, but shoot the arrow in a 30-ft long, 1-ft wide line
   It passes through objects, ignoring cover, but all creatures in the area take damage
   The damage is the same as a normal hit from my attack, plus extra piercing damage
   A creature can make a Dexterity save to reduce the damage by half

seeking arrow [divination].name: Seeking Arrow [Divination]
seeking arrow [divination].description:
With this I don't roll for the attack, but I choose a target I have seen in the last minute
   The seeking arrow moves around corners, obstacles, and ignores cover to hit the target
   It is hit if it is within the weapon's range and there is a path for the arrow to get to it
   The target takes the full damage of the attack plus extra force damage
   It can make a Dexterity save to reduce the damage by half; If failed, I know its location

shadow arrow [illusion].name: Shadow Arrow [Illusion]
shadow arrow [illusion].description:
The target takes extra psychic damage and must succeed on a Wisdom save
   If failed, the target can't see anything beyond 5 ft until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature3.2.name: Arcane Archer's Lore
subclassfeature3.2.description: I gain proficiency with either the Arcana or Nature skill
subclassfeature3.2.skillstxt: Choose one from: Arcana or Nature

subclassfeature7.name: Curving Shot
subclassfeature7.description:
When I miss with a magic arrow, I can use a bonus action to redirect the attack
   I reroll the attack against a different target within 60 ft of the original target

subclassfeature15.name: Ever-Ready Shot
subclassfeature15.description: I regain one use of Arcane Shot if I have no more remaining when I roll initiative

subclassfeature3.name: Path of the Kensei
subclassfeature3.description:
Some weapons, that don't have the heavy or special property, are kensei weapons for me
   At least one ranged and one melee weapon, more at higher levels (longbow does qualify)
   With these: proficient, count as a monk weapons, special bonuses while holding them:
    - If I do an unarmed strike during an Attack action, +2 AC until my next turn starts
    - As a bonus action, ranged kensei weapon attacks deal +1d4 damage in current turn

atkAdd.body: function(e,a){!(classes.known.monk&&2<classes.known.monk.level)||a.isSpell||a.theWea.monkweapon||!/kensei/i.test(a.WeaponTextName)||a.theWea.special||/heavy|special/i.test(e.Description)&&"longbow"!==a.baseWeaponName||(a.theWea.monkweapon=!0,a.theWea.kenseiweapon=!0,a.isRangedWeapon&&(e.Description+=(e.Description?"; ":"")+"As bonus action with Attack action, +1d4 damage"),e.Proficiency=!0)}

atkAdd:
If I include the word 'Kensei' in the name of a weapon that doesn't have the Heavy or Special attribute, or that is a longbow, that weapon gains the same benefits as any other 'Monk Weapon'.
In addition, with ranged 'Kensei Weapons', I can take a bonus action to have that hit, and any other hit after that as part of the same action, do +1d4 damage.

ki-empowered strikes.name: One with the Blade
ki-empowered strikes.description: My unarmed strikes and kensei weapon attacks count as magical

atkAdd: My unarmed strikes and any Kensei Weapons count as magical for overcoming resistances and immunities.

precise strike.name: Precise Strike
precise strike.description: Once per turn when I hit with a kensei weapon, I can do a martial arts die extra damage

sharpen the blade.name: Sharpen the Blade
sharpen the blade.description:
As a bonus action, I can grant my kensei weapon a bonus to attack and damage rolls
   This bonus is equal to the number of ki points I spend; It lasts for 1 minute

subclassfeature17.name: Unerring Accuracy
subclassfeature17.description: Once per turn, if I miss a monk weapon attack on my turn, I can reroll the attack roll

subclassfeature1.name: Divine Magic
subclassfeature1.description:
When I select my 1st level or higher spells, I can also pick spells from the cleric spell list
   These cleric spells count as sorcerer spells for me
   I also learn Cure Wounds, which doesn't count against my number of spells known

subclassfeature1.2.name: Favored by the Gods
subclassfeature1.2.description: If I fail a saving throw or miss with an attack roll, I can add 2d4 to the total

subclassfeature6.name: Empowered Healing
subclassfeature6.description:
[1 sorcery point]When I roll dice for healing with one of my sorcerer spells, I can reroll them once
   By spending 1 sorcery point, I can reroll any number of those dice for that spell

subclassfeature14.name: Angelic Form
subclassfeature14.description:
Choose an otherworldly quality using the "Choose Feature" button above
   As a bonus action, I can manifest a pair of spectral wings that give me 30 ft fly speed
   These wings last until I become incapacitated or I dismiss them as a bonus action

beautiful.name: Angelic Form: Beautiful
beautiful.description:
My appearance takes on an otherworldly quality of beauty
   As a bonus action, I can manifest a pair of spectral wings that give me 30 ft fly speed
   These wings last until I become incapacitated or I dismiss them as a bonus action

youthful.name: Angelic Form: Youthful
youthful.description:
My appearance takes on an otherworldly quality of youthfulness
   As a bonus action, I can manifest a pair of spectral wings that give me 30 ft fly speed
   These wings last until I become incapacitated or I dismiss them as a bonus action

kind.name: Angelic Form: Kind
kind.description:
My appearance takes on an otherworldly quality of kindness
   As a bonus action, I can manifest a pair of spectral wings that give me 30 ft fly speed
   These wings last until I become incapacitated or I dismiss them as a bonus action

imposing.name: Angelic Form: Imposing
imposing.description:
My appearance takes on an otherworldly quality of imposingness
   As a bonus action, I can manifest a pair of spectral wings that give me 30 ft fly speed
   These wings last until I become incapacitated or I dismiss them as a bonus action

subclassfeature18.name: Unearthly Recovery
subclassfeature18.description:
As a bonus action when I have less than half of my max HP remaining, I can heal myself
   I regain a number of HP equal to half my hit point maximum

subclassfeature2.name: Speech of the Woods
subclassfeature2.description:
I can talk with beasts, they understand me and I them, to the limit of their intelligence
   This doesn't automatically make me friends with all beasts; Additionally, I learn Sylvan

subclassfeature2.1.name: Spirit Totem
subclassfeature2.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can summon, or move, a spirit to a point I can see within 60 ft
   The spirit is a Bear, Hawk, or Unicorn (see below), which has a 30-ft radius aura
   It is incorporeal, immobile, doesn't counts as a creature or object, and persists for 1 min
    - Bear: my allies in the area and I instantly gain 5 + my druid level in temp HP
       While in the aura, my allies and I gain advantage on Strength checks and saves
    - Hawk: As a reaction, I can grant advantage on an attack vs. a target in the aura
    - Unicorn: my allies and I gain advantage on ability checks to detect targets in the aura
       If I cast a healing spell with a spell slot, allies in the aura heal my druid level in HP

subclassfeature6.name: Mighty Summoner
subclassfeature6.description: Beasts or Fey I summon with spells get +2 HP per HD and their attacks count as magical

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){switch(e){case"conjure animals":case"conjure fey":return a.description+="; each +2 HP/HD, magical natural attacks",!0;case"conjure woodland beings":return a.description=a.description.replace(/fey.*/,"fey; obeys commands if its align. agrees; breaks free if break conc.; +2 HP/HD, magic atks"),!0}}

spellAdd: When I use a spell that restores hit points, it restores an additional 2 + the level of the spell slot (or spell slot equivalent) used to cast the spell.

subclassfeature10.name: Guardian Spirit
subclassfeature10.description: When a Beast or Fey that I summoned ends its turn in my Spirit Totem aura, it heals

subclassfeature14.name: Faithful Summons
subclassfeature14.description:
When I am reduced to 0 HP or incapacitated against my will, I can cast Conjure Animals
   This is done as if using a 9th-level spell slot to summon 4 beast of my choice up to CR 2
   They appear within 20 ft of me, last 1 hour, and protect me from harm and attack foes

conjure animals.description: Summon 4 CR 2 beasts; protect me from harm and attack foes
conjure animals.changes: Using my Faithful Summons class feature when I'm reduced to 0 HP, I can cast Conjure Animals as if using a 9th-level spell slot. This then summons 4 beast of my choice up to CR 2 within 20 ft of me without needing concentration.

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain proficiency with Animal Handling, History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion
   Alternatively, I learn one language of my choice
choices: Skill proficiency: Animal Handling, History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion

language proficiency.name: Bonus Proficiency
language proficiency.description: I learn one language of my choice

skill proficiency: animal handling, hist.name: Bonus Proficiency
skill proficiency: animal handling, hist.description: I gain proficiency with Animal Handling, History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion
skill proficiency: animal handling, hist.skillstxt: Choose one from: Animal Handling, History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion

subclassfeature3.1.name: Born in the Saddle
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I have advantage on saves to avoid falling off my mount, and land on my feet if I fail
   Mounting or dismounting a creature costs me only 5 ft of movement instead of half

subclassfeature3.2.name: Combat Superiority
subclassfeature3.2.description:
I gain a number of superiority dice that I can use to fuel special maneuvers (see below)
   I can use only one maneuver per attack; I regain all superiority dice after a short rest
    • Control Mount (Maneuver, UA:RCO 3)
      Use after rolling Wis (Animal Handling) to influence an animal I or an ally is riding
      I add the superiority die to the result
    • Precision Attack (Maneuver, UA:RCO 3)
      Use after rolling to hit; I add the superiority die to my attack roll
    • Trip Attack (Maneuver, UA:RCO 3) [DC 8 + Prof Bonus + Str mod]
      Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to the attack's damage
      If target is Large or smaller, it must make a Strength save or be knocked prone
    • Warding Maneuver (Maneuver, UA:RCO 3) [only while wielding weapon or shield]
      As a reaction when I or a creature within 5 ft is hit, I add the superiority die to AC
      If the attack still hits, the target counts as having resistance against the attack

subclassfeature7.name: Ferocious Charger
subclassfeature7.description:
I can use two superiority dice, instead of just one, when using the Trip Attack Maneuver
   If doing so, both dice are added to the damage and the target has disadv. on its Str save

subclassfeature10.name: Improved Combat Superiority
subclassfeature10.description: My superiority dice turn into d10s at 10th level and into d12s at 18th level

subclassfeature15.name: Relentless
subclassfeature15.description: I regain one superiority die if I have no more remaining when I roll initiative

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Conquering Presence
subclassfeature3.description:
As an action, all creatures of my choice within 30-ft radius must make a Wisdom save
   If failed, a target is frightened for 1 minute; It can save again at the end of each turn

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Guided Strike
subclassfeature3.1.description: When I make an attack roll, I can add a +10 bonus to the roll after seeing the d20 roll

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of Conquest
subclassfeature7.description:
Enemies that are frightened of me have their speed reduced to 0 while in my aura
   They also take psychic damage whenever they start theirs turn within my aura

subclassfeature15.name: Scornful Rebuke
subclassfeature15.description:
Whenever I'm hit with an attack while I'm not incapacitated, the attacker takes damage
   This is psychic damage equal to my Charisma modifier (minimum of 0)

subclassfeature20.name: Invincible Conqueror
subclassfeature20.description:
As an action, I can gain the following benefits for 1 minute:
    - I have resistance to all damage
    - I can make an additional attack as part of my Attack action
    - My melee weapons score critical hits on a roll of 19 or 20

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Cantrips
subclassfeature1.description: I know the Light and Sacred Flame cantrips

subclassfeature1.1.name: Healing Light
subclassfeature1.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can heal a creature on touch by expending dice from my pool
   I can expend up to my Charisma modifier (min 1) of dice at a time
   The target heals HP equal to the roll of the dice; I regain all expended dice on a long rest

subclassfeature6.name: Radiant Soul
subclassfeature6.description:
I add my Cha modifier to cantrips/spells I cast that deal fire or radiant damage
   Additionally, I have resistance to radiant damage

atkCalc.body: function(e,a,t){a.isSpell&&/fire|radiant/i.test(e.Damage_Type)&&(t.extraDmg+=What("Cha Mod"))}

atkCalc: Cantrips and spells that fire or radiant damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){if(!a.psionic)return genericSpellDmgEdit(e,a,"fire|radiant","Cha")}

spellAdd: Cantrips and spells that fire or radiant damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage.

subclassfeature10.name: Radiant Resilience
subclassfeature10.description:
When I finish a short or long rest, I and up to five allies gain temporary hit points
   I get my warlock level + Cha mod, while my allies get half my warlock level + Cha mod

subclassfeature14.name: Searing Vengeance
subclassfeature14.description:
At the start of my turn when I would make a death save, I can instead spring back up
   I can stand up and recover HP equal to half my current HP maximum
   Also, creatures of my choice within 30 ft of me take 2d8 + Cha mod in radiant damage
   Damaged creatures are blinded until the end of my current turn

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature2.name: Circle Spells
subclassfeature2.description:
My link to the cycle of life and death gives me with the ability to cast certain spells
   These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare
   In addition, I learn the Chill Touch cantrip

subclassfeature2.1.name: Halo of Spores
subclassfeature2.1.description: As a reaction on my turn, I can do poison damage to one creature I can see within 10 ft

subclassfeature2.2.name: Symbiotic Entity
subclassfeature2.2.description:
As an action, I expend a Wild Shape use to boost my spores instead of transforming
   I then gain 3 temporary HP per druid level and my Halo of Spores does double damage
   Also, my melee weapon attacks do +1d6 poison damage with every hit
   This lasts for 10 minutes or until I use Wild Shape again
additional: 6 temp HP; Halo of Spores: 6 damage
9 temp HP; Halo of Spores: 6 damage
12 temp HP; Halo of Spores: 6 damage
15 temp HP; Halo of Spores: 6 damage
18 temp HP; Halo of Spores: 12 damage
21 temp HP; Halo of Spores: 12 damage
24 temp HP; Halo of Spores: 12 damage
27 temp HP; Halo of Spores: 12 damage
30 temp HP; Halo of Spores: 18 damage
33 temp HP; Halo of Spores: 18 damage
36 temp HP; Halo of Spores: 18 damage
39 temp HP; Halo of Spores: 18 damage
42 temp HP; Halo of Spores: 24 damage
45 temp HP; Halo of Spores: 24 damage
48 temp HP; Halo of Spores: 24 damage
51 temp HP; Halo of Spores: 24 damage
54 temp HP; Halo of Spores: 24 damage
57 temp HP; Halo of Spores: 24 damage
60 temp HP; Halo of Spores: 24 damage

atkAdd: If I include the word 'Spore' or 'Symbiotic' in a melee weapon's name or description, it gets treated as a weapon that is infused by my Symbiotic Entity feature, adding +1d6 poison damage in the description.

subclassfeature6.name: Fungal Infestation
subclassfeature6.description:
If I kill a humanoid with my Halo of Spores, it rises as a zombie at the end of my turn
   This zombie has 1 HP, only takes the Attack action, and can only make 1 attack with it
   It follows my mental commands and takes it turn after mine; It lasts for 1 hour

subclassfeature10.name: Spreading Spores
subclassfeature10.description:
As a bonus action, I create a 10-ft cube of fungal spores within 30 ft, lasting for 1 min
   Any creature starting its turn in the cube takes the damage of my Halo of Spores
   The cube ends if I use this again; While the cube persists, I can't use my Halo of Spores

subclassfeature14.name: Fungal Body
subclassfeature14.description: I'm immune to critical hits and to being blinded, deafened, frightened, and poisoned

subclassfeature3.name: Brute Force
subclassfeature3.description: I do additional damage with weapons that I'm proficient with

atkAdd: I do +1d4 damage with weapons that I'm proficient with. This increases to 1d6 at 10th level, 1d8 at 16th level, and 1d10 at 20th level.

subclassfeature7.name: Brutish Durability
subclassfeature7.description:
I add +1d6 to all my saving throws, including death saves
   If the total of a death save is 20 or more, it counts as rolling a 20

subclassfeature15.name: Devastating Critical
subclassfeature15.description: Whenever I score a critical hit with a weapon, I add my fighter level to the damage

subclassfeature18.name: Survivor
subclassfeature18.description:
If I have less than half my max HP at the start of my turn, I heal myself
   I regain HP equal to 5 + Constitution modifier (min 1); This doesn't work if I'm at 0 HP

subclassfeature2.name: Tools of the Inventor
subclassfeature2.description: I gain proficiency with light armor and two tools of my choice

subclassfeature2.1.name: Arcanomechanical Armor
subclassfeature2.1.description:
After a long rest, I can transform a studded leather armor into arcanomechanical armor
   This is a magic light armor that gives AC 12 + Dex mod and force resistance, if attuned
   Only I can attune to it; Creating a new one removes the magic from the previous

subclassfeature2.2.name: Reckless Casting
subclassfeature2.2.description:
As an action, I can attempt to cast a random spell or cantrip by rolling a d10 on a table
   On a roll of 10, I roll again twice on that table and cast both results
   However, if I then roll 10 on either dice, the whole casting fails and the action is wasted
   If I choose cantrip, I roll on the table once and cast the result
   If I choose a spell, I expend a spell slot and roll twice on the table for the slot's level
   I can then choose which of the results I use; Use 5th-level table for spell slots over level 5

toNotesPage.name: Reckless Casting Tables
toNotesPage.note:
d10	Cantrip		d10	Cantrip 1	Acid Splash		    6	Ray of Frost
    2	Chill Touch		    7	Shocking Grasp
    3	Fire Bolt		    8	Sacred Flame
    4	Light		    9	Thorn Whip
    5	Poison Spray	  10	Roll twice; Another 10, all is wasted

d10	1st-Level Spell	d10	1st-Level Spell 1	Burning Hands	    6	Fog Cloud
    2	Chromatic Orb	    7	Jump
    3	Color Spray		    8	Magic Missile
    4	Faerie Fire		    9	Thunderwave
    5	False Life		  10	Roll twice; Another 10, all is wasted

d10	2nd-Level Spell	d10	2nd-Level Spell 1	Blur		    6	Levitate
    2	Darkness		    7	Melf's Acid Arrow
    3	Enlarge/Reduce	    8	Scorching Ray
    4	Gust of Wind	    9	Shatter
    5	Invisibility		  10	Roll twice; Another 10, all is wasted

d10	3rd-Level Spell	d10	3rd-Level Spell 1	Blink		    6	Gaseous Form
    2	Fear		    7	Lightning Bolt
    3	Feign Death 	    8	Sleet Storm
    4	Fireball		    9	Stinking Cloud
    5	Fly		  10	Roll twice; Another 10, all is wasted

d10	4th-Level Spell	d10	4th-Level Spell 1	Blight		    6	Ice Storm
    2	Confusion		    7	Phantasmal Killer
    3	Evard's Black Tentacles	    8	Stoneskin
    4	Fire Shield		    9	Wall of Fire
    5	Greater Invisibility	  10	Roll twice; Another 10, all is wasted

d10	5th-Level Spell	d10	5th-Level Spell 1	Cloudkill		    6	Insect Plague
    2	Cone of Cold	    7	Mass Cure Wounds
    3	Destructive Wave	    8	Wall of Force
    4	Flame Strike	    9	Wall of Stone
    5	Hold Monster	  10	Roll twice; Another 10, all is wasted

subclassfeature6.name: Alchemical Casting
subclassfeature6.description:
I can manipulate spells cast while wearing and attuned to my Arcanomechanical Armor
   By expending an additional 1st or 2nd-level spell slot, I do the following:
   • 1st: I can substitute acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage for another type
   • 2nd: I increase the spells damage, if any, by 2d10 force damage against one target

subclassfeature10.name: Prodigious Inspiration
subclassfeature10.description: As a bonus action, I can replace a prepared spell with another from my spellbook

subclassfeature14.name: Controlled Chaos
subclassfeature14.description:
When I expend a spell slot to cast a spell using Reckless Casting, it is more powerful
   I can roll on the table that is one level higher than the spell slot expended

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature1.description: I gain proficiency with heavy armor

subclassfeature1.1.name: Voice of Authority
subclassfeature1.1.description:
Whenever I use a spell slot to cast a spell on an ally, it can use its reaction to attack
   The ally makes one weapon attack against a target of my choice that I can see
   If the spell targets multiple allies, I can choose which one can make the attack

subclassfeature2.name: Channel Divinity: Order's Demand
subclassfeature2.description:
As an action, all chosen targets in 30 ft that can see or hear me must make a Wis save
   If failed, it is charmed by me until the end of my next turn or it takes any damage
   Also, I can choose to have any of the charmed targets to fall prone on a failed save

subclassfeature6.name: Order's Dominion
subclassfeature6.description:
When I cast an enchantment spell using a spell slot, I regain one expended spell slot
   The regained slot must be lower level than the one used, and no higher than 5th-level

subclassfeature8.name: Divine Strike
subclassfeature8.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature with a weapon attack, I can do extra damage

atkAdd: Once per turn, I can have one of my weapon attacks that hit do extra force damage.

subclassfeature17.name: Order's Wrath
subclassfeature17.description:
If I deal my Divine Strike damage to a creature, it takes extra damage from my allies
   The first time each turn that it is hit with a weapon attack, it takes 2d8 force damage

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature1.name: Jotun Resilience
subclassfeature1.description: My hit point maximum increases by an amount equal to my sorcerer level

subclassfeature1.1.name: Mark of Ordning
subclassfeature1.1.description:
Choose a giant heritage using the "Choose Feature" button above
   I learn spells based on my giant heritage, which I add to my known spells

cloud giant.name: Mark of Ordning: Cloud Giant
cloud giant.description:
I add Minor Illusion, Fog Cloud and Invisibility to my known sorcerer spells
   These do not count against the number of cantrips/spells I can know

fire giant.name: Mark of Ordning: Fire Giant
fire giant.description:
I add Fire Bolt, Burning Hands, and Flaming Sphere to my known sorcerer spells
   These do not count against the number of cantrips/spells I can know

frost giant.name: Mark of Ordning: Frost Giant
frost giant.description:
I add Ray of Frost, Armor of Agathys, and Hold Person to my known sorcerer spells
   These do not count against the number of cantrips/spells I can know

hill giant.name: Mark of Ordning: Hill Giant
hill giant.description:
I add Shillelagh, Heroism, and Enlarge/Reduce to my known sorcerer spells
   These do not count against the number of cantrips/spells I can know

stone giant.name: Mark of Ordning: Stone Giant
stone giant.description:
I add Resistance, Entangle, and Spike Growth to my known sorcerer spells
   These do not count against the number of cantrips/spells I can know

storm giant.name: Mark of Ordning: Storm Giant
storm giant.description:
I add Thunderwave, Shocking Grasp, and Gust of Wind to my known sorcerer spells
   These do not count against the number of cantrips/spells I can know

subclassfeature6.name: Soul of Lost Ostoria
subclassfeature6.description: Use the "Choose Feature" button above to select the giant heritage

cloud giant.name: Soul of Lost Ostoria: Cloud Giant
cloud giant.description:
As a bonus action after casting any of my Mark of Ordning spells, I can teleport
   I teleport to an unoccupied space that I can see up to my Con mod + 10 ft away

fire giant.name: Soul of Lost Ostoria: Fire Giant
fire giant.description: I add my Constitution modifier (min 1) to the damage of my Mark of Ordning spells

atkCalc.body: function(e,a,t){"fire bolt"==a.baseWeaponName&&(t.extraDmg+=Math.max(What("Con Mod"),1))}

atkCalc: I add my Constitution modifier (min 1) to the damage of my Mark of Ordning spells: Fire Bolt, Burning Hands, and Flaming Sphere

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){if("sorcerer"==t&&/^(fire bolt|burning hands|flaming sphere)$/i.test(e))return a.description=a.description.replace(/d(6|10)/,"d$1+"+Math.max(1,What("Con Mod"))),!0}

spellAdd: I add my Constitution modifier (min 1) to the damage of my Mark of Ordning spells: Fire Bolt, Burning Hands, and Flaming Sphere

frost giant.name: Soul of Lost Ostoria: Frost Giant
frost giant.description:
Immediately after casting any of my Mark of Ordning spells, I gain temporary HP
   I gain my Con mod in temporary HP (min 1) and its added to that of the spell (if any)

hill giant.name: Soul of Lost Ostoria: Hill Giant
hill giant.description:
Immediately after casting any of my Mark of Ordning spells, I can magically push others
   I can select up to two creatures within 5 ft of me that each have to make a Str save
   If failed, it is pushed my Con mod (min 1) + 5 ft away from me; It can choose to fail

stone giant.name: Soul of Lost Ostoria: Stone Giant
stone giant.description:
Immediately after casting any of my Mark of Ordning spells, I gain a bonus to AC
   My AC increases with my Constitution modifier (min +1) until the end of my next turn

storm giant.name: Soul of Lost Ostoria: Storm Giant
storm giant.description:
Immediately after casting any of my Mark of Ordning spells, I shoot lightning
   Up to 3 targets in 30 ft that I can see take my Con mod (min 1) in lightning damage

subclassfeature14.name: Rage of Fallen Ostoria
subclassfeature14.description:
When I start casting a sorcerer spell using a spell slot on my turn, I can grow in size
   It lasts for 1 min or until I die or am incapacitated; I can activate it only once per turn
   While it lasts, I enjoy the following benefits (which are cumulative, except the damage):
   • I increase size by one category (from Medium to Large, for example)
   • My current HP and maximum HP increase by a number equal to my sorcerer level
   • My reach and walking speed both increase by 5 ft
   • I gain advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws
   • I add my Constitution modifier to the damage of my melee weapon attacks (min +1)

subclassfeature18.name: Blessing of the All Father
subclassfeature18.description: I add +2 to my Constitution and its maximums increases to 22

subclassfeature3.name: Lingering Magic
subclassfeature3.description:
I can cast Detect Magic without spell slots or components, using Con for spellcasting
   When I do so, I faintly glow a color corresponding to the school of magic I detect

detect magic.changes: Using my Path of the Wild Soul class feature I can cast Detect Magic without requiring components or spell slots.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Wild Surge
subclassfeature3.1.description: Whenever I enter my rage, I have to roll on the Wild Surge table (see Notes page)

toNotesPage.name: Wild Surge Table
note: Magic erupts from me while I rage. Whenever I enter my rage, I have to roll on the table below to see what happens.
If the effect calls for a saving throw, the DC is equal to 8 + my proficiency bonus + my Constitution modifier.
d8	EFFECT
1	Necrotic energy bursts from me. Each creature within 30 ft of me takes 1d10 necrotic damage, and I gain temporary HP equal to the sum of the necrotic damage dealt to the creatures.
2	I teleport up to 20 ft to an unoccupied space I can see. Until my rage ends, I can activate this effect again on each of my turns as a bonus action.

3	I conjure 1d4 intangible spirits that look like flumphs in unoccupied spaces within 30 ft of me. Each spirit immediately flies 30 ft in a random direction. At the end of my turn, all spirits explode and each creature within 5 ft of one or more of them must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d8 force damage.

4	Arcane energy enshrouds me. Until my rage ends, I gain a +2 bonus to AC, and whenever a creature within 10 ft of me hits me with an attack, that creature takes force damage equal to my Constitution modifier.
5	Plant life temporarily grows around me: until my rage ends, the ground within 10 ft of me is difficult terrain.

6	Arcane energy taps into the minds of those around me. Each creature within 30 ft of me must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or I see a glimpse of the creature's thoughts, learning how it plans to attack me. As a result, the creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against me until the start of my next turn.

7	Shadows weave around a weapon of my choice I am holding. Until my rage ends, my weapon deals psychic damage instead of its bludgeoning, slashing, or piercing damage, and it gains the light and thrown properties with a normal range of 20 ft and a long range of 60 ft. If I drop the weapon or throw it, the weapon dissipates and reappears in my hand at the end of my turn.

8	A beam of brilliant light lances from my chest in a 5-ft-wide, 60-ft-long line. Each creature in the line must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 2d8 radiant damage and be blinded until the start of my next turn.

subclassfeature6.name: Magic Reserves
subclassfeature6.description:
As an action, I can touch a creature and roll a die to channel magic into it
   The target regains an expended spell slot of a level equal to or less then the die roll
   If it has no expended spell slots of that level, it gains 5× the die roll in temp HP instead
   Regardless of what happens, I take force damage equal to five times the die roll

subclassfeature10.name: Arcane Rebuke
subclassfeature10.description:
As a reaction when I have to make a save while raging, the magic in my soul lashes out
   This causes the creature forcing me to make the save, if any, to take 3d6 force damage

subclassfeature14.name: Chaotic Fury
subclassfeature14.description:
As a bonus action while raging, I can reroll the effect on the Wild Surge table
   This replaces the current wild surge effect with a new one

subclassfeature3.name: Arms of the Astral Self
subclassfeature3.description: My ki mastery allows me to summon portions of my astral self; See 3rd page notes

weaponOptions.name: Astral Arms
weaponOptions.description: 10 ft reach; Uses Str, Dex, or Wis; Deals necrotic or radiant damage

astral arms.name: Astral Arms
astral arms.description:
As a bonus action, I can summon my astral arms for 10 minutes; I choose their appearance
   While they are summoned, I can use Wisdom instead of Strength for Strength checks/saves
   The arms are melee monk weapons with 10 ft reach that can use Wis instead of Str/Dex
   I can choose to have them deal either radiant or necrotic damage
   After I use them in my Attack action, I can use them for more attacks as a bonus action

subclassfeature6.name: Visage of the Astral Self
subclassfeature6.description: I can now also summon the visage of my astral self; See third page notes section

astral visage.name: Astral Visage
astral visage.description:
[1 ki point]As a bonus action (or when summoning my astral arms), I can summon my astral visage
   It covers my face like a helmet or mask and I choose its appearance; It lasts for 10 minutes
   It grants adv. on Insight & Intimidation, and the ability to see 120 ft in (magical) darkness

subclassfeature11.name: Awakening of the Astral Self
subclassfeature11.description: While having both astral arms and visage summoned, I gain extra benefits, see 3rd page

deflect energy.name: Deflect Energy
deflect energy.description:
[if both astral arms & visage]As a reaction when I take acid, cold, fire, force, or lightning damage, I can deflect it
   By doing so, the damage is reduced by 1d10 + my Wisdom modifier + my Monk level

empowered arms.name: Empowered Arms
empowered arms.description: [if both astral arms & visage]Once per turn when I hit an astral arms attack, I can add a martial arts die to its damage

word of the spirit.name: Word of the Spirit
word of the spirit.description:
[if both astral arms & visage]I can direct my words to a creature I can see within 30 ft so that only it can hear me
   Alternatively, I can amplify my voice so that it is heard by all within 600 ft of me

subclassfeature17.name: Complete Astral Self
subclassfeature17.description:
I can now also summon the body of my astral self; See third page notes section
   This spectral body covers my physique like armor, connecting with the arms and visage
action: Summon Astral Arms and/or Visage, or Complete

astral body.name: Astral Body
astral body.description:
[10 ki points]As a bonus action, I can summon the arms, visage, and body of my astral self for 10 min
   This gives me the arms, visage, +2 bonus to AC while not incapacitated, and as follows:
   When I take the Attack action I can choose to make 3 attacks with my astral arms instead
   As a reaction when a creature in 10 ft is reduced to 0 HP, I can regain my Wis mod in ki

subclassfeature1.name: Invasive Thoughts
subclassfeature1.description:
As a bonus action, I can telepathic link myself with a creature within 30 ft that I can see
   This lasts for 10 minutes, until I'm incapacitated or die, or I use this ability again
   I can telepathically talk with the target; It can speak back if it understands a language

subclassfeature1.1.name: Psionic Spells
subclassfeature1.1.description: I learn additional spells, which do not count towards the number of spell I can know

subclassfeature1.2.name: Warped Being
subclassfeature1.2.description: My aberrant origin gives me an AC of 13 + my Dex mod when I am not wearing armor

subclassfeature6.name: Psionic Sorcery
subclassfeature6.description:
I can expend sorcery points instead of a spell slot to cast a spell from my Psionic Spells
   This costs the spell's level in sorcery points, but the spell requires no other components

arms of hadar.compMaterial: If I cast this spell by expending Sorcery Points, it doesn't require any components
arms of hadar.changes: I can cast this spell by expending a number of Sorcery Points equal to its level instead of expending a spell slot. When I do so, the spell doesn't require any components.

dissonant whispers.compMaterial: If I cast this spell by expending Sorcery Points, it doesn't require any components
dissonant whispers.changes: I can cast this spell by expending a number of Sorcery Points equal to its level instead of expending a spell slot. When I do so, the spell doesn't require any components.

calm emotions.compMaterial: If I cast this spell by expending Sorcery Points, it doesn't require any components
calm emotions.changes: I can cast this spell by expending a number of Sorcery Points equal to its level instead of expending a spell slot. When I do so, the spell doesn't require any components.

detect thoughts.compMaterial:
A copper piece
If I cast this spell by expending Sorcery Points, it doesn't require any components
detect thoughts.changes: I can cast this spell by expending a number of Sorcery Points equal to its level instead of expending a spell slot. When I do so, the spell doesn't require any components.

hunger of hadar.compMaterial:
A pickled octopus tentacle
If I cast this spell by expending Sorcery Points, it doesn't require any components
hunger of hadar.changes: I can cast this spell by expending a number of Sorcery Points equal to its level instead of expending a spell slot. When I do so, the spell doesn't require any components.

sending.compMaterial:
A short piece of fine copper wire
If I cast this spell by expending Sorcery Points, it doesn't require any components
sending.changes: I can cast this spell by expending a number of Sorcery Points equal to its level instead of expending a spell slot. When I do so, the spell doesn't require any components.

compulsion.compMaterial: If I cast this spell by expending Sorcery Points, it doesn't require any components
compulsion.changes: I can cast this spell by expending a number of Sorcery Points equal to its level instead of expending a spell slot. When I do so, the spell doesn't require any components.

evard's black tentacles.compMaterial:
A piece of tentacle from a giant octopus or a giant squid
If I cast this spell by expending Sorcery Points, it doesn't require any components
evard's black tentacles.changes: I can cast this spell by expending a number of Sorcery Points equal to its level instead of expending a spell slot. When I do so, the spell doesn't require any components.

modify memory.compMaterial: If I cast this spell by expending Sorcery Points, it doesn't require any components
modify memory.changes: I can cast this spell by expending a number of Sorcery Points equal to its level instead of expending a spell slot. When I do so, the spell doesn't require any components.

rary's telepathic bond.compMaterial:
Pieces of eggshell from two different kinds of creatures
If I cast this spell by expending Sorcery Points, it doesn't require any components
rary's telepathic bond.changes: I can cast this spell by expending a number of Sorcery Points equal to its level instead of expending a spell slot. When I do so, the spell doesn't require any components.

subclassfeature6.1.name: Psychic Defenses
subclassfeature6.1.description: I gain resistance to psychic damage and adv. on saves vs. being charmed or frightened

subclassfeature14.name: Revelation in Flesh
subclassfeature14.description:
As a bonus action, I can expend 1 or more sorcery points to transform for 1 minute
   For each sorcery point used, I gain one of the following benefits of my choice:
   • I gain a swimming speed equal to my walking speed and the ability to breathe water
   • I gain a flying speed equal to my walking speed and I can hover
   • I can move, with equipment, through any space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing
     I can spend 5 ft of movement to escape form a grapple or from nonmagical restraints
   • I am aware of the location of any hidden/invisible creatures within 60 ft of me

subclassfeature18.name: Warp Reality
subclassfeature18.description:
As an action, I can radiate a 20-ft radius aura of difficult terrain for 1 minute
   Creatures that start their turn within the aura take 2d10 psychic damage
   When creating it, I can choose any creatures I can see to be unaffected by this aura
   As a bonus action, I can end this aura to teleport myself and others away
   I teleport myself and any creature in the aura to a location I can see within 1 mile
   An unwilling creature can succeed on a Charisma saving throw to avoid being teleported

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature1.name: Grasp of the Deep
subclassfeature1.description:
As a bonus action, I can summon or move a spectral tentacle and make an attack with it
   I can summon it to a space within 60 ft that I can see or move an existing one 30 ft
   I make melee spell attacks with 10 ft reach with it that deal cold or lightning damage
   Creatures hit by the tentacle suffer 10 ft speed reduction until the start of my next turn
   The 10-ft long tentacle lasts for 1 minute or until I summon another

weaponOptions.name: Grasp of the Deep
weaponOptions.description: My choice of cold or lightning damage; Target -10 ft speed until my next turn starts

subclassfeature1.1.name: Scion of the Deep
subclassfeature1.1.description:
I can communicate telepathically with any aberration, beast, elemental, or monstrosity
   The creature must be within 120 ft of me and have an innate swimming speed

subclassfeature6.name: Fathomless Soul
subclassfeature6.description:
[cold resistance]
   I have a swimming speed equal to my walking speed; I can breathe both air and water

subclassfeature6.1.name: Guardian Grasp
subclassfeature6.1.description:
As a reaction when a creature in 10 ft of my tentacle takes damage, I can have it help
   One creature takes only half damage and my spectral tentacle vanishes

subclassfeature10.name: Devouring Maw
subclassfeature10.description:
As an action, I can summon a 10-ft radius translucent maw within 60 ft for 1 minute
   Creatures in the maw as it appear must Str save or be restrained, can repeat as action
   Creatures starting their turn in the maw take 3d6 cold or lightning damage (my choice)
   If a creature is in the maw at the start of my turn, I gain my warlock level in temp HP

subclassfeature14.name: Unleash the Depths
subclassfeature14.description:
As an action, I can choose one of the following effects to occur within 30 ft of me:
   • Teleport myself and up to 5 willing creatures I can see within 30 ft of the chosen point
     The destination must be within 100 miles and visited by me within the last 24 hours
   • 5 creatures within 30 ft of the chosen point that I can see are attacked by tentacles
     The targets take 6d10 cold or lightning damage (my choice) and are knocked prone
     Each can make a Dexterity save to halve the damage and avoid being knocked prone

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Universal Speech
subclassfeature3.description:
As a bonus action, I can expend one bardic inspiration die to make me understood by all
   I roll the die, that many creatures I can see within 60 ft of me are affected for 10 min
   Those affected magically understand me and I gain adv. on Cha checks to influence them

subclassfeature3.1.name: Soothing Words
subclassfeature3.1.description: I can cast Calm Emotions without expending a spell slot

subclassfeature6.name: Undeniable Logic
subclassfeature6.description:
As a bonus action, I can expend one bardic inspiration die to encourage or befuddle
   One creature I can see within 60 ft that can hear me gets one of the following effects:
    • It heals HP equal to the die roll and has adv. on its next save before my next turn ends
    • It suffers psychic damage equal to the die roll and must make an Intelligence save
      On a failed save, it also suffers disadv. on its next save before the end of my next turn

subclassfeature14.name: Infectious Inspiration
subclassfeature14.description:
My bardic inspiration dice are not lost if the check, attack, or save it was added to fails
   As a reaction when the same thing happens but the roll succeeds, I can inspire another
   I give a creature within 60 ft that can hear me an inspiration die without expending any
   I can use this reaction a number of times per long rest equal to my Cha mod (min 1)

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Peerless Athlete
subclassfeature3.description: As a bonus action, I gain adv. on Str (Athletics) and Dex (Acrobatics) checks for 10 min

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Legendary Strike
subclassfeature3.1.description: As a bonus action, my weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 for 1 min

subclassfeature7.name: Mighty Deed
subclassfeature7.description:
When I score a critical hit or reduce a target to 0 HP, I can bolster morale or demoralize
   Up to my Cha mod (min 1) of creatures I can see in 30 ft suffer the same chosen effect:
    • All creatures gain temp HP equal to 1d6 + my Charisma modifier (min 1 temp HP)
    • All creatures must make a Wis save or be frightened of me until my next turn starts

subclassfeature15.name: Glorious Defense
subclassfeature15.description:
As a reaction when a creature I can see hits me with an attack roll, I can gain bonus AC
   I add my Cha mod (min 1) to my AC for that attack, potentially causing it to miss me
   If it misses, I can make one weapon attack against the attacker as part of this reaction

subclassfeature20.name: Living Myth
subclassfeature20.description:
As a bonus action, I can gain the following benefits for 1 minute:
    • I have advantage on all Charisma checks
    • Once on each of my turns when I miss with a weapon attack, I can cause it to hit
    • As a reaction when I fail a saving throw, I can choose to succeed instead

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature1.description: I gain proficiency with martial weapons and heavy armor

subclassfeature1.1.name: Eyes of Night
subclassfeature1.1.description:
I gain Darkvision with unlimited range and can give this benefit to allies
   As an action, I can grant this to chosen creatures I can see within 10 ft for 10 minutes

subclassfeature1.2.name: Vigilant Blessing
subclassfeature1.2.description:
As an action, I can grant myself or a creature I touch adv. on the next initiative roll
   This benefit ends immediately after the roll or when I use this feature again

subclassfeature2.name: Channel Divinity: Twilight Sanctuary
subclassfeature2.description:
As an action, I can use my holy symbol to create a 30-ft radius sphere around myself
   It moves with me, is filled with dim light, and lasts for 1 min or until I'm incapacitated
   When a creature, including me, ends its turn inside the sphere, I can grant it a benefit
   It either gains 1d8 temp HP or one effect causing it to be charmed or frightened ends

subclassfeature6.name: Steps of the Brave
subclassfeature6.description:
I have adv. on saves against being frightened
   As a bonus action while I'm in dim light or darkness, I can give myself a fly speed
   This fly speed is equal to my walking speed and lasts until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature8.name: Divine Strike
subclassfeature8.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature with a weapon attack, I can do extra damage

atkAdd: Once per turn, I can have one of my weapon attacks that hit do extra psychic damage.

subclassfeature17.name: Midnight Shroud
subclassfeature17.description:
When I use a spell slot to cast Darkness, I can choose my Wis mod of creatures I can see
   The chosen creatures can see through the Darkness; I can be one of the chosen creatures

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){if("darkness"==e&&(!a.fistCol||"markedbox"==a.fistCol))return a.description="15-ft rad darkness on point/obj; no darkvision; only magic light SL 3+ works; Wis mod of crea can see",!0}

spellAdd: When I cast Darkness using a spell slot, I can choose a number of creatures that I can see (myself included) equal to my Wisdom modifier (minimum 1).The chosen creatures can see through the Darkness.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature2.name: Circle Spells
subclassfeature2.description:
My mystical bond with a wildfire spirit gives me the ability to cast certain spells
   These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare
   In addition, I learn the Fire Bolt cantrip

subclassfeature2.1.name: Summon Wildfire
subclassfeature2.1.description:
As an action, I can expend a use of wild shape to summon a wildfire spirit within 30 ft
   All within 10 ft of where it manifests must make a Dex save or take 2d10 fire damage
   It disappears after 1 hour, when it is reduced to 0 HP, or I summon another
   It obeys my commands, is friendly to my allies and I, and acts on my initiative, after me
   Unless I use a bonus action to command it, it only takes the Dodge action on its turn
   Its HP maximum is equal to its Con mod + my Wis mod + five times my druid level

creatureOptions.name: Wildfire Spirit
creatureOptions.languages: understands the languages of its creator

attacks.name: Fiery Teleportation
attacks.description: Dex save for all within 10 ft of teleportation origin, success - no damage; See traits

attacks.name: Fiery Manifestation
attacks.description: Dex save for all within 10 ft where spirit is summoned, success - no damage

features.name: Creator
features.description: The spirit obeys the commands of its creator and has the same proficiency bonus. It takes its turn immediately after its creator, on the same initiative count. It only takes the Dodge action, unless its creator takes a bonus action to command to do otherwise, in which case it can only take the Flame Seed, Fiery Teleportation, Dash, Disengage, Help, or Hide action.

actions.name: Fiery Teleportation (1× per short rest)
actions.description: The spirit and each willing creature of its creator's choice within 5 ft of it teleport up to 30 ft to unoccupied spaces its creator can see. Each creature within 10 ft of the space that the spirit left must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw against its creator's spell save DC or take fire damage equal to 1d6 + its proficiency bonus.

hp.body: function(e,a,t){var n,i,o;classes.known.druid&&(n=Number(What("Wis Mod")),i=classes.known.druid.level,a.alt.push(a.conMod+n+(o=5*i)),a.altStr.push(" = "+a.conMod+" from its Constitution modifier\n + "+n+" from its creator's Intelligence modifier\n + 5 × "+i+" from five times its creator's druid level ("+o+")"))}

subclassfeature6.name: Enhanced Bond
subclassfeature6.description:
While my wildfire spirit is present, I can have my spells originate from it (no range 'self')
   Also, I can then add 1d8 to a single roll of my spells that restore HP or deal fire damage

subclassfeature10.name: Flames of Life
subclassfeature10.description:
As a reaction when a creature dies in 30 ft of me/wildfire spirit, I can have flames erupt
   The creature has to be Small or larger; The flames last for 1 minute or until touched
   When I see someone touch the flames, it heals or takes fire damage for 2d10 + Wis mod

subclassfeature14.name: Blazing Endurance
subclassfeature14.description:
If I drop to 0 HP and don't die, I can stay at 1 HP instead with 5× druid level temp HP
   Also, all chosen creatures that I can see within 30 ft take 2d10 + druid level fire damage

subclassfeature2.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature2.description: I learn a language of my choice and gain proficiency with calligrapher's tools

subclassfeature2.1.name: Extract Name
subclassfeature2.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can have a creature I can see within 60 ft make a Wisdom save
   If failed, it is charmed by me until my next turn ends and I mentally learn its true name
   If successful, I know that my magic failed and can't use this feature again on it

subclassfeature2.2.name: Fateful Naming
subclassfeature2.2.description:
I add Bane and Bless to my spellbook and they count as wizard spells for me
   These are always prepared, but don't count against the number of spells I can prepare
   I can cast either spell without using a spell slot by speaking the true name of a target

subclassfeature6.name: Resonants
subclassfeature6.description:
Use the "Choose Feature" button above to add Resonants to the third page
   Whenever I gain a wizard level, I can replace a Resonant I know with another

absorption.name: Absorption
absorption.description: When the spell deals damage to the named target, I gain a number of temporary hit points

devastation.name: Devastation
devastation.description: The named creature has disadvantage on its first saving throw against the spell

dissolution.name: Dissolution
dissolution.description: The first time the named creature takes damage from the spell, it takes extra damage

nullification.name: Nullification
nullification.description:
If the named creature is affected by any other spells, I know what those spells are
   In addition, I can try to end one of my choice with an Int check (DC 10 + spell level)

puppetry.name: Puppetry
puppetry.description:
The first time the named creature takes damage from the spell, it is moved as well
   I choose to knock it prone or move it up to 10 ft directly towards me or away from me

sympathy.name: Sympathy
sympathy.description: I can target the named creature with the spell even if I can't see it or it is has total cover

subclassfeature6.1.name: Resonant Utterance
subclassfeature6.1.description:
When I use a spell slot to cast a wizard spell, I can use one resonant that I know
   The resonant will only work if I speak the true name of a creature targeted by the spell

subclassfeature14.name: Relentless Naming
subclassfeature14.description:
When I speak the true name of a creature when I cast a damage dealing spell at it,
   I can have that spell deal force or psychic damage instead of its normal damage type

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature3.description: I gain proficiency with smith's tools and I learn to speak, read, and write Giant

subclassfeature3.1.name: Rune Magic
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I learn how to use runes to enhance my weapons, armor, and shields
   Use the "Choose Feature" button above to select a rune and add it to the third page
   When I finish a long rest, I can inscribe each rune I know upon a different item I touch
   Each item can hold only one rune and remains there until I finish a long rest
   Runes inscribed on a carried object grant both a passive and a limited-use active effect
   Whenever I gain a fighter level, I can swap a rune I know for another
   The DC for a rune's abilities is 8 + my Proficiency bonus + my Intelligence modifier

haug (hill rune).name: Haug
haug (hill rune).description:
While I wear an object inscribed with this rune, I gain a resilience reminiscent of hill giants
   I always gain advantage on saves against being poisoned and resistance to poison damage
   As a bonus action, I can invoke it to gain resistance to bludg/slash/pierc damage for 1 min

ild (fire rune).name: Ild
ild (fire rune).description:
While I wear an object inscribed with this, I gain craftsmanship reminiscent of fire giants
   I always double my proficiency bonus when making an ability check with a tool
   When I hit a creature with a weapon attack, I can invoke it to summon fiery shackles
   It must make a Str save or be restrained for 1 min; Repeat save at end of each of its turns
   While restrained, the creature takes 2d6 fire damage at the start of each of its turns
ild (fire rune).skillstxt: expertise with all tools I am proficient with

ise (frost rune).name: Ise
ise (frost rune).description:
While I wear an object inscribed with this, I gain a stoic calm reminiscent of frost giants
   I always gain advantage on Wisdom (Animal Handling) and Charisma (Intimidation) checks
   As a bonus action, I can invoke this rune to gain +2 Strength (max 30) for 10 minutes

skye (cloud rune).name: Skye
skye (cloud rune).description:
While I wear an object inscribed with this, I gain a deceptiveness reminiscent of cloud giants
   I always gain advantage on Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) and Charisma (Deception) checks
   As a reaction when I or a target I see get hit by an attack within 30 ft, I can invoke this
   This causes the attack to target another within 30 ft with the same roll (ignore range)

stein (stone rune).name: Stein
stein (stone rune).description:
While I wear an object inscribed with this, I gain insightfulness reminiscent of stone giants
   I always gain adv. on Wisdom (Insight) checks and I gain darkvision 60 ft (or +30 ft)
   As a reaction when a creature I can see ends it turn within 30 ft, I can invoke this rune
   This causes the creature to make a Wisdom save or be charmed by me for 1 minute
   While charmed, it descends into a dreamy stupor, becoming incapacitated and has speed 0
   This ends early if it takes damage or someone uses an action to shake it out of this state

uvar (storm rune).name: Uvar
uvar (storm rune).description:
While I wear an object inscribed with this rune, I can glimpse the future like storm giants
   I always gain adv. on Int (Arcana) checks and I can't be surprised while not incapacitated
   As a bonus action, I can invoke it to enter a prophetic state for 1 min or till incapacitated
   While in this state, I can use a reaction to cause a roll to gain advantage or disadvantage
   I can do this for attacks, saves, and checks of myself or others I can see within 60 ft of me

subclassfeature3.2.name: Giant Might
subclassfeature3.2.description:
As a bonus action, I can imbue myself with giant magic for 1 minute and gain benefits:
    • Space permitted, I grow to Large size along with everything I'm wearing
    • Advantage on Strength check and saves; My weapon attacks deal extra damage

text: Adv. on Str saves in giant might

subclassfeature7.name: Defensive Runes
subclassfeature7.description:
As a reaction when I see a creature get hit by an attack within 60 ft, I can grant it AC
   The creature adds 1 + my Int mod (min 2) to its AC for the attack; I learn another rune

subclassfeature10.name: Great Stature
subclassfeature10.description:
My runes permanently make me grow; I add 3d4 inches to my length
   In addition, my Giant Might adds more weapon damage and I learn another rune

subclassfeature15.name: Rune Magic Mastery
subclassfeature15.description: I can use each of my runes twice instead of once per short rest and I learn another rune

subclassfeature18.name: Blessing of the All Father
subclassfeature18.description: When I use Giant Might, I can have it also affect a willing ally that I can see within 60 ft

subclassfeature3.name: Swarmkeeper Magic
subclassfeature3.description:
I learn Mage Hand; When I cast it, the hand takes the form of swarming nature spirits
   I get bonus spells known, which do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.1.name: Gathered Swarm
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I constantly have a swarm of fey spirits crawling in my space, they look like Tiny beasts
   As a bonus action, I can agitate that swarm for 1 minute, empowering my attacks
   Once per turn when I hit with a weapon attack, I can have it deal extra force damage
   In addition, the creature hit is moved 5 ft towards or away from me (my choice)

subclassfeature7.name: Writhing Tide
subclassfeature7.description:
Whenever I activate Gathered Swarm, I gain one additional benefit of my choice:
    • I gain +10 ft walking speed and I can take the Disengage action as a bonus action
    • I gain climb speed equal to walk speed & need no check for difficult surfaces or ceilings
    • I gain a 10 ft fly speed and I can hover

scuttling eyes.name: Scuttling Eyes
scuttling eyes.description:
As an action, I can from a spirit of my swarm into a Tiny beast of my choice for 1 hour
   It has AC 18, my senses, and 40 ft speed it can use to walk, climb, fly, or swim
   It telepathically relays what it sees and hears to me and I can speak through it
   During my turn, I can telepathically command it and it can hide using my Stealth
   If it is damaged, I must make a Wis save (DC 10 or half damage if higher) or it vanishes
   As an action, I can dismiss it early and I can teleport to an empty space within 5 ft of it
   I can also invoke this ability by spending a spell slot of 3rd level or higher

storm of minions.name: Storm of Minions
storm of minions.description:
As an action, I can create a 10-ft radius swarm-filled sphere on a point within 120 ft
   I can choose any number of creatures that I can see to be unaffected by it
   It lasts minute, is difficult terrain for others, and I can move it 30 ft as a bonus action
   Others that start their turn in it take 2d8 necrotic damage and must make a Con save
   On a success, they take half damage, but if failed, are blinded until their next turn starts
   At the start of my turn, if a Small or larger creature was damaged by it, I heal 1d8 HP
   I can also invoke this ability by spending a spell slot of 4th level or higher

subclassfeature3.name: Tokens of Past Lives
subclassfeature3.description: I gain a chosen skill or tool proficiency and can change it whenever I finish a long rest
subclassfeature3.skillstxt: Choose one skill or tool; I can change the choice whenever I finish a long rest

subclassfeature3.1.name: Revived Nature
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I have resistance to poison damage and adv. on saves against disease and being poisoned
   I don't need to eat, drink, breathe, or sleep; I must spend 4 hours inactive for a long rest
   I'm motionless during this inactive state, remain semiconscious, and can hear as normal

subclassfeature3.2.name: Bolts from the Grave
subclassfeature3.2.description:
Immediately after I use my cunning action, I can unleash bolts of necrotic energy
   This is a ranged spell attack with 30 ft range, which I'm proficient with, using Dexterity
   If it hits, it deals my sneak attack damage, provided I didn't use sneak attack this turn

weaponOptions.name: Bolts from the Grave
weaponOptions.description: Immediately after using cunning action; Only if I not yet used sneak attack this turn

subclassfeature9.name: Connect with the Dead
subclassfeature9.description:
I can cast Speak with Dead without a spell slot or material components using Intelligence
   Doing this gives me a random proficiency (roll 1d3) that lasts until I finish my next rest:
   [1] language of my choice; [2] skill or tool of my choice; [3] saving throw of my choice

speak with dead.changes: Using Connect with the Dead, I can cast Speak with Dead once per short rest without using a spell slot or material component.

subclassfeature13.name: Audience with Death
subclassfeature13.description:
I have adv. on death saves; Whenever I make one, I can ask a question to a death entity
   It answers truthfully with "yes", "no", or "unknown", using the knowledge of all that died
   When at 0 HP and healed or stabilized, I can change any of my traits/ideals/bonds/flaws

ethereal jaunt.name: Ethereal Jaunt
ethereal jaunt.description:
I can now use my cunning action to teleport to an unoccupied space within 30 ft
   I don't need to see where I'm going, but it fails if I'd go through a magical force effect
   I'm shunted if I appear in an occupied space and take force damage of 2× the ft moved

subclassfeature3.name: Psionic Armament
description:
When I finish a long rest, I can choose to augment my defenses or strikes until the next
    • As a reaction, augmented defenses allow me to reduce the damage taken by 1d10
      I can reduce the damage taken by myself or by a creature that I can see within 30 ft
    • Once per turn, augmented strikes adds +1d4 psychic damage to my weapon attack

When I finish a long rest, I can choose to augment my defenses or strikes until the next

      I can reduce the damage taken by myself or by a creature that I can see within 30 ft
    • Once per turn, augmented strikes adds +1d4 psychic damage to my weapon attack

    • As a reaction, augmented defenses allow me to reduce the damage taken by 1d12
