subclassfeature14.description: Unless Incapacitated, when making a Dex save to take only half damage, myself and allies within 5 ft take no damage on a success & half on a fail.

subclassfeature3.name: Beguiling Magic
subclassfeature3.description:
I always have Charm Person and Mirror Image prepared.
   After I cast an Ench or Illus spell with a spell slot, I can force a Wis save on a creature I can see within 60 ft On a fail the target is Charmed OR Frightened for 1 min. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.
   I can spend one Bardic Inspiration (no action) or Long Rest to restore this feature.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Mantle of Inspiration
subclassfeature3.1.description: As a Bonus Action up to my Cha mod (min 1) creatures within 60 feet gain [2 x one BI die roll] Temp HP and can move up to its Speed as a Reaction w/out Opportunity Attacks.

subclassfeature6.name: Mantle of Majesty
subclassfeature6.description:
I always have Command prepared.
   As a bonus action, I can appear unearthly up to 1 min; At the same time & during this I can cast Command without spell slots; Creatures charmed by me automatically fail.
   I can restore it by spending a level 3+ spell slot (no action) or finish a Long Rest.

subclassfeature14.name: Unbreakable Majesty
subclassfeature14.description: Once per rest as a Bonus Action for 1 min or until Incapacitated, when a creature attacks & hits me for the first time on a turn it must succeed a Cha save or miss.

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature3.description: I gain proficiency with three skills.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Cutting Words
subclassfeature3.1.description: When a creature I can see within 60 ft rolls for damage, passes a check, or attacks, I can take a Reaction to spend BI die; Subtract the number rolled from the creature's roll.

subclassfeature6.name: Magical Discoveries
subclassfeature6.description:
Learn two spells from the Cleric, Druid, or Wizard spell lists. They're always prepared.
   When I gain a Bard level I can replace one spell with another that I have slots for.

subclassfeature14.name: Peerless Skill
subclassfeature14.description: When I fail a check/attack I can roll one BI die & add it. The BI isn't spent on a fail.

subclassfeature3.name: Combat Inspiration
subclassfeature3.description:
A creature with a BI die from me can use it for one of the following:
   Defense: When hit by an attack it can roll the BI die as a Reaction & add it to its AC.
   Offense: When it hits with an attack it can roll the BI die & add it to the damage.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Martial Training
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I gain proficiency with Martial weapons & training with Medium armor & Shields.
   I can use a Simple/Martial weapon as a Spellcasting Focus to cast my Bard Spells.

subclassfeature6.name: Extra Attack
subclassfeature6.description:
I can attack twice instead of once when I Attack on my turn.
   I can cast a cantrip that has a casting time of an action in place of one of those attacks.

subclassfeature14.name: Battle Magic
subclassfeature14.description: After I cast a spell that takes an action, I can make a weapon attack as a Bonus Action.

subclassfeature3.name: Disciple of Life
subclassfeature3.description: When I cast a spell with a spell slot that gives HP it gives addtl 2 + slot level HP.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Preserve Life
subclassfeature3.1.description: As a Magic action I restore 5 x my Cleric level HP, divided among Bloodied creatures I choose within 30 ft, up to half their max HP.

subclassfeature6.name: Blessed Healer
subclassfeature6.description: When I restore HP with a spell slot to another creature(s), I regain 2 + slot level HP.

subclassfeature17.name: Supreme Healing
subclassfeature17.description: I can heal max HP when I would roll to restore HP with a spell or Channel Divinity.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Radiance of Dawn
subclassfeature3.description: As a Magic action I dispel magical Darkness w/in 30 ft Each creature of my choice in that area must pass a Con save for half damage or take Radiant damage.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Warding Flare
subclassfeature3.1.description: When a creature I can see w/in 30 feet makes an attack roll I can impose Disadv as a reaction.

subclassfeature6.name: Improved Warding Flare
subclassfeature6.description: I regain all uses of Warding Flare when I finish a rest. When I use it I can give the target of the attack 2d6 + my Wis mod Temp HP.

subclassfeature17.name: Corona of Light
subclassfeature17.description: As a Magic action, I can emit Bright Light in a 60-ft radius and Dim Light for an addtl 30 ft (sunlight) for 1 min or until dismissed (no action). Foes in the Bright Light have Disadv on saves against my Radiance of the Dawn & Fire or Radiant spell damage.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Blessing of the Trickster
subclassfeature3.description: As a Magic action I can give a willing creature w/in 30 ft or myself Adv on Dex (Stealth) checks until I finish a Long Rest or use this again.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Invoke Duplicity
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a Bonus Action I can create an animated intangible illusory double of myself in an empty space w/in 30 ft for 1 min, until dismissed (no action), or I'm Incapacitated; it doesn't occupy its space. While active I have these benefits:
   Cast Spells: I can cast spells through my double but must use my own senses.
   Distract: I have Adv on Attack rolls against creatures w/in 5 ft of my double & I.
   Move: As a Bonus Action I can move my double up to 30 ft to an empty space w/in 120 ft of me.

subclassfeature6.name: Trickster's Transposition
subclassfeature6.description: When I use a Bonus Action to create or move my double I can swap places with it.

subclassfeature17.name: Improved Duplicity
subclassfeature17.description:
My Invoke Duplicity illusion has grown more powerful:
   Shared Distraction: Allies & I have Adv on attacks vs creatures w/in 5 ft of the double.
   Healing Illusion: When the illusion ends I choose a creature w/in 5 feet of it or myself to regain my Cleric level HP.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Guided Strikes
subclassfeature3.description: I can give a +10 bonus when a creature within 300 ft (Reaction) or I (no action) miss an attack roll.

subclassfeature3.1.name: War Priest
subclassfeature3.1.description: As a Bonus Action, I can make one attack with a weapon or an Unarmed Strike.

subclassfeature6.name: Channel Divinity: War God's Blessing
subclassfeature6.description: I can cast Shield of Faith or Spiritual Weapon without a spell slot or Conc; it lasts 1 min, until I cast it again, become Incapacitated, or die.

subclassfeature14.name: Avatar of Battle
subclassfeature14.description: I gain Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Circle of the Land Spells

arid land.name: Arid Land
arid land.description: Whenever I finish a Long Rest, choose one type of land; arid, polar, temperate, or tropical. I have certain spells prepared based on the land chosen.

polar land.name: Polar Land
polar land.description: Whenever I finish a Long Rest, choose one type of land; arid, polar, temperate, or tropical. I have certain spells prepared based on the land chosen.

temperate land.name: Temperate Land
temperate land.description: Whenever I finish a Long Rest, choose one type of land; arid, polar, temperate, or tropical. I have certain spells prepared based on the land chosen.

tropical land.name: Tropical Land
tropical land.description: Whenever I finish a Long Rest, choose one type of land; arid, polar, temperate, or tropical. I have certain spells prepared based on the land chosen.

subclassfeature3.description: Whenever I finish a Long Rest, choose one type of land; arid, polar, temperate, or tropical. I have certain spells prepared based on the land chosen.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Land's Aid
subclassfeature3.1.description: As a Magic action, expend a Wild Shape use to create a 10-foot sphere within 60 feet. Chosen creatures in the sphere make a Constitution save against my spell DC, taking a number of d6s Necrotic damage (half on success). One creature in the area regains the same number of d6s HP.

subclassfeature6.name: Natural Recovery
subclassfeature6.description: Once per long rest, cast a prepared circle spell (level 1+) without using a spell slot. After a short rest, recover expended spell slots totaling up to half my druid level (rounded up, max 5th level).

subclassfeature10.name: Nature's Ward

arid land.name: Arid Land
arid land.description: I am immune to the Poisoned condition, and have damage resistance associated with my current land choice.[Fire]

polar land.name: Polar Land
polar land.description: I am immune to the Poisoned condition, and have damage resistance associated with my current land choice.[Cold]

temperate land.name: Temperate Land
temperate land.description: I am immune to the Poisoned condition, and have damage resistance associated with my current land choice.[Lightning]

tropical land.name: Tropical Land
tropical land.description: I am immune to the Poisoned condition, and have damage resistance associated with my current land choice.[Poison]

subclassfeature10.description: I am immune to the Poisoned condition, and have damage resistance associated with my current land choice.

subclassfeature14.name: Nature's Sanctuary
subclassfeature14.description: As a Magic action, I can use my Wild Shape to create a 15-foot cube within 120 feet. It lasts for 1 minute or until I'm incapacitated or die. In this area, my allies and I have Half Cover, and my allies gain the current Resistance from my Nature's Ward. As a Bonus Action, move the cube up to 60 feet within 120 feet

subclassfeature3.name: Circle Forms
subclassfeature3.description: In Wild Shape: My maximum form's Challenge Rating is my Druid level divided by 3. My AC becomes greatest of 13 plus my Wisdom modifier or the Beast's AC. I also gain Temporary Hit Points equal to three times my Druid level.

wild shape.name: Wild Shape
wild shape.description:
As a bonus action, I assume the shape of a beast I have seen before with these rules:
    • I gain all its game statistics except Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma
    • I get its skill/saving throw prof. while keeping my own, using whichever is higher
    • I gain three times my Druid level Temp HP
    • I can't cast spells in beast form, but transforming doesn't break concentration
    • I retain my HP, hit dice, class features, feats and creature type
    • I can choose whether equipment falls to the ground, merges, or stays worn
    • I revert if out of time or Incapacitated; I die, or I end it as a Bonus Action

subclassfeature6.name: Improved Circle Forms
subclassfeature6.description: In Wild Shape, I can choose to deal Radiant damage with my attacks. I also add my Wisdom modifier to Constitution saving throws.

subclassfeature10.name: Moonlight Step
subclassfeature10.description:
As a Bonus Action, I can teleport up to 30 feet and gain Advantage on my next attack roll this turn.
   I can do this a number of times per long rest equal to my Wisdom modifier or by expending a level 2+ spell slot.

subclassfeature14.name: Lunar Form
subclassfeature14.description:
Once per turn, I can deal an extra 2d10 Radiant damage with a Wild Shape attack.
   When using Moonlight Step, I can also teleport one willing creature within 10 feet to a space within 10 feet of my destination.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Wrath of the Sea
subclassfeature3.description:
As a Bonus Action, I can use my Wild Shape to create a 5-foot ocean spray around me for 10 minutes.
   Each turn, I can target a creature in the spray, forcing a Constitution save or dealing WIS * d6 Cold damage and pushing it 15 feet away.

subclassfeature6.name: Aquatic Affinity
subclassfeature6.description: My ocean spray increases to a 10-foot radius, and I gain a Swim Speed equal to my walking Speed.

subclassfeature10.name: Stormborn
subclassfeature10.description: While my ocean spray is active, I gain a Fly Speed equal to my walking Speed and Resistance to Cold, Lightning, and Thunder damage

subclassfeature14.name: Oceanic Gift
subclassfeature14.description: I can manifest my ocean spray around another willing creature within 60 feet. By expending two uses of Wild Shape, I can cover both myself and the other creature with the spray.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Star Map
subclassfeature3.description:
I've created a star map, a Tiny object which i can use as my spellcasting focus.
   If I lose it, I can recreate the map during a Short or Long Rest.
   While holding it, I know the Guidance cantrip and always have Guiding Bolt prepared.
   I can cast Guiding Bolt without expending a spell slot, up to my Wisdom modifier times per long rest.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Starry Form
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can expend a use of wild shape to take on a starry form for 10 min
   In that form I become luminous and shed bright light in a 10-ft radius and dim light for an extra 10-ft radius
   When I do so, I choose one constellation that glimmers on my body, granting me benefits
   See the 3rd page's "Notes" section for the benefits of the possible constellations

weaponOptions.name: Luminous Arrow
weaponOptions.description: Use as bonus action

archer constellation.name: Archer Constellation
archer constellation.description: As a bonus action, I can make a ranged spell attack to hurl a luminous arrow 60 ft

chalice constellation.name: Chalice Constellation
chalice constellation.description: When I cast a healing spell with a spell slot, I can heal myself or another within 30 ft of me

dragon constellation.name: Dragon Constellation
dragon constellation.description:
I can treat a roll below 10 as a 10 for Int/Wis/Con checks and saves to maintain concentration
   From 10th-level onwards, I also gain a flying speed of 20 ft and can hover

subclassfeature6.name: Cosmic Omen
subclassfeature6.description:
When I finish a long rest, I roll a die to gain an omen based on the result (odd/even)
   As a reaction when a creature I can see in 30 ft makes an D20 Test, I can:
    • Weal (even): add 1d6 to the number rolled to the total
    • Woe (odd): subtract 1d6 from the number rolled to the total

subclassfeature10.name: Twinkling Constellations
subclassfeature10.description:
While in my starry form, I can change the constellation at the start of each of my turns
   The benefit of my constellations improve, see the 3rd page's "Notes" section

subclassfeature14.name: Full of Stars
subclassfeature14.description: while in starry form, I gain Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.

subclassfeature3.name: Combat Superiority
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain a number of superiority dice that I can use to fuel special Maneuvers
   I regain all superiority dice after a short rest

subclassfeature3.1.name: Maneuvers
subclassfeature3.1.description:
Use the "Choose Feature" button above to add a Maneuver to the third page
   I can use a Maneuver by expending a superiority die (only one Maneuver per attack)

commander's strike.name: Commander's Strike
commander's strike.description:
I forgo one attack of my Attack action to use a bonus action to direct an ally I see/hear
   The ally can use a reaction to make an attack, adding the superiority die to damage

disarming attack.name: Disarming Attack
disarming attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to my attack's damage
   Target makes a Strength save or drops a held object of my choice to its feet

distracting strike.name: Distracting Strike
distracting strike.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to my attack's damage
   The next attack of an ally before my next turn has adv. against the creature

evasive footwork.name: Evasive Footwork
evasive footwork.description: Use when moving; I add the superiority die to my AC until I stop moving

feinting attack.name: Feinting Attack
feinting attack.description:
As a bonus action, I can feint to gain adv. on my next attack this turn vs. a target in 5 ft
   If the attack hits, I add the superiority die to my attack's damage

goading attack.name: Goading Attack
goading attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to my attack's damage
   Target makes a Wis save or has disadv. vs. other targets until the end of my next turn

lunging attack.name: Lunging Attack
lunging attack.description:
I can spend a superiority die to increase the reach of a melee weapon attack by 5 ft
   If the attack hits, I add the superiority die to my attack's damage

maneuvering attack.name: Maneuvering Attack
maneuvering attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to my attack's damage
   Ally can use reaction to move half speed without opportunity attack from the target

menacing attack.name: Menacing Attack
menacing attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to my attack's damage
   Target makes a Wisdom save or is frightened of me until the end of my next turn

parry.name: Parry
parry.description: When damaged in melee, I can use a reaction to reduce it by superiority die + Dex mod

precision attack.name: Precision Attack
precision attack.description: I add the superiority die to my attack roll, either before or after rolling

pushing attack.name: Pushing Attack
pushing attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to the attack's damage
   If target is Large or smaller, it must make a Strength save or be pushed up to 15 ft away

rally.name: Rally
rally.description: Ally that can see/hear me gets temporary HP equal to superiority die + Charisma mod

riposte.name: Riposte
riposte.description:
When missed in melee, I can use my reaction to make one melee attack vs. the attacker
   If the attack hits, I add the superiority die to my attack's damage

sweeping attack.name: Sweeping Attack
sweeping attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature and a second creature is within 5 ft of the first
   If the original attack roll hits this second creature, it takes the superiority die in damage

trip attack.name: Trip Attack
trip attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to the attack's damage
   If target is Large or smaller, it must make a Strength save or be knocked prone

_optionalChoices.name: Ambush
_optionalChoices.description:
When I make an initiative roll or a Dex (Stealth) check, I can add a superiority die to it
   I can't do this if I'm incapacitated

_optionalChoices.name: Bait and Switch
_optionalChoices.description:
On my turn, I can expend a superiority die to swap places with an ally within 5 ft
   I can't do this if the ally is incapacitated or unwilling to swap
   Doing this costs me 5 ft of movement, but this doesn't provoke opportunity attacks
   Me or my ally (my choice) can then add the superiority die to AC until my next turn starts

_optionalChoices.name: Brace
_optionalChoices.description:
As a reaction when a creature I can see moves within my melee reach, I can attack it
   I expend a superiority die and make one weapon attack, adding the die to the damage

_optionalChoices.name: Commanding Presence
_optionalChoices.description: When I make a Performance, Intimidation, or Persuasion check, I can add a superiority die

_optionalChoices.name: Grappling Strike
_optionalChoices.description:
Immediately after hitting with a melee attack, I can use a bonus action to try to grapple
   I add the superiority die to the Str (Athletics) check; I can only do this on my own turn

_optionalChoices.name: Quick Toss
_optionalChoices.description:
As a bonus action, I can use a superiority die to do a ranged attack with a thrown weapon
   I can draw a thrown weapon as part of making this attack; I add the die to the damage

_optionalChoices.name: Tactical Assessment
_optionalChoices.description: When I make an Investigation, History, or Insight check, I can add a superiority die to it

_optionalChoices.name: Maneuver Versatility
_optionalChoices.description: Whenever I finish a long rest, I can replace a Maneuver I know with another

_optionalChoices.name: Bait and Switch
_optionalChoices.description:
On my turn, I can expend a superiority die to swap places with an ally within 5 ft
   Doing this costs me 5 ft of movement, but this doesn't provoke opportunity attacks
   The ally then adds the superiority die to its AC until the start of my next turn

_optionalChoices.name: Brace
_optionalChoices.description:
As a reaction when a creature I can see moves within 5 of me, I can attack it
   I expend a superiority die and make one weapon attack, adding the die to the damage

_optionalChoices.name: Restraining Strike
_optionalChoices.description:
Immediately after hitting with a melee weapon attack, I can use a bonus action to grapple
   I add the superiority die to the Str (Athletics) check; I can only do this on my own turn
   The target is also restrained while grappled in this way

_optionalChoices.name: Silver Tongue
_optionalChoices.description: When I make a Cha (Deception) or Cha (Persuasion) check, I can add a superiority die to it

_optionalChoices.name: Snipe
_optionalChoices.description:
As a bonus action, I can expend a superiority die and make a ranged weapon attack
   I can draw a thrown weapon as part of making this attack; I add the die to the damage

_optionalChoices.name: Studious Eye
_optionalChoices.description: When I make a Wis (Insight) or Int (Investigation) check, I can add a superiority die to it

subclassfeature3.2.name: Student of War
subclassfeature3.2.description: I have proficiency with one artisan's tool set of my choice

subclassfeature7.name: Know Your Enemy
subclassfeature7.description: If I spend 1 min studying someone, the DM will tell me info about him/her

subclassfeature10.name: Improved Combat Superiority
subclassfeature10.description: My superiority dice turn into d10s at 10th level and into d12s at 18th level

subclassfeature15.name: Relentless
subclassfeature15.description: I regain one superiority die if I have no more remaining when I roll initiative

subclassfeature3.name: Improved Critical
subclassfeature3.description: I score a critical hit with my weapon attacks on a roll of 19 and 20

atkAdd: My weapon attacks score a critical on a to hit roll of both 19 and 20.

subclassfeature7.name: Remarkable Athlete
subclassfeature7.description:
I add half my Proficiency Bonus to Str/Dex/Con checks if I would otherwise add none
   When making running long jumps, I add my Strength modifier to the distance in feet

subclassfeature10.name: Additional Fighting Style
subclassfeature10.description: Choose an Additional Fighting Style using the "Choose Feature" button above

archery.name: Archery Fighting Style
archery.description: +2 bonus to attack rolls I make with ranged weapons

atkCalc: My ranged weapons get a +2 bonus on the To Hit.

defense.name: Defense Fighting Style
defense.description: +1 bonus to AC when I'm wearing armor

extraAC.name: Defense Fighting Style
extraAC.text: I gain a +1 bonus to AC while wearing armor.

dueling.name: Dueling Fighting Style
dueling.description: +2 to damage rolls when wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons

atkCalc: When I'm wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no weapon in my other hand, I do +2 damage with that melee weapon. This condition will always be false if the bonus action 'Off-hand Attack' exists.

great weapon fighting.name: Great Weapon Fighting Style
great weapon fighting.description: Reroll 1 or 2 on damage if wielding two-handed/versatile melee weapon in both hands

atkAdd: While wielding a two-handed or versatile melee weapon in two hands, I can re-roll a 1 or 2 on any damage die once.

protection.name: Protection Fighting Style
protection.description:
As a reaction, I can give disadv. on an attack made vs. someone within 5 ft of me
   I need to be wielding a shield and be able to see the attacker to do this

two-weapon fighting.name: Two-Weapon Fighting Style
two-weapon fighting.description: I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks

atkCalc: When engaging in two-weapon fighting, I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks. If a melee weapon includes 'off-hand' or 'secondary' in its name or description, it is considered an off-hand attack.

subclassfeature15.name: Superior Critical
subclassfeature15.description: I score a critical hit with my weapon attacks on a roll of 18, 19, and 20

atkAdd: My weapon attacks also score a critical on a to hit roll of 18.

subclassfeature18.name: Survivor
subclassfeature18.description: At the start of my turn, if I'm not above half or at 0 HP, I regain 5 + Con mod HP

action surge.name: Action Surge
action surge.description: I can take one additional action on my turn on top of my normally allowed actions

subclassfeature3.name: Spellcasting
subclassfeature3.description: I can cast known wizard cantrips/spells, using Intelligence as my spellcasting ability

subclassfeature3.1.name: Weapon Bond
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I can bond with up to two weapons by spending a short rest with each
   I can't be disarmed of a bonded weapon and I can summon one as a bonus action

subclassfeature7.name: War Magic
subclassfeature7.description: When I use my action to cast a cantrip, I can make a weapon attack as a bonus action

subclassfeature10.name: Eldritch Strike
subclassfeature10.description:
A creature hit by my weapon attack has disadv. on the save vs. the next spell I cast
   This lasts until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature15.name: Arcane Charge
subclassfeature15.description:
When I use Action Surge, I can also teleport up to 30 ft to an empty space I can see
   I can do so before or after the extra action

subclassfeature18.name: Improved War Magic
subclassfeature18.description: When I use my action to cast a spell, I can make a weapon attack as a bonus action

subclassfeature3.name: Psionic Energy Dice
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain twice my proficiency bonus of psionic energy dice (PsiD) that fuel my psionics
   I regain all expended psionic energy dice after a long rest
   As a bonus action once per short rest, I can regain one expended psionic energy die

subclassfeature3.1.name: Psionic Power: Protective Field
subclassfeature3.1.description:
[1 psionic energy die]As a reaction when I or a creature I can see within 30 ft takes damage, I can reduce it
   I reduce the damage by the roll of the one psionic energy die I expend + my Int mod

subclassfeature3.2.name: Psionic Power: Psionic Strike
subclassfeature3.2.description:
[1 psionic energy die]Once on each of my turns after I hit a target in 30 ft and damage it with a weapon,
   I can expend a psionic energy die to deal it the die roll + my Int mod in force damage

subclassfeature3.3.name: Psionic Power: Telekinetic Movement
subclassfeature3.3.description:
As an action, I can move a Large or smaller loose object or one willing creature in 30 ft
   I must be able to see the target and can move it up to 30 ft to an empty space I can see
   If it is a Tiny object, I can also move it to or from my hand; I can't move myself this way
   I can do this once per short rest, or by expending a psionic energy die (PsiD)

subclassfeature7.1.name: Telekinetic Adept: Psi-Powered Leap
subclassfeature7.1.description:
As a bonus action, I gain a flying speed of twice my walking speed until the turn ends
   I can do this once per short rest, or by expending a psionic energy die (PsiD)

subclassfeature7.2.name: Telekinetic Adept: Telekinetic Thrust
subclassfeature7.2.description:
[DC 8 + Prof B. + Int mod]When I deal damage with my Psionic Strike, I can have the target make a Strength save
   If failed, I knock the target prone or move it up to 10 ft in any direction horizontally

subclassfeature10.name: Guarded Mind
subclassfeature10.description:
I can expend a psionic energy die to end all effects on me causing charmed or frightened
   I can do this if at the start of my turn; I also gain resistance to psychic damage

subclassfeature15.name: Bulwark of Force
subclassfeature15.description:
As a bonus action, I can choose up to my Int mod of creatures (min 1) I can see in 30 ft
   This can include me; Each chosen gains half cover for 1 minute or until I'm incapacitated
   I can do this once per long rest, or by expending a psionic energy die (PsiD)

subclassfeature18.name: Telekinetic Master
subclassfeature18.description:
I can cast Telekinesis, requiring no spell slot or components, with Int spellcasting ability
   As a bonus action while concentrating on this spell, I can make one weapon attack
   I can cast Telekinesis once per long rest, or by expending a psionic energy die (PsiD)

telekinesis.changes: Using Telekinetic Master, I can cast Telekinesis without requiring components or spell slots.

subclassfeature3.name: Hand of Harm
subclassfeature3.description:
1/turn when I hit a crea. with an Unarmed Strike and deal dmg
   1 FP to add extra Necro. dmg equal to one roll of my Martial Arts die + Wis mod.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Hand of Healing
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a Magic action, 1 FP to touch a crea. and restore HP equal to a roll of my Martial Arts die + Wis mod.
   When I use Flurry of Blows, I can replace one of the Unarmed Strikes with a use of this feature without expending FP for the healing.

subclassfeature3.2.name: Implements of Mercy
subclassfeature3.2.description: I gain Proficiency in the Insight and Medicine skills and proficiency with the Herbalism Kit.

subclassfeature6.name: Physician's Touch
subclassfeature6.description:
Hand of Healing also ends 1 condition blinded, deafened, paralyzed, poisoned or stunned
   Hand of Harm also causes the target to be poisoned until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature11.name: Flurry of Healing and Harm
subclassfeature11.description:
I can use Hand of Healing instead of each Flurry of Blows unarmed strike without ki cost
   I can use Hand of Harm on one Flurry of Blows unarmed strike without ki cost
   I can use this benefit a number of times equal to my Wis Mod, and can't do so again until a Long Rest.

hand of ultimate mercy.name: Hand of Ultimate Mercy
hand of ultimate mercy.description:
As an action, I can spend 5 FP and touch a creature that died in the last 24 hours
   The creature returns to life and regains 4d10 + my Wisdom modifier in hit points
   It is also cured of all these conditions: blinded, deafened, paralyzed, poisoned, and stunned

subclassfeature3.name: Shadow Arts

darkness.name: Darkness
darkness.description: Darkness : I can expend 1 Focus Point to cast the Darkness spell without expending components. I can see within the spell's area when I cast it with this feature. While the spell persists, I can move its area of Darkness to a space within 60 feet of myself at the start of each of my turns.

darkness.changes: Spells cast with my Shadow Arts don't require spell components.

subclassfeature3.description: I know the Minor Illusion cantrip and can cast certain spells by using FP (see page 3)

subclassfeature6.name: Shadow Step
subclassfeature6.description: I can use a Bonus Action to teleport up to 60 feet while in Dim Light or Darkness. I gain Advantage on my next melee attack before the turn ends.

subclassfeature11.name: Improved Shadow Step
subclassfeature11.description: 1 Focus Point, I can use Shadow Step to teleport without needing to start and end in Dim Light or Darkness. I can also make an Unarmed Strike immediately after teleporting.

subclassfeature17.name: Cloak of Shadows
subclassfeature17.description:
As a Magic action in Dim Light or Darkness, 3 FP to shroud myself in shadows for 1 min.
   I lose this if I end my turn in Bright Light or am Incapacitated. While shrouded, I gain:
   The Invisible Condition
   I can move through occupied spaces as Difficult Terrain
   and will be shunted to the last unoccupied space if I end my turn in an occupied space
   I can use Flurry of Blows without spending Focus Points.

subclassfeature3.name: Elemental Attunement
subclassfeature3.description:
At the start of my turn, 1 FP for 10 mins of elemental energy. While active:
   My Unarmed Strikes have 10ft extra reach, and deal my choice: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning,
   or Thunder damage, and on hit Str save or I can move the target up to 10ft

subclassfeature6.name: Elemental Burst
subclassfeature6.description:
As a Magic action, 2 FP for a 20ft radius burst of Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage within 120ft
   Affected Creatures make a Dex save, or 3x Martial dice roll damage, half on success.

subclassfeature11.name: Stride of the Elements
subclassfeature11.description: While my Elemental Attunement is active, I gain Fly and Swim Speed equal to my Speed.

subclassfeature17.name: Elemental Epitome
subclassfeature17.description:
When Elemental Attunement is active:
   I gain Resistance to Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder, and can change on my turn.
   Step of the Wind adds 20ft Speed, for the duration I can deal damage (Acid, Cold,
   Fire, Lightning or Thunder), to each creature within 5ft once per turn.
   Once per turn, extra damage with Unarmed Strikes of the same damage type.

subclassfeature3.name: Open Hand Technique
subclassfeature3.description:
When I hit a crea. with a Flurry of Blows attack, I can impose one of these effects:
   Crea. can't make Opportunity Attacks until its next turn.
   Crea. makes a Str save or is pushed 15ft
   Crea. makes a Dex save or is knocked Prone.

subclassfeature6.name: Wholeness of Body
subclassfeature6.description: As a Bonus Action, I can heal myself for 1 Martial die roll + my Wis mod.

subclassfeature11.name: Fleet Step
subclassfeature11.description: When I use a Bonus Action other than Step of the Wind, I can also use Step of the Wind immediately after.

quivering palm.name: Quivering Palm
quivering palm.description:
[4 focus points]When I hit a creature with an unarmed strike, I can start imperceptible vibrations
   Within my monk level in days, I can use an action to have the creature make a Con save
   If it fails, it takes 10d12 necrotic damage, half on success.

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Sacred Weapon
subclassfeature3.description: As part of the attack action, I can imbue 1 held melee weapon for 10 minutes or until I use this feature again. While active, I add my Cha modifier to attacks and choose Radiant or normal damage on each hit. It also emits 20-ft radius bright light and 20-ft more dim light.

atkCalc: If I include the words 'Sacred Weapon' in the name of a weapon, it gets my Charisma modifier added to its To Hit.

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of Devotion
subclassfeature7.description: While I'm conscious, allies within range and I can't be charmed

subclassfeature15.name: Smite of Protection
subclassfeature15.description: When I cast Divine Smite my allies & I have Half Cover while in my aura of protection until the start of my next turn.

subclassfeature20.name: Holy Nimbus
subclassfeature20.description:
As a Bonus Action, I can give my Aura of Protection the benefits below for 10 minutes:
   Holy Ward: I have Advantage on saving throws I'm forced to make by a Fiend or Undead.
   Radiant Damage: An enemy that starts its turn in range takes my Cha mod + Prof Bonus Radiant damage.
   Sunlight: The aura is filled with Bright Light that is sunlight.
   I can end it for free; I can spend a level 5 spell slot or Long Rest to restore it.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells
spellcastingExtra: protection from evil and good legacy

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

legacySpells: protection from evil and good legacy

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Inspiring Smite
subclassfeature3.description:
Immediately after dealing damage with Divine Smite, I can grant temporary HP
   I distribute the temporary HP how I choose across creatures within 30 ft, including me

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Peerless Athlete
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can get adv. on Str (Athletics) & Dex (Acrobatics) checks for 1 hour
   In that time, I also add +10 ft to long and high jumps

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of Alacrity
subclassfeature7.description: If I'm not incapacitated, allies starting their turn in range gain bonus speed for that turn

subclassfeature15.name: Glorious Defense
subclassfeature15.description:
As a reaction when I or another in 10 ft is hit with an attack roll, I can grant bonus AC
   I must be able to see the attacker; I add my Cha mod (min 1) to the AC for that attack
   If it misses, I can do a weapon attack vs. the attacker, if in reach, as part of this reaction

subclassfeature20.name: Living Legend
subclassfeature20.description:
As a bonus action, I can empower myself with legends, gaining the following for 10 mins:
    • My otherworldly presence grants me advantage on Charisma checks
    • Once on each of my turns when I miss with a weapon attack, I can have it hit instead
    • As a reaction when I fail a saving throw, I can reroll it, but must use the new roll
   I can do this once per long rest, or by expending a 5th-level or higher spell slot (SS 5+)

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Nature's Wrath
subclassfeature3.description:
As a magic action, a creature I can see within 15 ft must make a Str save
   If it fails this save, it is restrained until it succeeds on a save at the end of its turn

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of Warding
subclassfeature7.description: My allies & I have Resistance to Necrotic, Psychic, & Radiant damage while in range.

subclassfeature15.name: Undying Sentinel
subclassfeature15.description:
If dropped to 0 hit points and not killed outright, I can choose to stay at 1 hit point
   Additionally, I suffer no drawbacks of old age and can't be aged magically

subclassfeature20.name: Elder Champion
subclassfeature20.description:
As a Bonus Action, I can give my Aura of Protection the benefits below for 10 minutes:
    • At the start of each of my turns, I regain 10 hit points
    • I can cast paladin spells with a casting time of 1 action as a bonus action instead
    • Enemies within range have disadv. on saves vs. my paladin spells and channel divinity

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Vow of Enmity
subclassfeature3.description:
When I Attack I can make a Vow of Enmity against a creature I choose that I can see within 30 ft
   I have Adv on attack rolls against it for 1 min or until I use this feature again.
   If it drops to 0 HP before the Vow ends I can transfer the Vow to a different creature within 30 feet.

subclassfeature7.name: Relentless Avenger
subclassfeature7.description:
When I hit with an Opp Attack, I reduce the target's Speed to 0 until the end of the current turn.
   I can move up to half my Speed as part of the same Reaction without provoking Opp Attacks.

subclassfeature15.name: Soul of Vengeance
subclassfeature15.description:
When an enemy I have an active Vow of Enmity against makes an attack, I can react
   As a reaction, I can make a melee weapon attack against it if it is within range

subclassfeature20.name: Avenging Angel
subclassfeature20.description:
As a Bonus Action, I can gain the benefits below for 10 min or until I end them.
   Flight: I sprout spectral wings on my back, I have a Fly speed of 60 ft and can hover.
   Frightful Aura: When an enemy starts its turn in my Aura it must pass a Wis saving throw.
   On a failed save it is Frightened for 1 min or until it takes damage. Attacks against it have Adv.
   I can also restore this feature by spending a level 5 spell slot.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Ranger's Companion
subclassfeature3.description:
It adds my proficiency bonus to AC, attacks, damage, and save/skill proficiencies
   Its hit point maximum equals four times my ranger level if higher than its normal HP
   It takes a turn on my initiative; It takes the Dodge action unless I command it otherwise
   As an action, I can have it take the Attack, Dash, Disengage, or Help action on its turn
   I can still use Extra Attack while commanding it to Attack; No action to order to move
subclassfeature3.additional: Medium or smaller beast, CR ¼ or less

creaturesAdd.body: function(e,a){e&&(e=(e=MakeCompMenu_CompOptions(a,"justCompanions")).companion&&e.companion.length?(e=e.companion.map(function(e){return e[0]}),AskUserOptions("Select Ranger's Companion",'Select which beast you would like to have as your ranger\'s companion.\nThis can be any beast that is no larger than Medium and that has a challenge rating of 1/4 or lower.\nYou can change the beast at any time using the "Companion Options" button at the top of the Companion page.',e,"radio",!0)):"Wolf",ApplyCompRace(e,a,"companion"))}

_optionalChoices.name: Beast of the Air/Earth
_optionalChoices.description:
My ranger's companion can be a primal beast whose lineage stretches back to the beginning
   This beast of the air or earth takes the form of a regular animal, but has different abilities
   Its hit points total is equal to its Con mod + my Wis mod + 5 times my ranger level
   As a bonus action, I can command it to make one attack or take the Hide action
   If it dies, I can revive it within 1 hour as an action where I expend a spell slot and touch it
   It then returns to life with all its hit points after 1 minute

creatureOptions.name: Beast of the Air
creatureOptions.languages: understands the languages of its master (me)

features.name: Ready Companion
features.description: As a bonus action, I can command the beast to make its shred attack or to Hide.

features.name: Primal Rebirth
features.description: If the beast has died within the last hour, I can use my action to touch it and expend a spell slot of 1st level or higher. The beast returns to life after 1 minute with all its hit points restored.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

hp.body: function(e,a,t){var n,i,o;(classes.known.ranger||classes.known["spell-less ranger"])&&(n=Number(What("Wis Mod")),i=(classes.known.ranger||classes.known["spell-less ranger"]).level,a.alt.push(a.conMod+n+(o=5*i)),a.altStr.push(" = "+a.conMod+" from its Constitution modifier\n + "+n+" from its master's Wisdom modifier\n + 5 × "+i+" from five times its master's ranger level ("+o+")"))}

creatureOptions.name: Beast of the Earth
creatureOptions.languages: understands the languages of its master (me)

attacks.name: Maul
attacks.description: If used after moving 20 ft straight in the same round, see Charge trait

features.name: Movement Mode
features.description: When I bond with the beast, I choose wether it has a climb speed or a swim speed.

features.name: Ready Companion
features.description: As a bonus action, I can command the beast to make its shred attack or to Hide.

features.name: Primal Rebirth
features.description: If the beast has died within the last hour, I can use my action to touch it and expend a spell slot of 1st level or higher. The beast returns to life after 1 minute with all its hit points restored.

traits.name: Charge
traits.description: If the beast moves at least 20 ft straight toward a target and then hits it with a maul attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 1d6 slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw against my spell save DC or be knocked prone.

hp.body: function(e,a,t){var n,i,o;(classes.known.ranger||classes.known["spell-less ranger"])&&(n=Number(What("Wis Mod")),i=(classes.known.ranger||classes.known["spell-less ranger"]).level,a.alt.push(a.conMod+n+(o=5*i)),a.altStr.push(" = "+a.conMod+" from its Constitution modifier\n + "+n+" from its master's Wisdom modifier\n + 5 × "+i+" from five times its master's ranger level ("+o+")"))}

subclassfeature7.name: Exceptional Training
subclassfeature7.description:
My beast's attacks count as magical for overcoming resistances and immunities
   As a bonus action, I can command it to take the Dash/Disengage/Help action on its turn

subclassfeature11.name: Bestial Fury
subclassfeature11.description: When I command my beast to use the Attack action, it can attack twice on its turn

subclassfeature15.name: Share Spells
subclassfeature15.description: When I cast a spell on myself, I can have it also affect my beast if it is within 30 ft

subclassfeature3.name: Dreadful Strikes
subclassfeature3.description: My weapons deal extra psychic damage, but only once per turn per creature

atkAdd.body: function(e,a){a.isWeapon&&(classes.known.ranger||classes.known.rangerua)&&(a=(classes.known.ranger||classes.known.rangerua).level,e.Description+=(e.Description?"; ":"")+"Once per turn per target +1d"+(a<11?4:6)+" psychic damage")}

atkAdd: When I hit a creature with a weapon, I can deal an extra 1d4 psychic damage to the target, which can take this extra damage only once per turn. From 11th-level, this damage increases to 1d6.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Fey Wanderer Magic
subclassfeature3.1.description: I get bonus spells known, which do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.2.name: Otherworldly Glamour
subclassfeature3.2.description:
I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1)
   I gain proficiency in Deception, Performance, or Persuasion; Use "Choose Feature" button

addMod.text: I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1).
I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1).
I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1).
I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1).

deception proficiency.name: Otherworldly Glamour
deception proficiency.description:
[Deception proficiency]
   I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1)

performance proficiency.name: Otherworldly Glamour
performance proficiency.description:
[Performance proficiency]
   I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1)

persuasion proficiency.name: Otherworldly Glamour
persuasion proficiency.description:
[Persuasion proficiency]
   I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma check I make (minimum of +1)

subclassfeature7.name: Beguiling Twist
subclassfeature7.description:
I have advantage on saves against being charmed or frightened; Below uses my save DC
   As a reaction when a creature I see in 120 ft succeeds its save vs. charmed or frightened,
   I can have another I see in 120 ft make a Wis save or be charmed/frightened (I choose)
   This lasts for 1 minute and the target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns

subclassfeature11.name: Fey Reinforcements
subclassfeature11.description:
I learn Summon Fey; It needs no material component, nor counts against spells known
   Once per long rest, I can cast it without expending a spell slot
   When I cast it, I can have it not require concentration, but than its duration is 1 minute

summon fey.changes: Using my Fey Reinforcements class feature, I can cast Summon Fey without requiring material components and I can cast it once per long rest without requiring a spell slot. Whenever I start casting the spell, I can modify it so that it doesn't require concentration. If I do so, the spell's duration becomes 1 minute for that casting.

subclassfeature15.name: Misty Wanderer
subclassfeature15.description: I can cast Misty Step without a spell slot and can bring a willing creature in 5 ft along

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){return"misty step"===e&&(a.firstCol="Sp",a.description="I and one willing creature I can see within 5 ft of me teleport 30 ft to a unoccupied space I can see",!0)}

spellAdd:
Whenever I cast misty step, I can bring along one willing creature I can see within 5 ft of me. That creature teleports to an unoccupied space of my choice within 5 ft of my destination space.
I can cast Misty Step without expending a spell slot a number of times per long rest equal to my Wisdom modifier (minimum of once).

subclassfeature3.name: Dread Ambusher
subclassfeature3.description:
I can add my Wisdom modifier to my initiative rolls
   In the first turn of combat I get +10 ft speed and an extra attack with the Attack action
   If I take the Attack action and that extra attack hits, it does +1d8 damage

addMod.text: I can add my Wisdom modifier to my initiative rolls.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Gloom Stalker Magic
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I add a spell to my known spells at level 3, 5, 9, 13, and 17
   These count as ranger spells, but do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.2.name: Umbral Sight
subclassfeature3.2.description:
I gain 60 ft darkvision, or add 30 ft to darkvision if I already had it because of my race
   When I'm in darkness, others gain no benefit from darkvision to detect me

subclassfeature7.name: Iron Mind
subclassfeature7.description: I gain proficiency with Wis saves, or if I'm already proficient, either Int or Cha saves

subclassfeature11.name: Stalker's Flurry
subclassfeature11.description: Once on each of my turns when I miss a weapon attack, I can make an extra attack

subclassfeature15.name: Shadowy Dodge
subclassfeature15.description: As a reaction when I'm attacked without adv., I can impose disadv. on the attack roll

subclassfeature3.name: Hunter's Prey
subclassfeature3.description: Choose Colossus Slayer, Giant Killer, or Horde Breaker with the "Choose Feature" button

colossus slayer.name: Hunter's Prey: Colossus Slayer
colossus slayer.description: Once per turn, when hitting someone that is below max HP, I do an extra 1d8 damage

giant killer.name: Hunter's Prey: Giant Killer
giant killer.description: As a reaction, when a Large or larger enemy in 5 ft attacks me, I can attack it once

horde breaker.name: Hunter's Prey: Horde Breaker
horde breaker.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature, I can make an attack vs. another within 5 ft of it

subclassfeature7.name: Defensive Tactics
subclassfeature7.description: "Choose Feature" button to choose Escape the Horde, Multiattack Defense, or Steel Will

escape the horde.name: Defensive Tactic: Escape the Horde
escape the horde.description: Creatures attacking me with opportunity attacks have disadvantage on the attack rolls

multiattack defense.name: Defensive Tactic: Multiattack Defense
multiattack defense.description: When a creature hits me, I gain +4 AC against that creature for the rest of the turn

steel will.name: Defensive Tactic: Steel Will
steel will.description: I have advantage on saves against being frightened

subclassfeature11.name: Multiattack
subclassfeature11.description: Choose Volley or Whirlwind Attack using the "Choose Feature" button above

volley.name: Multiattack: Volley
volley.description: As an action, I can make ranged attacks vs. all within a 10-ft radius of a point in range

whirlwind attack.name: Multiattack: Whirlwind Attack
whirlwind attack.description: As an action, I can make melee attacks vs. all creatures within 5 ft of me

subclassfeature15.name: Superior Hunter's Defense
subclassfeature15.description: "Choose Feature" button to choose Evasion, Stand Against the Tide, or Uncanny Dodge

evasion.name: Evasion
evasion.description: If I make a Dex save to halve damage, I instead take none if I succeed and half if I fail.

text: **Dex save for half dmg**. *Failure:* half dmg, *Success:* no dmg

stand against the tide.name: Stand Against the Tide
stand against the tide.description:
When a creature misses me with a melee attack, I can use my reaction on the attack
   I force the attacker to repeat it vs. another (not attacker) of my choice within range

uncanny dodge.name: Uncanny Dodge
uncanny dodge.description: As a reaction, I halve the damage of an attack from an attacker that I can see

subclassfeature3.name: Spellcasting
subclassfeature3.description: I can cast known wizard cantrips/spells, using Intelligence as my spellcasting ability

subclassfeature3.1.name: Mage Hand Legerdemain
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can direct my Mage Hand
   With a Dex (Sleight of Hand) vs. Wis (Perception) checks, I can do so discreetly
   I can make it invisible and perform the following tasks:
    • Stow/retrieve an object the hand is holding in a container worn/carried by another
    • Use thieves' tools to pick locks and disarm traps at range

mage hand.description: Invisible hand, carries 10 lb; 1 bns to control, use thieves' tools, or stow/retrieve obj; only 1 instance
mage hand.changes: My Mage Hand Legerdemain class feature expands my use of the Mage Hand cantrip and makes the spectral hand invisible.

subclassfeature9.name: Magical Ambush
subclassfeature9.description: When I cast a spell while hidden, the target(s) have disadvantage against that spell

subclassfeature13.name: Versatile Trickster
subclassfeature13.description: As a bonus action, gain adv. on attacks this turn on creature within 5 ft of Mage Hand

subclassfeature17.name: Spell Thief
subclassfeature17.description:
As a reaction, after a spell is cast at me, I can try to negate and steal it
   The caster makes a save against my spell DC with his/her spellcasting ability
   On failure, the caster forgets how to cast that spell for eight hours
   If I have a spell slot of a high enough level for it, I learn how to cast it during this time

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature3.description: I am proficient with disguise kits and poisoner's kits

subclassfeature3.1.name: Assassinate
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I have adv. on attack rolls against creatures that have not taken a turn in combat yet
   Any hit I score against a creature that is surprised is a critical hit

subclassfeature9.name: Infiltration Expertise
subclassfeature9.description: I can create false identities in 7 days for 25 gp

subclassfeature13.name: Imposter
subclassfeature13.description:
After 3 hours of studying a person, I can mimic speech, writing, and behavior
   I have advantage on Charisma (Deception) checks to maintain this ruse

subclassfeature17.name: Death Strike
subclassfeature17.description: When I hit a surprised creature, it must make a Con save or take double damage
subclassfeature17.additional: Save DC: 8 + Dex mod + Proficiency bonus

subclassfeature3.name: Psionic Energy Dice
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain twice my proficiency bonus of psionic energy dice (PsiD) that fuel my psionics
   I regain all expended psionic energy dice after a long rest; See psionic powers on page 3
   As a bonus action once per short rest, I can regain one expended psionic energy die

psi-bolstered knack.name: Psionic Power: Psi-Bolstered Knack
psi-bolstered knack.description:
[1 PsiD if successful]If I fail an check using a skill or tool I'm proficient with, I can add a psionic energy die to it
   The psionic energy die is only expended if this addition turns the failure into a success

psychic whispers.name: Psionic Power: Psychic Whispers
psychic whispers.description:
As an action, I can select my Prof Bonus of creatures I can see and roll a psionic energy die
   For the roll of hours, I can telepathically communicate with each and they with me
   To send or receive messages (no action), we must be within 1 mile of each other
   A creature must be able to speak a language to do this; It can end the link at any time
   The first time I do this after a long rest, I don't expend the psionic energy die (PsiD)

subclassfeature3.1.name: Psychic Blades
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As part of an Attack action, I can manifest a psychic blade from a free hand to attack
   It vanishes immediately after making the attack and leaves no mark on its target
   As a bonus action after this attack, I can manifest and attack with another psychic blade
   To do this, my other hand needs to be free as well and this blade does only 1d4 damage

weaponOptions.name: Psychic Blade
weaponOptions.description: Finesse, thrown; Bonus action: 1d4 instead of 1d6

subclassfeature9.name: Soul Blades
subclassfeature9.description: My psi-suffused soul grants me more psionic powers, see the 3rd page's "Notes" section

homing strikes.name: Homing Strikes
homing strikes.description:
[1 PsiD if successful]If I miss an attack with my psychic blades, I can add a psionic energy die to the attack roll
   The psionic energy die is only expended if this addition turns the miss into a hit

psychic teleportation.name: Psychic Teleportation
psychic teleportation.description:
[1 PsiD]As a bonus action, I can teleport up to 10 ft away times the roll of my psionic energy die
   I manifest a psychic blade and throw it to an empty space I can see before teleporting to it

subclassfeature13.name: Psychic Veil
subclassfeature13.description:
As an action, I can become invisible along with what I'm wearing or carrying for 1 hour
   I can end it (no action); It also ends if I damage a creature or force one to make a save
   I can do this once per long rest, or by expending a psionic energy die (PsiD)

subclassfeature17.name: Rend Mind
subclassfeature17.description:
When I use my psychic blade to deal sneak attack damage to a target, I can have it save
   It must make a Wisdom save (DC 8 + Prof Bonus + Dex mod) or be stunned for 1 min
   It can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns to end being stunned
   I can do this once per long rest, or by expending three psionic energy dice (3 PsiD)

subclassfeature3.name: Fast Hands
subclassfeature3.description:
As a bonus action, I can do one of the following:
    • Make a Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check
    • Use my thieves' tools to disarm a trap or open a lock
    • Take the Use an Object action

subclassfeature3.1.name: Second-Story Work
subclassfeature3.1.description: I climb at my normal speed; I add my Dex modifier to the distance of a running jump

subclassfeature9.name: Supreme Sneak
subclassfeature9.description: I have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks when moving no more than half speed

subclassfeature13.name: Use Magic Device
subclassfeature13.description: I can use magic items even if I don't meet the class, race, and/or level requirements

subclassfeature17.name: Thief's Reflexes
subclassfeature17.description:
Unless surprised, I can take two turns on the first round of any combat
   The first turn is at my regular initiative, and the second is at my initiative - 10

subclassfeature3.name: Telepathic Speech
subclassfeature3.description: As a Bonus Action, one creature I can see within 30 ft of myself & I can speak telepathically with each other while within my Cha mod miles (min 1) for my Sorcerer level minutes as long as we share a language. It lasts until I use it with another creature.

subclassfeature6.name: Psionic Sorcery
subclassfeature6.description: When I cast a psionic spell of level 1+ I can cast it using a spell slot, or with SP equal to the spell's level. If I cast the spell with SPs It requires no components, unless they are consumed or have a specified cost.

subclassfeature6.1.name: Psychic Defense
subclassfeature6.1.description: I have Resistance to Psychic damage & Adv on saves to avoid/end Charmed or Frightened.

subclassfeature14.name: Revelation in Flesh
subclassfeature14.description: As a Bonus Action, I can spend 1+ SP to magically alter my body for 10 min, gaining one revelation for each SP spent (See Third Page).

aquatic adaptation.name: Aquatic Adaptation
aquatic adaptation.description: I gain a Swim Speed of 2x my Speed & I can breathe underwater.

glistening flight.name: Glistening Flight
glistening flight.description: I gain a Fly Speed of my Speed & can hover.

see the invisible.name: See the Invisible
see the invisible.description: I can see any Invisible creature within 60 ft not behind Total Cover.

wormlike movement.name: Wormlike Movement
wormlike movement.description: I, with equipment, can move through a 1+ inch space or spend 5 ft of movement to escape a Grapple or nonmagical restraints.

subclassfeature18.name: Warping Implosion
subclassfeature18.description: As a Magic action, I teleport to a visible unoccupied space w/in 120 feet. Each creature w/in 30 feet of the space I left must make a Strength save or take 3d10 Force damage & be pulled toward the space I left, ending in the nearest unoccupied space. On a success, it takes half damage. I can restore this with a Long Rest or by spending 5 SP (no action).

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Restore Balance
subclassfeature3.description: As a reaction, when a creature I can see w/in 60 ft is about to roll a d20 with Adv or Disadv, I can make it a straight roll.

subclassfeature6.name: Bastion of Law
subclassfeature6.description: As a Magic action, I can spend 1 to 5 SP to create a magic ward around me or a creature I can see within 30 ft The ward has SP-spent d8s that can reduce the damage taken by the total rolled on those dice. The ward lasts until I finish a Long Rest or use it again.

subclassfeature14.name: Trance of Order
subclassfeature14.description: As a bonus action, I can enter a state of clockwork consciousness for 1 min during which attack rolls against me can't have Adv and when I make a D20 Test I can treat a roll below 9 as a 10. I can restore this with a Long Rest or by spending 5 SP (no action).

subclassfeature18.name: Clockwork Cavalcade
subclassfeature18.description:
As an action, I can call spirits to bring balance in a 30-ft cube originating from me; The intangible spirits do all the following inside the cube before vanishing:
   Heal: Restore up to 100 HP, divided among the creatures as I choose.
   Repair: Repair all damaged objects entirely instantly.
   Dispel: End every spell of level 6 or lower on objects or creatures of my choice.
   I can restore this with a Long Rest or by spending 7 SP (no action).

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells
spellcastingExtra: protection from evil and good legacy

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

legacySpells: protection from evil and good legacy

subclassfeature3.name: Draconic Resilience
subclassfeature3.description:
My hit point maximum increases by an amount equal to my sorcerer level.
   While not wearing armor my base AC is 10 + Dex mod + Cha mod.

subclassfeature6.name: Elemental Affinity
subclassfeature6.description: Use 'Choose Feature' above to choose an elemental affinity. I have Resistance to that damage type; When I do spell damage of that type I can add my Cha mod to 1 damage roll.

acid affinity.name: Acid Affinity
acid affinity.description: I am resistant to Acid damage & spells I cast that deal Acid damage can add my Cha mod to one damage roll.

cold affinity.name: Cold Affinity
cold affinity.description: I am resistant to Cold damage & spells I cast that deal Cold damage can add my Cha mod to one damage roll.

fire affinity.name: Fire Affinity
fire affinity.description: I am resistant to Fire damage & spells I cast that deal Fire damage can add my Cha mod to one damage roll.

lightning affinity.name: Lightning Affinity
lightning affinity.description: I am resistant to Lightning damage & spells I cast that deal Lightning damage can add my Cha mod to one damage roll.

poison affinity.name: Poison Affinity
poison affinity.description: I am resistant to Poison damage & spells I cast that deal Poison damage can add my Cha mod to one damage roll.

subclassfeature14.name: Dragon Wings
subclassfeature14.description: As a Bonus Action, I can gain draconic wings and a Fly speed of 60ft for 1 hour or until dismissed (no action). I can restore it with a Long Rest or with 3 SP (no action).

subclassfeature18.name: Dragon Companion
subclassfeature18.description: I can cast Summon Dragon w/out a Material component & once per Long Rest without a spell slot. I can also cast it without requiring Concentration, for 1 min.

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature1.name: Wild Magic Surge
subclassfeature1.description:
Wild Magic Surges can happen 5% of the time that I cast a sorcerer spell
   This doesn't happen with cantrips and I only take this chance if the DM tells me to
   Metamagic can't affect spells cast because of the surge, but they require no concentration
   See the "Notes" page for the table

toNotesPage.name: Wild Magic Surge Table
toNotesPage.popupName: Wild Mage's Wild Magic Surge Table, part 1
note: My spellcasting can unleash surges of untamed magic. Immediately after I cast a sorcerer spell of 1st level or higher, the DM can have me roll a d20. If I roll a 1, a Wild Magic Surge happens. Roll on the table below to create a random magical effect. A surge can happen only once per turn.

If a Wild Magic effect is a spell, it's too wild to be affected by Metamagic. If it normally requires concentration, it doesn't require concentration in this case; the spell lasts for its full duration.
d100  Effect
01-02 Roll on this table at the start of each of your turns for the next minute, ignoring this result on subsequent rolls.
03-04 For the next minute, you can see any invisible creature if you have line of sight to it.
05-06 A modron chosen and controlled by the DM appears in an unoccupied space within 5 ft of you, then disappears 1 minute later.
07-08 You cast fireball as a 3rd-level spell centered on yourself.
09-10 You cast magic missile as a 5th-level spell.
11-12 Roll a d10. Your height changes by a number of inches equal to the roll. If the roll is odd, you shrink. If the roll is even, you grow.
13-14 You cast confusion centered on yourself.
15-16 For the next minute, you regain 5 hit points at the start of each of your turns.
17-18 You grow a long beard made of feathers that remains until you sneeze, at which point the feathers explode out from your face.
19-20 You cast grease centered on yourself.
21-22 Creatures have disadvantage on saving throws against the next spell you cast in the next minute that involves a saving throw.
23-24 Your skin turns a vibrant shade of blue. A remove curse spell can end this effect.
25-26 An eye appears on your forehead for the next minute.
27-28 For the next minute, all your spells with a casting time feet of 1 action have a casting time of 1 bonus action.
29-30 You teleport up to 60 ft to an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see.

31-32 You are transported to the Astral Plane until the end of your next turn, after which time you return to the space you previously occupied or the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.
33-34 Maximize the damage of the next damaging spell you cast within the next minute.
35-36 Roll a d10. Your age changes by a number of years equal to the roll. If the roll is odd, you get younger (minimum 1 year old). If the roll is even, you get older.
37-38 1d6 flumphs controlled by the DM appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 ft of you and are frightened of you. They vanish after 1 minute.
39-40 You regain 2d10 hit points.

41-42 You turn into a potted plant until the start of your next turn. While a plant, you are incapacitated and have vulnerability to all damage. If you drop to 0 hit points, your pot breaks, and your form reverts.
43-44 For the next minute, you can teleport up to 20 ft as a bonus action on each of your turns.
45-46 You cast levitate on yourself.
47-48 A unicorn controlled by the DM appears in a space within 5 ft of you, then disappears 1 minute later.
49-50 You can't speak for the next minute. Whenever you try, pink bubbles float out of your mouth.

toNotesPage.name: Wild Magic Surge Table
toNotesPage.popupName: Wild Mage's Wild Magic Surge Table, part 2
note: d100  Effect
51-52 A spectral shield hovers near you for the next minute, granting you a +2 bonus to AC and immunity to magic missile.
53-54 You are immune to being intoxicated by alcohol for the next 5d6 days.
55-56 Your hair falls out but grows back within 24 hours.
57-58 For the next minute, any flammable object you touch that isn't being worn or carried by another creature bursts into flame.
59-60 You regain your lowest-level expended spell slot.
61-62 For the next minute, you must shout when you speak.
63-64 You cast fog cloud centered on yourself.
65-66 Up to three creatures you choose within 30 ft of you take 4d10 lightning damage.
67-68 You are frightened by the nearest creature until the end of your next turn.
69-70 Each creature within 30 ft of you becomes invisible for the next minute. The invisibility ends on a creature when it attacks or casts a spell.
71-72 You gain resistance to all damage for the next minute.
73-74 A random creature within 60 ft of you becomes poisoned for 1d4 hours.
75-76 You glow with bright light in a 30-ft radius for the next minute. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 ft of you is blinded until the end of its next turn.
79-80 Illusory butterflies and flower petals flutter in the air within 10 ft of you for the next minute.
77-78 You cast polymorph on yourself. If you fail the saving throw, you turn into a sheep for the spell's duration.
81-82 You can take one additional action immediately.
83-84 Each creature within 30 ft of you takes 1d10 necrotic damage. You regain hit points equal to the sum of the necrotic damage dealt.
85-86 You cast mirror image.
87-88 You cast fly on a random creature within 60 ft of you.
89-90 You become invisible for the next minute. During that time, other creatures can't hear you. The invisibility ends if you attack or cast a spell.
91-92 If you die within the next minute, you immediately come back to life as if by the reincarnate spell.
93-94 Your size increases by one size category for the next minute.
95-96 You and all creatures within 30 ft of you gain vulnerability to piercing damage for the next minute.
97-98 You are surrounded by faint, ethereal music for the next minute.
99-100 You regain all expended sorcery points.

subclassfeature1.1.name: Tides of Chaos
subclassfeature1.1.description:
I can gain advantage on either one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw
   After I cast a 1st-level or higher sorcerer spell, the DM can impose a Wild Magic Surge
   After I roll on the Wild Magic Surge table, I regain my use of Tides of Chaos

subclassfeature6.name: Bend Luck
subclassfeature6.description: As a reaction, I can add/subtract 1d4 from another's attack roll, ability check, or save

subclassfeature14.name: Controlled Chaos
subclassfeature14.description: Whenever I roll on the Wild Magic Surge table, I can roll twice and use either result

subclassfeature18.name: Spell Bombardment
subclassfeature18.description:
Once per turn, when I roll spell damage, I can take one damage die that rolled max
   I can then roll this die again and add it to the spell's damage

subclassfeature1.name: Fey Presence
subclassfeature1.description:
As an action, all creatures in a 10-ft cube around me must make a Wisdom save
   If failed, they're all charmed or frightened (my choice) until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature6.name: Misty Escape
subclassfeature6.description:
As a reaction, when I take damage, I can turn invisible and teleport up to 60 ft
   I stay invisible until the start of my next turn or until I attack or cast a spell

subclassfeature10.name: Beguiling Defenses
subclassfeature10.description:
As a reaction, when a creature tries to charm me, I can turn the charm back on it
   It must make a Wis save or be charmed by me for 1 minute or until taking damage
   I am immune to being charmed

subclassfeature14.name: Dark Delirium
subclassfeature14.description:
As an action, a creature within 60 ft must make a Wis save or be charmed/frightened
   This lasts for 1 minute or until my concentration is broken or it takes damage
   During this time, it can't see or hear anything but the illusion, me, and itself

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Cantrips
subclassfeature1.description: I learn the Light and Sacred Flame cantrips, not counting for the number I can know

subclassfeature1.1.name: Healing Light
subclassfeature1.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can heal a creature I can see within 60 ft by expending dice
   I can expend up to my Charisma modifier (min 1) of dice from my pool at a time
   The target heals HP equal to the roll of the dice; I regain all expended dice on a long rest

subclassfeature6.name: Radiant Soul
subclassfeature6.description:
I add my Cha modifier once to the fire or radiant damage of cantrips and spells I cast
   This bonus only applies to one target; Also, I have resistance to radiant damage

atkCalc.body: function(e,a,t){a.isSpell&&/fire|radiant/i.test(e.Damage_Type)&&(t.extraDmg+=What("Cha Mod"))}

atkCalc: Cantrips and spells that fire or radiant damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage to one target.

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){if(!a.psionic)return genericSpellDmgEdit(e,a,"fire|radiant","Cha",!0)}

spellAdd: Cantrips and spells that fire or radiant damage get my Charisma modifier added to their damage to one target.

subclassfeature10.name: Celestial Resilience
subclassfeature10.description:
When I finish a short or long rest, I and up to five allies gain temporary hit points
   I get my warlock level + Cha mod, while my allies get half my warlock level + Cha mod

subclassfeature14.name: Searing Vengeance
subclassfeature14.description:
At the start of my turn when I would make a death save, I can instead spring back up
   I recover HP equal to half my current HP maximum, and can then stand up if I choose
   When I do, creatures of my choice within 30 ft take 2d8 + Cha mod in radiant damage
   Damaged creatures are blinded until the end of my current turn

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature1.name: Dark One's Blessing
subclassfeature1.description: When I reduce a hostile to 0 HP, I gain Cha mod + warlock level temporary HP (min 1)

subclassfeature6.name: Dark One's Own Luck
subclassfeature6.description: When I make an ability check or saving throw, I can add 1d10 after rolling the d20

subclassfeature10.name: Fiendish Resilience
subclassfeature10.description:
After a short or long rest, I can choose one damage type to become resistant to
   This lasts until I choose another type; Magical and silver weapons ignore this resistance

subclassfeature14.name: Hurl Through Hell
subclassfeature14.description:
When I hit a creature with an attack, I can instantly transport it through lower planes
   It returns at the end of my next turn and takes 10d10 psychic damage if not a fiend

subclassfeature24.name: Legacy spells
subclassfeature24.description: I can choose to access to the legacy version of spells

show legacy.name: Show legacy spells
show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature1.name: Awakened Mind
