subclassfeature1.description: I can telepathically speak to creatures I can see within 30 ft if they know a language

subclassfeature6.name: Entropic Ward
subclassfeature6.description:
As a reaction, when I'm attacked, I can impose disadvantage to that attack roll
   If it misses me, I have adv. on my next attack vs. the attacker during my next turn

subclassfeature10.name: Thought Shield
subclassfeature10.description:
No one can read my mind unless I allow it; I have resistance to psychic damage
   When I take psychic damage, the dealer of the psychic damage takes the same amount

subclassfeature14.name: Create Thrall
subclassfeature14.description:
As an action, I can charm an incapacitated humanoid by touch
   While it is charmed, I can communicate with it telepathically if it is on the same plane
   This lasts until the charm is removed (can be by Remove Curse) or I use this again

show legacy.description: I have access to the legacy version of spells

hide legacy.name: Hide legacy spells
hide legacy.description: I have hidden the legacy version of spells

subclassfeature3.name: Abjuration Savant
subclassfeature3.description: I gain two Wizard spells from the Abjuration school, level 2 or lower, for free. I gain a spell in this way each time I gain access to a new level of spell slots in this class.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Arcane Ward
subclassfeature3.1.description:
Once per Long Rest when I cast an Abj spell with a spell slot I can create a magic ward on myself that lasts until the end of my next Long Rest. When I take damage the ward takes it instead; I apply my Resistances & Vulnerabilities before this. If the ward reaches 0 Hit Points I take any remaining damage and the ward can't take any more.
   When I cast an Abj spell with a spell slot or spend a slot as a Bonus Action the ward regains HP equal to twice the slot level.

subclassfeature6.name: Projected Ward
subclassfeature6.description: When a creature I can see w/in 30 ft of me takes damage, I can take a Reaction for my Arcane Ward to absorb that it after that creature's Resistances & Vulnerabilities. If the ward reaches 0 Hit Points the warded creature takes any remaining damage.

subclassfeature10.name: Spell Breaker
subclassfeature10.description: I always have Counterspell & Dispel Magic prepared. I can cast Dispel Magic as a Bonus Action & add my Prof Bonus to its ability check. When I cast either spell with a spell slot that slot isn't expended if the spell fails.

subclassfeature14.name: Spell Resistance

text: Resistance to the damage of spells

subclassfeature14.description: I have Adv on saving throws against spells & Resistance to the damage of spells.

subclassfeature3.name: Divination Savant
subclassfeature3.description: I gain two Wizard spells from the Divination school, level 2 or lower, for free. I gain a spell in this way each time I gain access to a new level of spell slots in this class.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Portent
subclassfeature3.1.description: When I finish a Long Rest I can record a number of d20 rolls; Once per turn before a d20 test is rolled by me or a crea. I can see, I can replace the roll, spending the d20. These reset when I finish a long rest.

subclassfeature6.name: Expert Divination
subclassfeature6.description: When I cast using a level 2+ spell slot, I regain one slot below the level cast & level 5-.

subclassfeature10.name: The Third Eye
subclassfeature10.description:
Once per Rest as a Bonus Action, I gain one of the following benefits until my next rest.
   Darkvision: I gain Darkvision with a range of 120 feet.
   Greater Comprehension: I can read any language.
   See Invisibility: I can cast See Invisibility without spending a spell slot.

subclassfeature14.name: Greater Portent
subclassfeature14.description: Roll three d20s for my Portent feature rather than two.

subclassfeature3.name: Evocation Savant
subclassfeature3.description: I gain two Wizard spells from the Evocation school, level 2 or lower, for free. I gain a spell in this way each time I gain access to a new level of spell slots in this class.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Potent Cantrip
subclassfeature3.1.description: When I cast a cantrip at a creature and miss or the target passes its save, the target takes half the cantrip's damage (if any) but suffers no additional effect from the cantrip.

subclassfeature6.name: Sculpt Spell
subclassfeature6.description: When I cast an Evoc spell that affects other creatures I can see I can choose the spell's level + 1 creatures who pass automatically & take no damage if they would've taken half.

subclassfeature10.name: Empowered Evocation
subclassfeature10.description: When I cast an Evoc Wizard spell I can add my Int mod to one of its damage rolls.

subclassfeature14.name: Overchannel
subclassfeature14.description:
When I cast a Wizard spell that deals damage with a slot of level 1-5, I can deal max damage with that spell on the turn I cast it once per rest with no adverse effect.
   The second time I take 2d12 Necro damage (ignore Resistance/Immunity) for each level of the spell. The Necro damage goes up by 1d12 per level each time. A Long Rest resets it.

subclassfeature3.name: Illusion Savant
subclassfeature3.description: I gain two Wizard spells from the Illusion school, level 2 or lower, for free. I gain a spell in this way each time I gain access to a new level of spell slots in this class.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Improved Illusion
subclassfeature3.1.description: I can cast Illus spells w/out V components; Illus spells with a range of 10+ ft go up by 60 ft I know and can cast Minor Illusion as a Bonus Action, creating both a sound & image with one cast. It doesn't count against my cantrips known.

subclassfeature6.name: Phantasmal Creatures
subclassfeature6.description: I always have Summon Beast and Summon Fey prepared. Once per Long Rest I can cast each spell as an Illus spell and cast it without a spell slot, halving the summoned creature's HP & making it appear spectral.

subclassfeature10.name: Illusory Self
subclassfeature10.description: As a reaction, I can block an attack against me with an illusion of myself. It returns on a rest or by spending a Level 2+ spell slot (no action).

subclassfeature14.name: Illusory Reality
subclassfeature14.description: As a Bonus Action during an Illus spell I cast with a spell slot I can make one object in it real for 1 min (does no damage, gives no conditions).
